sentences.english: You don't have to sacrifice environmental protection to promote economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 你们没有必要牺牲环保来促进经济增长。

detailed_translations.english: If people promote something, they help or encourage it to happen, increase, or spread

sentences.english: He did trace them easily to Clapham, but no farther; for on entering that place they removed into a hackney-coach and dismissed the chaise that brought them from Epsom.
sentences.chinese: 他一路追踪觅迹，追到克拉普汗，这倒还不费什么事，可是再往前追便不容易，因为他们两人到达此地后，便把从艾普桑雇来的马车打发走了，重新雇了出租马车。

detailed_translations.chinese: 乘用马；出租马车；出租汽车；操贱役的人

name: graphic
trans: 生动的， 形象的； 绘画的， 文字的， 图表的

sentences.english: ...fine and graphic arts.
sentences.chinese: …美术与制图艺术。

detailed_translations.chinese: 生动的， 形象的； 绘画的， 文字的， 图表的
detailed_translations.english: Graphic means concerned with drawing or pictures, especially in publishing, industry, or computing

sentences.english: a job creation scheme
sentences.chinese: 创造就业机会的计划

detailed_translations.chinese: 创造， 创建； 创造的作品， 产物； 宇宙， 天地万物
detailed_translations.english: the act of creating something

name: inclination
trans: 倾斜； 倾向， 爱好

sentences.english: My natural inclination was to say no.
sentences.chinese: 我生性爱说“不”。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling that makes you want to do something

sentences.english: Combine all the ingredients in a large bowl.
sentences.chinese: 把所有食材都放在一个大碗里。

sentences.english: The food is home-cooked using fresh ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 这种食物是用新鲜的食材在家里烹制的。

detailed_translations.english: one of the foods that you use to make a particular food or dish

name: participate
trans: 参与， 参加； 分享， 分担

sentences.english: Some members refused to participate.
sentences.chinese: 有些会员拒绝参加。

detailed_translations.english: to take part in an activity or event

sentences.english: That sums up the concept of authenticity.
sentences.chinese: 这句话概括了真实性的概念。

sentences.english: What caused your authenticity to be compromised?
sentences.chinese: 是什么导致你的真实性妥协掉了？

sentences.english: They want your death as a warranty for the authenticity of your beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 他们希望你的死亡就像一种对于你所信仰的真实性的保证。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being real or true

sentences.english: rapacious landlords
sentences.chinese: 贪婪的房东

detailed_translations.english: always wanting more money, goods etc than you need or have a right to

sentences.english: A harmonious campus pays more attention to an all-round, humane, unisonous , sustainable and diverse education;
sentences.chinese: 和谐校园更加注重教育的全面性、人文性、协调性、持续性和多样性；

sentences.english: A scientific and exact requirement analysis is the precondition or guarantee for the weapon equipment system to get a complete, unisonous and durable development.
sentences.chinese: 科学、准确的需求分析是武器装备体系全面、协调、可持续发展的前提和保证。

sentences.english: So here's Chuck Mangione with his saxophonist and a saxophone cadenza.
sentences.chinese: 这就是查克·曼卓林,和他的萨克斯手一起演出的一段华彩乐章

sentences.english: The violinist had the technical skill to execute the cadenza, with its double stops and harmonics, with brilliance .
sentences.chinese: 小提琴手有用双倍停顿及和弦来精彩地演奏华彩乐段的技能。

sentences.english: A cadenza should not break away from the style of the work, it should be like a summing up, an epilogue, but with a little touch of Whoops!
sentences.chinese: 一个华彩乐段应该保持在作品的风格范围内，它应该像一个总结、一个收场白，但是要有一个小小的闪现：喔唷！

detailed_translations.english: a difficult part of a long piece of music, which a performer plays alone in order to show his or her skill

sentences.english: Pope Leo gave him absolution.
sentences.chinese: 教皇列奥赦免了他的罪孽。

detailed_translations.english: when someone is formally forgiven by the Christian Church or a priest for the things they have done wrong

sentences.english: a haughty laugh
sentences.chinese: 傲慢的大笑

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a proud unfriendly way

sentences.english: the contours of the hills
sentences.chinese: 群山的轮廓

sentences.english: the contours of her face
sentences.chinese: 她脸部的轮廓

detailed_translations.chinese: 轮廓；等高线；周线；电路；概要
detailed_translations.english: the shape of the outer edges of something such as an area of land or someone’s body

sentences.english: Wordsworth was one of the greatest lyric poets of his time.
sentences.chinese: 华兹华斯是他那个时代最伟大的抒情诗人之一。

detailed_translations.english: expressing strong personal emotions such as love, in a way that is similar to music in its sounds and  rhythm
the words of a song

sentences.english: These statistics grossly misrepresent the reality.
sentences.chinese: 这些统计资料严重歪曲了实际情况。

detailed_translations.chinese: 歪曲，误传；不合适地代表
detailed_translations.english: to deliberately give a wrong description of someone’s opinions or of a situation

name: salvageable
trans: 可抢救的； 可打捞的； 可挽救的

detailed_translations.chinese: 可抢救的；可打捞的；可挽回的；能利用的

sentences.english: ...a receptive audience for his homily on moral values.
sentences.chinese: ...乐于倾听他关于道德价值观说教的观众。

detailed_translations.english: advice about how to behave that is often unwanted

detailed_translations.chinese: 藏书癖；（尤指珍本书）收藏狂
detailed_translations.english: extreme fondness for books

name: clan
trans: 部落； 氏族， 宗族； 帮派

sentences.english: the Campbell clan
sentences.chinese: 坎贝尔家族

sentences.english: warring clans
sentences.chinese: 交战的各氏族

detailed_translations.english: a large group of families who often share the same name

name: economical
trans: 节约的， 节俭的， 节省的， 经济的

sentences.english: A small car is more economical to run.
sentences.chinese: 开小型汽车比较省油。

sentences.english: good-quality clothes at economical prices
sentences.chinese: 物美价廉的衣服

detailed_translations.english: using money, time, goods etc carefully and without wasting any

sentences.english: The spines of the omnivorous pencil-spined urchin extend outward from its body.
sentences.chinese: 这个铅笔状的杂食性海胆的刺从它们的身体里伸出来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 顽童, [动物]刺猥, [动物]海胆
赋予…生命；激发；使有生气
detailed_translations.english: to make vital, living, or alive; endow with life or vigour

sentences.english: Your essay is good, you just need to polish it a bit.
sentences.chinese: 你的文章不错，只要稍加润色就可以了。

detailed_translations.english: to improve a piece of writing, a speech etc by making slight changes to it before it is completely finished
a liquid, powder, or other substance that you rub into a surface to make it smooth and shiny

sentences.english: The President chose loyal supporters to serve in his cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 总统选择了忠诚的支持者到他的内阁服务。

sentences.english: Every year we used the State of the Union as an organizing tool for the cabinet and staff to come up with new policy ideas, and then we worked hard on how best to present them.
sentences.chinese: 每年国情咨文都被内阁和幕僚们作为我们提出新政策思路的一个组织工具，然后我们努力下功夫，让它们以最佳方式呈现在人们面前。

detailed_translations.english: the politicians with important positions in a government who meet to make decisions or advise the leader of the government

name: quip
trans: 嘲弄， 挖苦话； 双关语

sentences.english: The commentators make endless quips about the players' appearance.
sentences.chinese: 解说员们对球员们的外貌没完没了地说着俏皮话。

detailed_translations.english: A quip is a remark that is intended be amusing or clever

name: ostensible
trans: 可公开的；  表面的， 虚假的

sentences.english: The ostensible purpose of these meetings was to gather information on financial strategies.
sentences.chinese: 这些会议声称旨在收集金融策略方面的信息。

detailed_translations.english: seeming to be the reason for or the purpose of something, but usually hiding the real reason or purpose

name: principle
trans: 原理； 原则； 主义， 信念

sentences.english: Schools try to teach children a set of principles.
sentences.chinese: 学校设法教给孩子们一套道德准则。

sentences.english: He’s got no principles at all!
sentences.chinese: 他毫无道德准则！

sentences.english: It’s against my principles to accept gifts from clients.
sentences.chinese: 收受客户礼物违背我的原则。

detailed_translations.english: a moral rule or belief about what is right and wrong, that influences how you behave

sentences.english: Touching the case, I suggest that we should go to ask the litigant.
sentences.chinese: 关于这个案子，我建议我们去问问当事人。

sentences.english: How can I as a private litigant seek redress for defamation that ruins my business?
sentences.chinese: 做为私人诉讼当事人，我怎么对毁了我的事业的诽谤寻求补救呢？

detailed_translations.english: someone who is making a claim against someone or defending themselves against a claim in a court of law

name: tedious
trans: 乏味的， 单调的， 冗长的

sentences.english: The audience coughed down the tedious speaker.
sentences.chinese: 听众用咳嗽声阻挠演讲人的沉闷发言。

sentences.english: There's no point in labouring at a tedious task.
sentences.chinese: 辛苦地干单调乏味的工作没有意义。

sentences.english: They get their money from various sources.
sentences.chinese: 他们从各种途径弄到钱。

detailed_translations.english: a thing, place, activity etc that you get something from

sentences.english: They have decided to initiate legal proceedings against the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定向该报提起法律诉讼。

sentences.english: Intellectuals have initiated a debate on terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 知识分子就恐怖主义发起了辩论。

detailed_translations.chinese: 开始， 创造， 发起； 使初步了解； 接纳， 让…加入
detailed_translations.english: to arrange for something important to start, such as an official process or a new plan
someone who has been allowed to join a particular organization, club, or group and has been taught its secrets

name: domestic
trans: 家里的， 家庭的； 本国的； 驯养的

sentences.english: ...over 100 domestic flights a day to 30 leading U.S. destinations.
sentences.chinese: …每天飞往美国30个主要目的地的100多个国内航班。

detailed_translations.english: relating to or happening in one particular country and not involving any other countries

sentences.english: All they need now are the keys to the infirmary.
sentences.chinese: 现在所需要的就是医务室的门钥匙。

sentences.english: A smile creeps onto his face as he realizes that he’s in the infirmary.
sentences.chinese: 一丝笑容爬上他的脸上，他意识到自己身处于医务室中。

detailed_translations.english: a hospital – often used in the names of hospitals in Britain

name: prepossessing
trans: 讨人喜欢的； 给人好感的

sentences.english: a prepossessing smile
sentences.chinese: 迷人的微笑

detailed_translations.chinese: 给人好感的；有魅力的；引人注意的
detailed_translations.english: looking attractive or pleasant

detailed_translations.chinese: 预先影响；使先具有（prepossess的现在分词）

sentences.english: She looked prim and nervous in her best hat and coat.
sentences.chinese: 她戴着最好的帽子并穿着最好的外套，显得拘谨不安。

sentences.english: a very prim and proper young lady
sentences.chinese: 相当古板正经的年轻女子

detailed_translations.english: very formal and careful in the way you speak and behave, and easily shocked by anything rude

detailed_translations.chinese: 使显得一本正经；把…打扮得整整齐齐
(Prim)人名；(法、德、匈、捷、瑞典、西、葡)普里姆

sentences.english: ...terrestrial life forms.
sentences.chinese: …地球上的生命形态。

detailed_translations.chinese: 地球的；陆地的，[生物] 陆生的；人间的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the Earth rather than to the moon or other  planets

sentences.english: State authorities have ordered cutbacks in deliveries of water from the delta because of the threat to endangered species of salmon and smelt.
sentences.chinese: 由于鲑鱼和胡瓜鱼这些濒危物种受到威胁，国家当局已经要求消减从该三角洲往外输水的量。

detailed_translations.english: to melt a rock that contains metal in order to remove the metal

sentences.english: Despite her eighty years, Elsie was full of vitality.
sentences.chinese: 尽管已80岁了，埃尔茜依然充满活力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 活力； 生机， 元气
detailed_translations.english: great energy and eagerness to do things

name: slovenly
trans: 懒散的； 不修边幅的

sentences.english: slovenly habits
sentences.chinese: 邋里邋遢的习惯

sentences.english: a large slovenly woman
sentences.chinese: 一个身材高大、不修边幅的女人

sentences.english: a slovenly way of speaking
sentences.chinese: 随便的说话方式

detailed_translations.chinese: 懒散的；不整洁的；马虎的
detailed_translations.english: lazy, untidy, and careless

detailed_translations.chinese: 邋遢地；马虎地；不整洁地

sentences.english: David has a rather lackadaisical approach to his work.
sentences.chinese: 戴维的工作态度有点懒散。

detailed_translations.chinese: 懒洋洋的；无精打采的；伤感的
detailed_translations.english: not showing enough interest in something or not putting enough effort into it

name: ravenous
trans: 贪婪的， 渴望的， 狼吞虎咽的

sentences.english: I’m absolutely ravenous.
sentences.chinese: 我饿极了。

sentences.english: a ravenous appetite
sentences.chinese: 极大的胃口

detailed_translations.english: very hungry

name: abbess
trans: 女修道院院长， 尼姑庵住持

sentences.english: At age 43 she became abbess of her community.
sentences.chinese: 43岁时她成为当地的女修道院院长。

sentences.english: Once upon a time, there was an abbess in a small abbey .
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，一个小修道院里有一个女修道院院长。

sentences.english: Now the abbess is making her case for a religious life removed from worldly distractions-on the internet's world wide web.
sentences.chinese: 如今，这位女修道院院长正在国际互联网路上的“全球网”超级档上为超凡拔俗的宗教生活阐明自己的立场。

detailed_translations.chinese: 女修道院院长， 尼姑庵住持
detailed_translations.english: a woman who is in charge of a  convent (=  a place where a group of  nun s  live  )

name: acquired
trans: 已获得的； 后天通过自己的努力得到的

sentences.english: General Motors acquired a 50% stake in Saab for about $400m.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽车公司以大约4亿美元获得了萨博50%的股份。

detailed_translations.chinese: [医] 后天的；已获得的；已成习惯的

detailed_translations.english: If you acquire something, you buy or obtain it for yourself, or someone gives it to you

sentences.english: a period of relative stability
sentences.chinese: 相对稳定的一段时期

detailed_translations.english: the condition of being steady and not changing

name: radiate
trans: 放射， 辐射； 散布， 传播

sentences.english: He radiated calm confidence.
sentences.chinese: 他身上散发着沉稳自信的气质。

detailed_translations.chinese: 辐射；传播；流露；发射；广播
detailed_translations.english: if someone radiates a feeling, or if it radiates from them, it is very easy to see that this is how they feel

sentences.english: The tension was becoming unbearable, and I wanted to scream.
sentences.chinese: 这种紧张变得难以忍受，我真想大声尖叫。

sentences.english: Muscle tension can be a sign of stress.
sentences.chinese: 肌肉紧张可能是压力大的迹象。

sentences.english: This wire will take 50 pounds tension.
sentences.chinese: 这种金属线能承受50磅的张力。

detailed_translations.english: a nervous worried feeling that makes it impossible for you to relax

name: reflection
trans: 反射； 映象， 倒影； 反省， 沉思

sentences.english: Can you see your reflection in the glass?
sentences.chinese: 你能看到玻璃里你的影像吗？

sentences.english: ...the reflection of a beam of light off a mirror.
sentences.chinese: …一束光线在镜面上的反射。

sentences.english: Inhibition in adulthood seems to be a reflection of a person's experiences as a child.
sentences.chinese: 成年期的压抑似乎是一个人童年经历的一种反映。

detailed_translations.english: an image that you can see in a mirror, glass, or water

name: tenuous
trans: 簿的； 稀薄的， 空洞无力的

sentences.english: For now, the band’s travel plans are tenuous.
sentences.chinese: 乐队的巡演计划暂时还没确定。

detailed_translations.english: very thin and easily broken

sentences.english: a winsome smile
sentences.chinese: 迷人的微笑

detailed_translations.chinese: 迷人的；可爱的；引人注目的
detailed_translations.english: behaving in a pleasant and attractive way

name: ultimate
trans: 最后的， 最终的； 根本的

sentences.english: The ultimate outcome of the experiment cannot be predicted.
sentences.chinese: 试验的最后结果无法预测。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s ultimate aim is their main and most important aim, that they hope to achieve in the future

name: ballad
trans: 民歌； 歌谣； 叙事歌； 流行歌曲； 情歌

sentences.english: ...an eighteenth century ballad about some lost children called the Babes in the Wood.
sentences.chinese: …一首关于迷路儿童的名为《丛林中的宝贝》的18世纪民间叙事诗。

detailed_translations.chinese: 歌谣，民谣；叙事歌谣；流行抒情歌曲
detailed_translations.english: a slow love song

sentences.english: caustic soda (= a chemical used for cleaning things )
sentences.chinese: 苛性钠，烧碱

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 腐蚀性的；[化学] 苛性的；刻薄的；焦散的
detailed_translations.english: a caustic substance can burn through things by chemical action

detailed_translations.chinese: [助剂] 腐蚀剂；苛性钠；焦散曲线

name: prosecute
trans: 实行， 从事； 告发， 起诉

sentences.english: Mrs Lynn Smith, prosecuting, said the offence took place on January 27.
sentences.chinese: 控方律师林恩·史密斯夫人称案件发生于1月27日。

detailed_translations.english: if a lawyer prosecutes a case, he or she tries to prove that the person charged with a crime is guilty
to charge someone with a crime and try to show that they are guilty of it in a court of law

sentences.english: Rachel, you must have misunderstood her! Ellie would never say something like that.
sentences.chinese: 雷切尔，你一定是误会她了！埃莉绝不会说那样的话。

sentences.english: Don’t misunderstand me. She’s a very nice person when you get to know her.
sentences.chinese: 不要误解我的意思。你了解她后就会知道她是个很好的人。

detailed_translations.english: to fail to understand someone or something correctly

sentences.english: A hydrocarbon was known to be either an alkene or alkane.
sentences.chinese: 某碳氢化合物已知可能是烯烃或是烷烃。

sentences.english: As one of substitutes for fire-extinguishing agent of halogenated hydrocarbon, fire-extinguishing agent of halogenated hydrocarbon produces lots of acid gases.
sentences.chinese: 作为哈龙灭火剂气体替代物之一的卤代烃类灭火剂用于灭火时会产生大量的卤化氢酸性气体。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical compound that consists of  hydrogen  and  carbon  , such as coal or gas

sentences.english: And I prefer to an ampere meter being made of aluminum even though it has analog to another one.
sentences.chinese: 我还想要一个铝制的安培表，虽然它与另一个类似。

sentences.english: A static magnetic field is measured in units of ampere per metre, (A/m) but is usually expressed in terms of the corresponding magnetic induction measured in units of tesla, (T) or millitesla (mT).
sentences.chinese: 静电磁场以每米具有的安培单位衡量(A/m)，但是通常以相应的电磁感应单位特斯拉(T)或毫伏特斯拉(mT)表示。

sentences.english: Five nanogenerators working together produced about 1 micro ampere output current at 3 volts about the same voltage generated by two regular AA batteries.
sentences.chinese: 5个纳米发电机同时工作可以产生1微安培3伏特的输出电流，与2节普通的5号电池所产生的电压差不多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安培（计算电流强度的标准单位）

sentences.english: a precocious child who walked and talked early
sentences.chinese: 走路和说话都早的早熟儿童

detailed_translations.english: a precocious child shows intelligence or skill at a very young age, or behaves in an adult way – sometimes used to show disapproval in British English

sentences.english: He was trying to get a pecuniary advantage for himself.
sentences.chinese: 他拼命为自己敛财。

detailed_translations.english: relating to or consisting of money

sentences.english: The success in the Middle East redounds to his benefit.
sentences.chinese: 中东地区的该项成就对他有益。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有助于；报偿，报应；被转移
detailed_translations.english: If an action or situation redounds to your benefit or advantage, it gives people a good impression of you or brings you something that can improve your situation

name: arboreal
trans: 树的， 乔木的； 树栖的

sentences.english: ...arboreal marsupials which resemble monkeys.
sentences.chinese: ...类猴树栖有袋动物。

detailed_translations.english: relating to trees, or living in trees

sentences.english: Snakes are carnivorous.
sentences.chinese: 蛇都是食肉动物。

detailed_translations.english: Carnivorous animals eat meat

sentences.english: ...a retired banker well known for his philanthropy.
sentences.chinese: ...一位以乐善好施闻名的退休银行家。

detailed_translations.english: the practice of giving money and help to people who are poor or in trouble

sentences.english: the black fetid water of the lake
sentences.chinese: 又黑又臭的湖水

sentences.english: the dog’s fetid breath
sentences.chinese: 那条狗呼出的臭气

detailed_translations.english: having a strong bad smell

sentences.english: Today predestine a change not drive the fate of strong J?
sentences.chinese: 今天注定改变不了被强J的命运吗？

sentences.english: That is me Ma sum the predestination of the Niang in the clout to predestine.
sentences.chinese: 那是我阿玛额娘的缘分命中注定。

detailed_translations.english: to foreordain; determine beforehand

sentences.english: The nature of the polymer is currently a trade secret.
sentences.chinese: 这一聚合物的性质目前是个商业机密。

sentences.english: Latex, a material obtained from rubber trees, is a natural polymer of isoprene.
sentences.chinese: 乳胶，一种从橡树获得的物质，是天然的异戊二烯聚合物。

sentences.english: The term condensation is now firmly entrenched in the literature of polymer science.
sentences.chinese: 缩合这个术语，现在在聚合物科学文献中已牢固的确定。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical  compound  that has a simple structure of large  molecule s

sentences.english: The photograph of Christian that accompanied many of the news stories showed a boy with mussed-up hair and pierced ears with black plugs looking impishly askance at the camera.
sentences.chinese: 很多新闻报道配发了一张克里斯丁本人的照片，在那幅照片中是一个头发乱糟糟的男孩，耳朵插着一个黑色的耳塞，顽皮地斜视着相机的镜头。

sentences.english: His face contorts as he screams out the lyrics.
sentences.chinese: 当他大声朗读这些抒情诗时，脸都变形了。

detailed_translations.english: if you contort something, or if it contorts, it twists out of its normal shape and looks strange or unattractive

name: resistant
trans: 抵抗的， 有抵抗力的

sentences.english: Some people are very resistant to the idea of exercise.
sentences.chinese: 一些人对锻炼的主意非常抵制。

detailed_translations.english: not damaged or affected by something

sentences.english: But a salamander embryo can attract algae. Inside its tissues and cells.
sentences.chinese: 但蝾螈胚胎却会吸引藻类进入组织和细胞。

sentences.english: Using imaging techniques and DNA testing, scientists found algae inside the cells of young salamander embryos—and even in the reproductive tracts of some adult females.
sentences.chinese: 通过成像技术和基因检测，科学家发现了成活在幼年蝾螈胚胎细胞中的藻类——甚至存在于一些成年雌性的生殖道中。

sentences.english: Moreover, there are signs that intracellular algae may be directly providing the products of photosynthesis — oxygen and carbohydrate — to the salamander cells that encapsulate them.
sentences.chinese: 更重要的是，有迹象表明这种细胞内的水藻可以直接将光合作用的产物氧气和二氧化碳给容纳它的蝾螈细胞。

detailed_translations.english: a small animal similar to a  lizard  , which lives on land and in the water

sentences.english: They asked my father to intercede with the king on their behalf.
sentences.chinese: 他们请我父亲代他们向国王求情。

detailed_translations.english: to speak in support of someone, especially in order to try to prevent them from being punished

sentences.english: It reflected an information management the catholicity and the society of the activity.
sentences.chinese: 它反映了信息管理活动的普遍性和社会性。

sentences.english: Because of its catholicity and complexity, cavitation is positively researched all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 由于汽蚀现象的普遍性和复杂性，国内外都在积极进行研究。

sentences.english: This problem, there is extensive catholicity in social life.
sentences.chinese: 这个新问题，在社会生活中有广泛的普遍性。

detailed_translations.english: a wide range of interests, tastes, etc; liberality

sentences.english: ...the freed slaves and their progeny.
sentences.chinese: ...被释放的奴隶和他们的后代。

detailed_translations.english: the babies of animals or plants

sentences.english: Good lighting will enhance any room.
sentences.chinese: 良好的照明能给房间增色不少。

sentences.english: The publicity has enhanced his reputation.
sentences.chinese: 这次宣传提高了他的声誉。

detailed_translations.english: to improve something

sentences.english: This week Sabrina uses witchcraft to overcome her fear of giving a speech.
sentences.chinese: 这一周萨布丽娜用巫术来克服对发表演说的恐惧。

detailed_translations.english: the use of magic powers, especially evil ones, to make things happen

name: antiseptic
trans: 防腐的， 杀菌的， 消过毒的

sentences.english: The antiseptic properties of copper sulphate have never been questioned.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸铜具有防腐性，这是不曾有过问题的。

sentences.english: Polyurethane is a kind of excellent anticorrosion material, material has excellent antiseptic effect on metal substrate.
sentences.chinese: 聚胺又是一种优良的防腐材料，对金属底材具有优异的防腐作用。

sentences.english: Don't just give money, go volunteer somewhere so you can have direct interactions with people. Your life is too antiseptic and it is making you a bit boring.
sentences.chinese: 不要只是捐钱，去某个地方做志愿者吧，这样你就可以和别人直接互动。你的生活太“防腐”了，你开始觉得有点无聊了吧。

detailed_translations.english: a medicine that you put onto a wound to stop it from becoming infected

name: polytechnic
trans: 各种工艺的； 综合技术的

sentences.english: Baltimore Polytechnic Institute
sentences.chinese: 巴尔的摩理工学院

detailed_translations.chinese: 各种工艺的；综合技术的
工艺学校；理工专科学校
detailed_translations.english: a word used in the names of high schools or colleges in the US, where you can study technical or scientific subjects

sentences.english: I can’t say for definite who did it, but I certainly have my suspicions .
sentences.chinese: 我不能确切说是谁干的，但我肯定有怀疑的对象。

sentences.english: Police suspicions were confirmed when the stolen property was found in his flat.
sentences.chinese: 失窃物品在他公寓里找到，警方的怀疑得到了证实。

sentences.english: I wondered how I could leave early without arousing anyone’s suspicions .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道怎么才能早点离开而又不引起别人的怀疑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 怀疑， 疑心， 猜疑； 一点儿， 少量
detailed_translations.english: a feeling you have that someone is probably guilty of doing something wrong or dishonest

sentences.english: In this example, you rotate a square on its center, but do not fill the square.
sentences.chinese: 在这个例子中，您会以中心为原点旋转一个正方形，但不填充这个正方形。

detailed_translations.chinese: 圆心， 正中； 中心

sentences.english: Her country suffered through her refusal to accept change.
sentences.chinese: 她的国家因为她拒绝接受变革而受了害。

detailed_translations.english: when you say firmly that you will not do, give, or accept something

name: churlish
trans: 粗野的； 脾气坏的； 无礼的

sentences.english: She would think him churlish if he refused.
sentences.chinese: 如果他拒绝，她会觉得他不礼貌。

sentences.english: The room was so nice it seemed churlish to argue.
sentences.chinese: 这房间这么好，吵架的话就显得无礼了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 没有礼貌的；脾气暴躁的
detailed_translations.english: Someone who is churlish is unfriendly, bad-tempered, or impolite

sentences.english: In the new period, the studies of this issue by scholars both in and out of China are isochronous , with more and more achievements and different voices coming out.
sentences.chinese: 进入新时期以来，大陆学者和港台、海外汉学界对这一问题的探索和论证基本上趋于同步了，越来越多的研究成果和不同声音浮出水面。

detailed_translations.english: having the same duration; equal in time

name: dogmatist
trans: 武断论者； 教条主义者

sentences.english: The rich flaunted their wealth while the poor starved on the streets.
sentences.chinese: 富人摆阔，穷人却在大街上饿肚子。

detailed_translations.english: to show your money, success, beauty etc so that other people notice it – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: For most of the year, the area is teeming with tourists.
sentences.chinese: 一年的大部分时间里这个地方都挤满了游客。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that a place is teeming with people or animals, you mean that it is crowded and the people and animals are moving around a lot

sentences.english: Rising prices neutralize increased wages.
sentences.chinese: 不断上涨的物价会抵消工资的增长。

detailed_translations.chinese: 抵销；使…中和；使…无效；使…中立
detailed_translations.english: to prevent something from having any effect

sentences.english: The revolution foreshadowed an entirely new social order.
sentences.chinese: 这场革命预示着一种全新的社会秩序将要出现。

detailed_translations.english: to show or say that something will happen in the future

name: gravity
trans: 重力， 引力； 严肃， 庄重

sentences.english: the force of gravity
sentences.chinese: 重力

sentences.english: I could not hide from her the gravity of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 我不能向她隐瞒情况的严重性。

detailed_translations.english: the force that causes something to fall to the ground or to be attracted to another  planet

sentences.english: An aneuploid state in which a third homologous chromosome is present in addition to the normal autosomal pair is called trisomy.
sentences.chinese: 除了正常染色体对以外，还存在有第二种同源染色体的非整倍体状态，被称为三体性。

sentences.english: Locus (pl. loci) The position of a gene on a chromosome. Alleles of the same gene occupy the equivalent locus on homologous chromosomes.
sentences.chinese: 基因位点，基因座：基因在染色体上的位置。等位基因位于同源染色体相对应的位点上。

name: replete
trans: 充分供应的， 饱足的； 充满的

sentences.english: The harbour was replete with boats.
sentences.chinese: 港口里满是船只。

detailed_translations.english: full of something

name: enfranchise
trans: 释放， 解放， 给予自由； 给予…公民权

sentences.english: The company voted to enfranchise its 120 women members.
sentences.chinese: 公司投票决定给予其120名女员工选举权。

detailed_translations.chinese: 给予选举权；给予自治权；解放，释放
detailed_translations.english: to give a group of people the right to vote

sentences.english: A thrush alighted on a branch of the pine tree.
sentences.chinese: 一只画眉落在这棵松树的一根树枝上。

detailed_translations.english: if a bird or insect alights on something, it stops flying and stands on it
burning

name: blemish
trans: 弄脏， 玷污， 损害

sentences.english: Every piece is closely scrutinized, and if there is the slightest blemish on it, it is rejected.
sentences.chinese: 每一件都经过仔细检查，如果上面有哪怕最微小的瑕疵，都会被拒绝。

detailed_translations.english: a small mark, especially a mark on someone’s skin or on the surface of an object, that spoils its appearance
to spoil the beauty or appearance of something, so that it is not perfect

name: befuddle
trans: 使酒醉昏迷； 使迷惑， 使迷糊

sentences.english: ...problems that are befuddling them.
sentences.chinese: ...使他们困惑的问题。

detailed_translations.english: If something befuddles you, it confuses your mind or thoughts

sentences.english: The tidal wave inundated vast areas of cropland.
sentences.chinese: 海啸淹没了大片农田。

detailed_translations.english: to cover an area with a large amount of water

sentences.english: We recoil in horror from the thought of subjecting someone to extreme pain.
sentences.chinese: 想到要让一个人经受极度的痛苦，我们就会恐惧地退缩。

sentences.english: ...his small body jerking in recoil from the volume of his shouting.
sentences.chinese: …他小小身体在他大声的叫喊中畏缩地抽搐着。

detailed_translations.english: to move back suddenly and quickly from something you do not like or are afraid of
Recoil is also a noun

sentences.english: ...a ship with three masts and two funnels.
sentences.chinese: …一艘有3根桅杆和2个烟囱的轮船。

detailed_translations.english: a thin tube with a wide top that you use for pouring liquid into a container with a narrow opening, such as a bottle

detailed_translations.chinese: 通过漏斗或烟囱等；使成漏斗形

sentences.english: Her staff find her bossy and dogmatic.
sentences.chinese: 她的员工认为她爱指挥别人而且自以为是。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is dogmatic is completely certain of their beliefs and expects other people to accept them without arguing

name: dilettante
trans: 业余文学、 艺术爱好者； 浅薄的涉猎者

sentences.english: He tolerated the presence of an amateur, idler and dilettante and proved a perfect teacher and matchless travel companion.
sentences.chinese: 他能够容忍我这个业余爱好者的浅薄与无知，当之无愧是一个好老师和一个无与伦比的好伙伴。

sentences.english: It is also a phenomenological layers which encourage dilettante contemplation.
sentences.chinese: 这也是一个鼓励业余爱好者深思的现象层。

detailed_translations.chinese: 业余爱好者；一知半解者
浅薄的；业余艺术爱好的
（在艺术、科学等方面）浅尝辄止

name: regulate
trans: 管理， 控制， 使遵守规章； 调节 ， 调整， 校对

sentences.english: People sweat to regulate their body heat.
sentences.chinese: 人出汗以调节体温。

detailed_translations.english: to make a machine or your body work at a particular speed, temperature etc

name: listless
trans: 倦怠的； 冷漠的； 情绪低落的

sentences.english: The heat was making me listless.
sentences.chinese: 炎热的天气使我懒洋洋的。

detailed_translations.english: feeling tired and not interested in things

name: punitive
trans: 刑罚的； 惩罚  的

sentences.english: Rather than a punitive time-out ("Go to your room!"), take her to a comfy sofa in the den or to a favorite corner of her bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 这时候，我们不要惩罚性的说：“回你的房间去！” 而应该让他／她去大厅里舒服的沙发或者是卧室里她最喜欢的一角呆着。

sentences.english: the pituitary gland
sentences.chinese: 脑垂体腺

detailed_translations.english: an organ of the body which produces a substance that the body needs, such as hormones, sweat, or saliva

sentences.english: The computer and the human mind have different but complementary abilities.
sentences.chinese: 电脑与人脑各不相同，却又互为补充。

detailed_translations.english: complementary things go well together, although they are usually different

sentences.english: I don't think I deserve to be made the scapegoat for a couple of bad results.
sentences.chinese: 我认为我不该为出现的一些不良后果充当替罪羊。

sentences.english: ...a climate where ethnic minorities are continually scapegoated for the lack of jobs and housing problems.
sentences.chinese: …一种屡屡把缺少工作职位和住房问题归罪于少数族裔的风气。

detailed_translations.chinese: 替罪羊，替人顶罪者；替身
detailed_translations.english: someone who is blamed for something bad that happens, even if it is not their fault
To scapegoat someone means to blame them publicly for something bad that has happened, even though it was not their fault

sentences.english: Few of the manuscripts are still extant.
sentences.chinese: 手稿大都散佚无存。

detailed_translations.english: still existing in spite of being very old

name: consistency
trans: 始终一贯， 前后一致

sentences.english: She scores goals with remarkable consistency.
sentences.chinese: 她以非凡的连贯性进球得分。

detailed_translations.english: how thick, smooth etc a substance is

sentences.english: There’s a danger of becoming complacent if you win a few games.
sentences.chinese: 赢了几场比赛可能就会变得沾沾自喜。

sentences.english: a complacent attitude towards the problem
sentences.chinese: 对问题满不在乎的态度

detailed_translations.english: pleased with a situation, especially something you have achieved, so that you stop trying to improve or change things – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: Psychologists try to plumb the deepest mysteries of the human psyche.
sentences.chinese: 心理学家试图探究人类心理最深层的奥秘。

detailed_translations.english: exactly upright or level

name: premise
trans: 前提， 假设；   房屋和地基， 经营场

sentences.english: Schools may earn extra money by renting out their premises.
sentences.chinese: 学校通过出租房屋场地可以获取额外收入。

sentences.english: business premises
sentences.chinese: 企业经营场所

detailed_translations.chinese: 房屋和地基， 经营场址； 前提， 假设
detailed_translations.english: the buildings and land that a shop, restaurant, company etc uses

name: vilify
trans: 诽谤， 辱骂； 贬低， 轻视

sentences.english: The agency has been vilified by some doctors for being unnecessarily slow to approve life-saving drugs.
sentences.chinese: 该机构因对救生药物的审批速度过慢而备受一些医生的诽谤。

detailed_translations.english: to say or write bad things about someone or something

sentences.english: His article is stuffed with cliche.
sentences.chinese: 他的文章中满是一些陈词滥调。

sentences.english: A cliche, I know, and until then I had not grasped what that feels like.
sentences.chinese: 我知道过于陈词滥调，但是我知道我已经抓不住那种感觉了。

sentences.english: Enjoy your life when you're young – it's a true cliche that you only have your youth once – but work harder than most people think you should.
sentences.chinese: 当你年轻时，享受你的生活— 因为青春只有一次，这是陈词滥调— 但别忘了要比别人想象的更努力工作。

name: controversial
trans: 引起争论的， 有争议的

sentences.english: the controversial issue of welfare reform
sentences.chinese: 福利改革这一有争议的话题

sentences.english: a highly controversial (= very controversial ) plan to flood the valley in order to build a dam
sentences.chinese: 一个把山谷淹掉来建造水坝的极具争议的计划

sentences.english: He is a controversial figure (= person who does controversial things ) in the art world.
sentences.chinese: 他是艺术界极具争议的人物。

detailed_translations.english: causing a lot of disagreement, because many people have strong opinions about the subject being discussed

sentences.english: an intransigent attitude
sentences.chinese: 不妥协的态度

detailed_translations.english: unwilling to change your ideas or behaviour, in a way that seems unreasonable

name: unbecoming
trans: 不恰当的， 不得体的

sentences.english: Austin displayed conduct unbecoming of an officer and a gentleman.
sentences.chinese: 奥斯汀的行为不符合军官和绅士的身份。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不适当的，不相称的；不合身的，不得体的
detailed_translations.english: clothes that are unbecoming make you look unattractive

sentences.english: You have control over the restoration of objects.
sentences.chinese: 您还可以控制对象的恢复。

detailed_translations.english: the act of bringing back a law, tax, or system of government

sentences.english: The pigment in the upper layer of skin (epidermis) that gives your skin its normal color is called melanin.
sentences.chinese: 在浅层皮肤（表皮）中有种色素能让你的皮肤保持其正常的颜色，称为黑色素。

sentences.english: Skin color is due to melanin, a pigment produced in the epidermis to protect us from the sun's potentially cancer-causing ultraviolet (UV) rays.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种产生于表皮的色素，能够保护我们免受来自紫外线的侵袭。 紫外线正是来自太阳的潜在致癌物。

detailed_translations.english: the outside layer of your skin

name: benignant
trans: 仁慈的， 和蔼的； 有益的

detailed_translations.chinese: 良性的；仁慈的；有益的；和蔼的
detailed_translations.english: kind; gracious, as a king to his subjects

sentences.english: The lead plaintiff of the lawsuit is the University of California.
sentences.chinese: 这次诉讼的第一原告是加利福尼亚大学。

detailed_translations.english: someone who brings a legal action against another person in a court of law

sentences.english: In most heteromorphic plants the stigmas of the different morphs have different surface textures and the pollen may be of different size or sculpturing or both.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数异态型植物中．不同形态的柱头的表面结构不同，花粉的大小或纹饰不同，或两者兼而有之。

detailed_translations.chinese: [生物] 异形的，[生物] 异态的；[化学] 多晶型的
detailed_translations.english: differing from the normal form in size, shape, and function

sentences.english: A symbol appears in an upper quadrant of the screen.
sentences.chinese: 一个符号出现在屏幕上方的一个象限里。

sentences.english: A virgin material can be "started" from 0 into either the first or the third quadrant .
sentences.chinese: 一个没有用过的材料可以从0点“开始”进入第一或第三象限。

sentences.english: A virgin material can be "started" from point 0 into either the first or the third quadrant .
sentences.chinese: 一个没有用过的材料可以从0点「开始」进入第一或第三象限。

detailed_translations.english: an instrument for measuring angles, used when sailing or looking at the stars

name: bide
trans: 居住， 滞留； 忍受

sentences.english: They are stronger than us and can afford to bide their time.
sentences.chinese: 他们比我们有实力，可以耐心等待时机。

detailed_translations.english: to wait until the right moment to do something

name: inveigh
trans: 猛烈抨击； 痛骂， 漫骂

sentences.english: A lot of his writings inveigh against luxury and riches.
sentences.chinese: 他的许多作品猛烈抨击了奢侈和富有。

detailed_translations.english: If you inveigh against something, you criticize it strongly

name: anathema
trans: 诅咒； 令人厌恶的事

sentences.english: Campbell summed up by saying that nutrition is holistic, a concept which is “anathema” to most scientists’ method.
sentences.chinese: 坎贝尔总结说，营养是全面的，这个概念是对大多数科学家的方法的“诅咒”。

sentences.english: Naturally, these views are anathema to modern Austrians in the tradition of Murray Rothbard, who think the central bank should be abolished.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，这些观点是对罗斯巴德一派的现代奥地利学派的诅咒，因为奥地利学派认为中央银行必须取消。

name: wretch
trans: 不幸的人， 苦命的人； 卑劣的人， 无耻的人， 坏人

sentences.english: He was a lonely, miserable wretch.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个孤独的可怜虫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可怜的人，不幸的人；卑鄙的人
detailed_translations.english: someone that you feel sorry for

sentences.english: France is expected to detonate its first nuclear device in the next few days.
sentences.chinese: 预计法国将在未来几天内引爆它的第一个核装置。

detailed_translations.english: to explode or to make something explode

sentences.english: characters from classical mythology
sentences.chinese: 古典神话中的人物

detailed_translations.english: set of ancient myths

sentences.english: These serve to show that children with mental disorders can not only be treated but can direct some of their symptomatic behavior into positive channels.
sentences.chinese: 做这些是为了告诉人们，精神疾病患儿不仅是可以治疗的，而且可以将一些症状行为引导到积极的方面上。

sentences.english: Across the board, parents rated honey as significantly better than DM or no treatment for symptomatic relief of their child’s nighttime cough and sleep difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 通过选举，家长将蜂蜜评为比右美沙芬或无治疗对于减缓孩子夜间咳嗽和睡眠困难症状更有效的东西。

sentences.english: The cooperation of residents is good, house-to-house surveillance for febrile illness is continuing, and specimens have been taken from symptomatic persons and sent for testing.
sentences.chinese: 居民的合作良好，正在继续开展对发热疾病的挨家挨户监测，并且已从有症状的人那里采集标本和送去检测。

detailed_translations.english: showing that someone has a particular illness

name: allocate
trans: 分配， 分派， 把…拨给

sentences.english: Tickets are limited and will be allocated to those who apply first.
sentences.chinese: 票数有限，将分配给那些先申请的人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分配； 分派， 把…拨给
detailed_translations.english: to use something for a particular purpose, give something to a particular person etc, especially after an official decision has been made

sentences.english: A lot of people need a tonic at the end of the winter.
sentences.chinese: 很多人冬末需要进补。

detailed_translations.english: a drink that you have as a medicine to give you more energy or strength when you feel tired

detailed_translations.chinese: 滋补的；声调的；使精神振作的

sentences.english: The falling snow muffled the sound of our footsteps.
sentences.chinese: 飘落的雪使我们的脚步声变得低沉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 蒙住；裹住；抑制；发低沉的声音
detailed_translations.english: to cover yourself or another person with something thick and warm

detailed_translations.chinese: 低沉的声音；消声器；包裹物（如头巾，围巾等）；唇鼻部

sentences.english: ...a formal statement abjuring military action.
sentences.chinese: ...一个宣布撤回军事行动的正式声明。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发誓放弃；公开放弃；避免
detailed_translations.english: to state publicly that you will give up a particular belief or way of behaving

name: enterprise
trans: 工作； 事业， 企业； 事业心， 进取心， 冒险精神

sentences.english: state/public enterprise (=one owned by the government)
sentences.chinese: 国有企业/公共事业单位

sentences.english: We’re looking for young people with enterprise and creativity.
sentences.chinese: 我们在寻找有事业心和创造力的年轻人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 事业,企(事)业单位；事业心,进取心
detailed_translations.english: a company, organization, or business

sentences.english: a solar eclipse
sentences.chinese: 日食

detailed_translations.english: relating to the sun

name: dome
trans: 圆屋顶； 半球形物； 苍穹

sentences.english: ...the dome of the Capitol.
sentences.chinese: …国会大厦的穹顶。

detailed_translations.english: a round roof on a building

sentences.english: I was an English collegian and now I work as a sales manager in a testing lab.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名英语专业的学生，我现在已经是一家实验室的销售经理。

detailed_translations.chinese: 学院的学生；学院的一员
detailed_translations.english: a member of a college

name: benefactor
trans: 恩人； 捐助者； 赠送者； 赞助人

sentences.english: An anonymous benefactor donated $2 million.
sentences.chinese: 一位没留姓名的捐助人捐款二百万美元。

detailed_translations.english: someone who gives money for a good purpose

sentences.english: It pleased me to domineer over her, and she generally submitted to my tyranny rather than risk a hand-to-hand encounter.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢对她作威作福，而她通常宁可屈从我的专横，不愿冒著和我直接冲突的危险。

sentences.english: The murderer’s identity remains unknown.
sentences.chinese: 杀人凶手身份仍然不明。

sentences.english: For some unknown reason, Mark quit his job and moved to Greece.
sentences.chinese: 不知何故，马克辞掉工作移居希腊了。

sentences.english: a voyage through unknown territory
sentences.chinese: 穿越未知海域的航行

sentences.english: An unknown number of people were killed.
sentences.chinese: 丧生人数不详。

detailed_translations.english: not known about

sentences.english: two 13 amp fuses
sentences.chinese: 两根13安培的保险丝

sentences.english: I taught him how to change a fuse .
sentences.chinese: 我教他怎么换保险丝。

sentences.english: A bomb was deactivated at the last moment, after the fuse had been lit.
sentences.chinese: 一枚炸弹在导火线已被点燃后的最后一刻被解除。

sentences.english: The skull bones fuse between the ages of fifteen and twenty-five.
sentences.chinese: 颅骨在15和25岁之间长合。

detailed_translations.english: a short thin piece of wire inside electrical equipment which prevents damage by melting and stopping the electricity when there is too much power

detailed_translations.chinese: 结合; 融合; 熔合
detailed_translations.english: if electrical equipment fuses, or if you fuse it, it stops working because a fuse has melted

sentences.english: Typing is considered by most employers to be a basic competence.
sentences.chinese: 大多数雇主认为打字是一项基本技能。

detailed_translations.chinese: 能力，胜任；权限；作证能力；足以过舒适生活的收入
detailed_translations.english: the ability to do something well

sentences.english: I just decided I was a bit too frivolous to be a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 我只是认定自己有点儿太轻率，不适合当医生。

detailed_translations.english: If you describe someone as frivolous, you mean they behave in a silly or light-hearted way, rather than being serious and sensible

sentences.english: As Hume's options lay between a traveling tutorship and a stool in a merchant's office, he chose the latter.
sentences.chinese: 当休谟面对是成为家庭教师还是成为商人的职员这两个选择时，他最终选择了后者。

sentences.english: Its rather important to deal with the relationship among personal tutorship, students self-study and study-support service in open education.
sentences.chinese: 正确处理好开放教育中的面授辅导、学生自学、学习支持服务三者的关系至关重要。

sentences.english: He’ll phone on some pretext or other.
sentences.chinese: 他会以这样或那样的理由打电话的。

detailed_translations.english: a false reason given for an action, in order to hide the real reason

name: emergent
trans: 突现的； 意外的； 紧急的

sentences.english: Discovering these patterns is the key to emergent design.
sentences.chinese: 发现这些模式是紧急设计的关键。

sentences.english: The real trick in emergent design is discovering these patterns.
sentences.chinese: 紧急设计的真正诀窍就是发现这些模式。

name: homonym
trans: 同音异义字， 同名异物

detailed_translations.chinese: 同音异义词；同形异义词；同形同音异义词；同名异物
detailed_translations.english: a word that is spelled the same and sounds the same as another, but is different in meaning or origin. For example, the noun ‘bear’ and the verb ‘bear’ are homonyms.

sentences.english: Society undervalues staying at home and looking after children.
sentences.chinese: 社会低估了待在家里照看孩子的意义。

sentences.english: Analysts claim that the firm’s assets were undervalued by £300 million.
sentences.chinese: 分析员称公司资产被低估了三亿英镑。

detailed_translations.english: to think that someone or something is less important or valuable than they really are

sentences.english: He mixed chemicals in a test tube.
sentences.chinese: 他把化学药品混合在试管里。

sentences.english: There is a green residue in the bottom of the test tube.
sentences.chinese: 试管底部有绿色的沉淀物。

sentences.english: Since the birth of the first "test tube baby" in 1978, more than three million children have been born with the help of reproductive technology.
sentences.chinese: 自1978年首例试管婴儿出生以来，已有超过三百万的儿童在这种生殖技术的辅助下出生。

detailed_translations.english: a small glass container that is shaped like a tube and is used in chemistry

name: incisive
trans: 深刻的； 尖锐的； 激烈的

sentences.english: He is a very shrewd operator with an incisive mind.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位非常精明的经营者，有着敏锐的头脑。

detailed_translations.english: You use incisive to describe a person, their thoughts, or their speech when you approve of their ability to think and express their ideas clearly, briefly, and forcefully

sentences.english: Gradually, I acquired a rudimentary knowledge of music.
sentences.chinese: 我逐渐掌握了基本的音乐知识。

sentences.english: my rudimentary German
sentences.chinese: 我粗浅的德语

detailed_translations.chinese: 基本的；初步的；退化的；残遗的；未发展的
detailed_translations.english: a rudimentary knowledge or understanding of a subject is very simple and basic

name: precarious
trans: 不确定的， 不安全的； 靠不住的， 根据不充足的

sentences.english: Her health remained precarious, despite the treatment.
sentences.chinese: 她尽管接受了治疗，但健康状况还是不稳定。

sentences.english: the company’s precarious financial position
sentences.chinese: 公司岌岌可危的财务状况

detailed_translations.english: a precarious situation or state is one which may very easily or quickly become worse

sentences.english: Seeral of the findings in the paper indicate an extraordinary degree of heterogeneity in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 本篇文章中的许多结果都显示了脑中存在的一种特殊的异质性。

sentences.english: In tropical areas, larger plots have proved more useful due to greater heterogeneity of the forest.
sentences.chinese: 在热带地区，由于森林的异质性较大，已证实大一些的样地更有效。

sentences.english: Such political communities are characterized by heterogeneity and difference with no shared object of design.
sentences.chinese: 这样的政治共同体的特征是不会共享别人的设计的异质性和区别。

sentences.english: There is a capacitor in there.
sentences.chinese: 因为里面有一个电容器。

sentences.english: Part of this process involves applying an electric field to a dielectric material within the capacitor.
sentences.chinese: 这个过程中需要在电容器内的绝缘材料上施加一个电场。

sentences.english: However, in contrast to batteries, a capacitor cannot store enough energy to power anything that lasts longer than a flash -- some fraction of a second.
sentences.chinese: 但是，相比电池，电容器储存的能量不足以维持任何比闪光时间长的时间，而闪光时间还不足一秒。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that collects and stores electricity

sentences.english: ...pests like aphids which infest cereal crops.
sentences.chinese: …像蚜虫那样大肆侵害谷类作物的害虫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 骚扰；寄生于；大批出没；大批滋生
detailed_translations.english: if insects, rats etc infest a place, there are a lot of them and they usually cause damage

name: contemplation
trans: 注视； 沉思； 预期， 打算

sentences.english: The monks spend an hour in contemplation each morning.
sentences.chinese: 那些修道士每天早上默想一小时。

detailed_translations.english: quiet serious thinking about something

name: miff
trans: 发脾气， 微怒； 无谓的争吵

detailed_translations.english: a petulant mood

name: eternal
trans: 永恒的， 永远的； 不灭的； 不朽的

sentences.english: the Christian promise of eternal life
sentences.chinese: 基督教承诺的永生

sentences.english: She’s an eternal optimist (= she always expects that good things will happen ).
sentences.chinese: 她永远是个乐观主义者。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for ever and having no end

sentences.english: Little could be done to redress the situation .
sentences.chinese: 局势难以挽回。

sentences.english: Affirmative action was meant to redress the balance (= make the situation fair ) for minorities.
sentences.chinese: 反歧视行动旨在弥补对少数群体的不公平待遇。

detailed_translations.chinese: 救济；赔偿；纠正；重新调整
detailed_translations.english: to correct something that is wrong or unfair
money that someone pays you because they have caused you harm or damaged your property

sentences.english: an English-born man with Irish parentage
sentences.chinese: 出生于英格兰的爱尔兰裔男子

sentences.english: He was born in France in 1670 of unknown parentage (= nobody knows who his parents were ) .
sentences.chinese: 1670 年他出生于法国，家世不明。

detailed_translations.chinese: 出身；亲子关系；门第；起源
detailed_translations.english: someone’s parents and the country and social class they are from

sentences.english: Over the centuries, these animals have become habituated to living in a dry environment.
sentences.chinese: 几百年下来，这些动物已经习惯于生活在干燥的环境里。

detailed_translations.english: to be used to something or gradually become used to it

sentences.english: a man with plebeian tastes
sentences.chinese: 趣味庸俗的男人

detailed_translations.english: relating to ordinary people and what they like, rather than to people from a high social class – used to show disapproval
an insulting word for someone who is from a low social class

sentences.english: They throw out all of these behaviors randomly.
sentences.chinese: 它们的这些行为都是随机的。

sentences.english: It mimics a memory leak by randomly placing some of these arrays (~20% of them) into a list.
sentences.chinese: 它通过随机将这些数组的一部分（大约 20%）放入一个列表来模拟内存泄漏。

sentences.english: the prevalent belief in astrology
sentences.chinese: 对占星术的普遍相信

detailed_translations.english: common at a particular time, in a particular place, or among a particular group of people

sentences.english: the characteristic use of satire in Jonson’s work
sentences.chinese: 琼森作品中讽刺手法的独到运用

detailed_translations.chinese: 讽刺；讽刺文学，讽刺作品
detailed_translations.english: a way of criticizing something such as a group of people or a system, in which you deliberately make them seem funny so that people will see their faults

sentences.english: The vertical and horizontal motions of a projectile can be treated independently.
sentences.chinese: 抛射体的竖直方向和水平方向的运动能够分开来处理。

sentences.english: Single OR multiple gripper OR projectile looms, rapier looms, water jet looms and air jet looms.
sentences.chinese: 单片梭或多片梭织机，或抛射（片梭）织机；剑杆织机；喷水织机和喷气织机。

detailed_translations.english: an object that is thrown at someone or is fired from a gun or other weapon, such as a bullet, stone, or  shell

sentences.english: ...the sprightly 85-year-old president.
sentences.chinese: ...那位精力充沛的85岁总统。

detailed_translations.english: an old person who is sprightly is still active and full of energy – used to show approval

name: overpower
trans: 制服， 压倒； 供给…过强的力量

sentences.english: It took ten guardsmen to overpower him.
sentences.chinese: 动用了10个守卫才将他制服。

detailed_translations.english: If you overpower someone, you manage to take hold of and keep hold of them, although they struggle a lot

sentences.english: Let's just recapitulate the essential points.
sentences.chinese: 让我们只概述一下基本要点吧。

detailed_translations.english: to repeat the main points of something that has just been said

name: alliance
trans: 结盟， 联盟； 联姻

sentences.english: independent organizations and alliances
sentences.chinese: 独立组织和联盟

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement in which two or more countries, groups etc agree to work together to try to change or achieve something

name: invaluable
trans: 非常宝贵的， 无价的

sentences.english: The internet is an invaluable source of information.
sentences.chinese: 因特网是十分有价值的信息来源。

detailed_translations.chinese: 非常宝贵的， 极为贵重的， 无价的
detailed_translations.english: extremely useful

sentences.english: Jesse was an outlaw, a bandit, a criminal.
sentences.chinese: 杰西曾是个逃犯、土匪、罪犯。

sentences.english: In some states gambling was outlawed.
sentences.chinese: 在一些州赌博被宣布为非法。

sentences.english: The German government has outlawed some fascist groups.
sentences.chinese: 德国政府已宣布一些法西斯团体为非法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 歹徒；罪犯；亡命之徒；被剥夺法律保护者
detailed_translations.english: someone who has done something illegal, and who is hiding in order to avoid punishment – used especially about criminals in the past

detailed_translations.chinese: 宣布…为不合法；将…放逐；剥夺…的法律保护
detailed_translations.english: When something is outlawed, it is made illegal

name: omniscient
trans: 全知的， 无所不知的

sentences.english: the book’s omniscient narrator
sentences.chinese: 本书中全知全能的叙事者

detailed_translations.english: knowing everything

sentences.english: The leaves change colour, then shrivel.
sentences.chinese: 树叶变了颜色，然后干枯了。

detailed_translations.english: if something shrivels, or if it is shrivelled, it becomes smaller and its surface becomes covered in lines because it is very dry or old

sentences.english: a social solecism
sentences.chinese: 社交上的失礼

detailed_translations.chinese: 语法错误，文理不通；谬误，失礼
detailed_translations.english: a mistake in the use of written or spoken language

sentences.english: What does the word ‘curriculum’ denote that ‘course’ does not?
sentences.chinese: curriculum一词的哪些含义是course没有的？

detailed_translations.english: to mean something

sentences.english: ...flags bedecking the balcony.
sentences.chinese: ... 装饰阳台的旗子。

detailed_translations.english: to decorate something such as a building or street by hanging things all over it

sentences.english: a celebrated actress
sentences.chinese: 著名女演员

sentences.english: a celebrated legal case
sentences.chinese: 一宗备受关注的官司

detailed_translations.english: famous

detailed_translations.chinese: 庆祝（celebrate的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: His voice was barely audible (=  could only just be heard  ) above the roar of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 人声嘈杂，几乎听不见他的说话声。

detailed_translations.english: a sound that is audible is loud enough for you to hear it

sentences.english: The group launched a website to propagate its ideas.
sentences.chinese: 这个团体建了一个网站来宣扬他们的主张。

sentences.english: The plant can be propagated from seed.
sentences.chinese: 这种植物可由种子繁殖。

detailed_translations.english: to spread an idea, belief etc to many people

sentences.english: Are you interested in world affairs?
sentences.chinese: 你对世界大事感兴趣吗？

sentences.english: the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
sentences.chinese: 外交部

sentences.english: Women had little role in public affairs.
sentences.chinese: 女性过去几乎不参与公共事务。

sentences.english: the Watergate affair
sentences.chinese: 水门事件

sentences.english: He had an affair with his boss that lasted six years.
sentences.chinese: 他和老板的暧昧关系持续了六年。

detailed_translations.english: public or political events and activities

sentences.english: You can prepare as much as you like and amass material galore, but unless you come in fresh, like an athlete onto the track, you aren’t going to do the job required.
sentences.chinese: 只要你喜欢，你可以尽量准备、丰富材料，但只有像运动员一样新鲜地走上跑道，你才能保证自己完成工作。

detailed_translations.english: in large amounts or numbers

sentences.english: ...the mighty sea power of the Anglo-Saxons.
sentences.chinese: ...盎格鲁撒克逊人的强大海权。

sentences.english: ...the grave of an early Anglo-Saxon king.
sentences.chinese: ...一位早期盎格鲁撒克逊国王的坟墓。

detailed_translations.english: someone who belonged to the race of people who lived in England from about 600 AD
The Anglo-Saxon period is the period of English history from the fifth century AD to the Norman Conquest in 1066

name: orthodox
trans: 传统的， 符合社会风俗的； 正统的

sentences.english: orthodox medical treatments
sentences.chinese: 传统疗法

sentences.english: He challenged the orthodox views on education.
sentences.chinese: 他对传统的教育观念提出了质疑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 正统的；传统的；惯常的；东正教的
detailed_translations.english: orthodox ideas, methods, or behaviour are accepted by most people to be correct and right

sentences.english: The pans were in their accustomed places.
sentences.chinese: 那些锅在老地方。

detailed_translations.english: usual

name: maverick
trans: 未烙印的小牛  ； 不服从的人

sentences.english: He’s always been a bit of a maverick.
sentences.chinese: 他总是有点特立独行。

detailed_translations.english: relating to plants or the scientific study of plants

sentences.english: In Lavengro (or is it Romany Rye?) there is an impossible character, a victim of insomnia, who finds that a volume of Wordsworth's poems is the only sure soporific; but that was Borrow s malice.
sentences.chinese: 在《拉文格罗》（或者是《吉卜赛男人》）一书中有一个无可救药的人，患有失眠症，他发现华尔华斯的一卷诗集是惟一有效的催眠剂，但那只不过是伯罗的恶作剧而已。

sentences.chinese: 她笑起来像个天使，但脾气很可怕。

detailed_translations.chinese: 天使的；似天使的；天国的

sentences.english: The hall has excellent acoustics.

trans: 离奇出现的东西；  鬼怪， 幻影

sentences.chinese: 他盯着面前那个古怪的幽灵。

sentences.english: Such schemes mean little unless they impact people.
sentences.chinese: 除非能对人们造成影响，否则这样的计划意义不大。

to write or give a short description of someone or something

sentences.chinese: 他们被控骗取投资者数百万美元。

sentences.chinese: 铁元素从血红素中释放出来，要么转化为巨噬细胞中的铁蛋白或含铁血黄素，或通过血液循环回流进入骨髓。

sentences.chinese: 用核微拭子、X 线微量分析和原子吸收光谱法对巨噬细胞包涵体的化学性质进行分析，发现其含有铝盐。

trans: 赞美， 称赞， 颂词

trans: 半岛  的； 半岛的

sentences.chinese: 在越南首都河内举行的东南亚外交部长会议上将讨论朝鲜半岛的紧张局势和缅甸有计划的选举。

detailed_translations.chinese: 半岛  的； 半岛的

sentences.english: They are mixed with animal glue and ox bile to make the lustre stay.
sentences.chinese: 画师把它们跟动物胶和牛胆汁混合，以使颜色的光泽长存。

sentences.chinese: 接着在二月里一个下午，她单独呆在卧室里，够到那本教科书，她的心蹦蹦跳起来，嘴里冲满花生奶油味道的胆汁。

sentences.chinese: 自从那一天，我曾考虑成为重婚行为。

detailed_translations.english: A bigamist is a person who commits the crime of marrying someone when they are already legally married to someone else

trans: 领域， 范围； 领土， 领地

sentences.english: Article39 Where a registered trademark is assigned, the assignor and assignee shall conclude a contract for the assignment, and jointly file an application with the trademark Office.
sentences.chinese: 第三十九条转让注册商标的，转让人和受让人应当签订转让协议，并共同向商标局提出申请。

sentences.chinese: 以多元文化为特色的国家

sentences.chinese: 他收到了微不足道的100美元年金。

name: transparent
trans: 透明的； 显然的， 明显的； 清楚的， 易懂的

sentences.chinese: 透明的塑料容器

sentences.english: Am I that transparent (= are my intentions that obvious) ?

name: academician

sentences.chinese: 我是我们家第一个大学生。

detailed_translations.english: a member of an official organization which encourages the development of literature, art, science etc

sentences.chinese: 不要自夸和虚张声势。

sentences.english: It is not in good form to brag of your learning.
sentences.chinese: 吹嘘自己的学识是欠妥的。

sentences.english: These are the people that have every right to brag and maybe be a bit arrogant, yet they remain humble.
sentences.chinese: 这些人有理由吹嘘自己的成功，甚至理应有点自傲，但是他们仍然保持着低调的作风。

sentences.english: Teachers often feel overworked in term time (= during the term ) .
sentences.chinese: 教师在学期内经常觉得工作担子过重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 术语；学期；期限；条款；(代数式等的)项

to use a particular word or expression to name or describe something

sentences.english: In participating in daily activity to make them can independent, be necessary to establish brae channel beside stair and elevatory floor, place auxiliary stand in proper place.
sentences.chinese: 为让他们能独立参与到日常活动中，有必要在楼梯及升高的地板旁设斜坡通道，并在适当地点放置辅助支架。

detailed_translations.english: a hill or hillside; slope

sentences.english: the acquisition of language
sentences.chinese: 语言的习得

detailed_translations.english: the process by which you gain knowledge or learn a skill

sentences.english: I suppose the shock had addled his poor old brain.
sentences.chinese: 我想这个打击已经使他可怜的老脑筋变糊涂了。

detailed_translations.english: to confuse someone so they cannot think properly

sentences.english: The day after that, the emergence of a new competitor.
sentences.chinese: 今后的每一天都可能出现新的竞争对手。

sentences.english: Language emerges and develops with the emergence and development of society.
sentences.chinese: 语言是随着社会的产生而产生，随着社会的发展而发展的。

sentences.english: They prefer to wait for the emergence of a new physics theory of everything.
sentences.chinese: 他们更倾向于等待新的可以解释一切的理论的出现.

detailed_translations.english: when something begins to be known or noticed

trans: 到来， 来临， 出现

sentences.chinese: 计算机的问世
