trans: 鼓舞， 感动， 激发， 启示， 使生灵感； 吸入

sentences.english: We need someone who can inspire the team.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一个能鼓舞团队士气的人。

sentences.english: Inspired by the sunny weather, I decided to explore the woods.
sentences.chinese: 阳光明媚的天气令人振奋，我决定到森林里寻幽探胜。

sentences.english: The story was inspired by a chance meeting with an old Russian duke.
sentences.chinese: 这个故事的创作灵感来自与一位俄国老公爵的不期而遇。

detailed_translations.english: to encourage someone by making them feel confident and eager to do something

name: bureaucracy
trans: 官僚； 官僚主义； 行政系统

sentences.english: the reduction of unnecessary bureaucracy
sentences.chinese: 消除不必要的官僚体制

detailed_translations.english: a complicated official system that is annoying or confusing because it has a lot of rules, processes etc

sentences.english: the very ordered way in which mathematics and geometry describe nature
sentences.chinese: 数学和几何学描述自然的条理性

detailed_translations.english: the study in  mathematics  of the angles and shapes formed by the relationships of lines, surfaces, and solid objects in space

name: overwork
trans: 过于繁重的工作；过分劳累

sentences.english: You’ve been overworking – why don’t you take a week off?
sentences.chinese: 你最近在超强度工作——为什么不休息一周呢？

sentences.english: Have they been overworking you again?
sentences.chinese: 他们又让你超负荷工作了？

detailed_translations.english: to work too much or to make someone work too much
too much hard work

sentences.english: The Navy also plans to buy additional submarines, including nuclear subs, and Landing Dock Platform ships for littoral warfare.
sentences.chinese: 此外，印度海军还计划再购买一些潜艇（其中包括核潜艇）以及登陆舰用于滨海作战。

sentences.english: The aircraft is designed to provide battle-group protection and add significant capability during coastal, littoral and regional conflicts.
sentences.chinese: 这种飞机为战场提供地面防护，并显著增强了在沿海、滨海和区域冲突中的能力。

detailed_translations.english: an area near the coast
something that nourishes or sustains the body or mind

name: odious
trans: 令人作呕的， 令人讨厌的

sentences.english: an odious little man
sentences.chinese: 讨厌的小男人

detailed_translations.english: extremely unpleasant

sentences.english: In some recent years, law students who apply to clerk for federal appellate judges were hired almost two years before they would graduate and begin work.
sentences.chinese: 近些年来，早在毕业和开始工作的几乎二年前，申请成为联邦上诉法官的职员的法律系学生就已被雇佣了。

sentences.english: Other federal appellate courts have agreed with the government that one has no expectation of privacy in activity open to public view on city streets.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，其他几个联邦上诉法院却同意政府的意见，说任何个人在城市道路上活动即是对公众公开，因此不能指望享有隐私权。

detailed_translations.english: of or relating to appeals

name: trepidation
trans: 颤抖， 惊恐， 恐惧

sentences.english: With some trepidation, I opened the door.
sentences.chinese: 我有些惴惴不安地打开了门。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of anxiety or fear about something that is going to happen

sentences.english: The book includes a chronology of his life and works.
sentences.chinese: 本书附有他的生平和著作年表。

detailed_translations.english: an account of events in the order in which they happened

sentences.english: He presses the bolt against a small hexagon tattooed on his forearm. The sizes match.
sentences.chinese: 他将螺钉与他前臂的一个小六边形纹身比了比，尺寸是一样的。

detailed_translations.english: a shape with six sides

name: eclectic
trans: 折中的； 博采众长的

sentences.english: But they are the tip of an eclectic iceberg in the country.
sentences.chinese: 其实这只不过是折衷主义在这个国家表现出来的冰山一角。

sentences.english: One of my (several) frustrations in life is the eclectic way the word “science” is used in human discourse.
sentences.chinese: 我在生活中遇到的挫折之一，是试图改变人类在使用“科学”一词时的折衷的态度。

sentences.english: At the same time, countless of Jazz clubs, discotheques and the endless music from open air beer garden even made the OrdRoad turn into a popular gathering location for eclectic today.
sentences.chinese: 同时不计其数的爵士俱乐部，迪斯科舞厅和露天啤酒花园的无休止的音乐也使乌节路成为了今天折中主义者聚集的场所。

name: affectation
trans: 假装， 虚饰， 做作

sentences.english: Calling everyone ‘darling’ is just an affectation.
sentences.chinese: 逢人就叫“亲爱的”很做作。

detailed_translations.english: a way of behaving, speaking etc that is not sincere or natural

sentences.english: Ferraro was the first woman to be nominated for the job of vice president.
sentences.chinese: 费拉罗是第一位获得副总统职位提名的女性。

sentences.english: Next year Mr Jenks will retire and Mr Broadbent will be nominated as his replacement.
sentences.chinese: 明年詹克斯先生退休，布罗德本特先生将获任命接替他的职位。

detailed_translations.english: to officially suggest someone or something for an important position, duty, or prize

sentences.english: Tax increases now might imperil economic recovery.
sentences.chinese: 目前提高税收可能会危及经济的复苏。

detailed_translations.english: to put something or someone in danger

sentences.english: Draw a circle six centimetres in diameter.
sentences.chinese: 画一个直径为六厘米的圆。

detailed_translations.english: a straight line from one side of a circle to the other side, passing through the centre of the circle, or the length of this line

sentences.english: How did you manage to drive into a stationary vehicle?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎么开车的，竟会撞上一辆停着的车子？

detailed_translations.chinese: 固定的， 静止不动的
detailed_translations.english: standing still instead of moving

sentences.english: He looped the rope over the wood.
sentences.chinese: 他把绳子打了环系在木头上。

detailed_translations.english: to fly a plane up and around in a circle so that the plane is  upside down  for a time
a shape like a curve or a circle made by a line curving back towards itself, or a piece of wire, string etc that has this shape

name: greedy
trans: 贪食的； 贪婪的； 渴望的

sentences.english: a greedy and selfish society
sentences.chinese: 一个贪婪自私的社会

sentences.english: He looked at the gold with greedy eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他贪婪地看着这些金子。

sentences.english: Have you eaten them all, you greedy pig?
sentences.chinese: 你把那些全吃了？你这贪吃的猪！

detailed_translations.english: always wanting more food, money, power, possessions etc than you need

name: loot
trans: 掠夺， 抢劫， 劫掠

sentences.english: Shops were looted and burned.
sentences.chinese: 商店遭到抢劫和焚毁。

detailed_translations.english: goods taken by soldiers from a place where they have won a battle
to steal things, especially from shops or homes that have been damaged in a war or  riot

sentences.english: Both governments voted to abrogate the treaty.
sentences.chinese: 两国政府均投票通过废除这项条约。

detailed_translations.english: to officially end a legal agreement, practice etc

name: formidable
trans: 可怕的， 令人畏惧的； 难以克服的， 难对付的

sentences.english: The building is grey, formidable, not at all picturesque.
sentences.chinese: 那幢建筑呈灰色，气势凛然，与漂亮沾不上边。

sentences.english: The new range of computers have formidable processing power.
sentences.chinese: 该系列的新型计算机处理能力惊人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可怕的；令人敬畏的，令人惊叹的
detailed_translations.english: very powerful or impressive, and often frightening

sentences.english: She sold me a couple of live lobsters.
sentences.chinese: 她卖给了我几只活龙虾。

detailed_translations.english: a sea animal with eight legs, a shell, and two large claws

sentences.english: The public is willing to forgive him for his peccadillos.
sentences.chinese: 公众愿意原谅他的小过失。

detailed_translations.english: something bad which someone does, especially involving sex, which is not regarded as very serious or important

name: seedy
trans: 多籽的， 结籽的； 低级的

sentences.english: a seedy nightclub
sentences.chinese: 一家乌烟瘴气的夜总会

detailed_translations.chinese: 多种子的；结籽的；破烂的；没精打采的；下流的

sentences.english: The achievements and the remaining problems of the nucleon structure and nuclear force are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 评述了核子结构和核力研究取得的成就及存在的问题。

sentences.english: This might be caused by nuclear deformation and nucleon pair effect, and the experimental inaccuracy should not be neglected.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是核形变及核子对效应造成的，试验中的测量误差也不可忽视。

sentences.english: Events recorded by the ALICE experiment from the first lead ion collisions at a centre-of-mass energy of 2.76 TeV per nucleon pair. (CERN LHC Alice Detector)
sentences.chinese: 图为欧洲核子研究中心的Alice探测器记录下的当 核子对 在中心物质能量为2.76电子伏下的首次铅离子碰撞试验

detailed_translations.english: a proton or neutron, esp one present in an atomic nucleus

sentences.english: I was overcome with a feeling of nausea.
sentences.chinese: 我感到一阵恶心。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you have when you think you are going to vomit (= bring food up from your stomach through your mouth )

sentences.english: All decisions would require unanimity.
sentences.chinese: 所有决定都需要全体一致同意。

detailed_translations.english: a state or situation of complete agreement among a group of people

name: assurance
trans: 确信， 断言； 保证， 担保

sentences.english: Despite my repeated assurances, Rob still looked very nervous.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我再三保证，罗布看起来还是很紧张。

detailed_translations.english: a promise that something will definitely happen or is definitely true, made especially to make someone less worried

sentences.english: His intercession could be of help to the tribe.
sentences.chinese: 他的调解会对该部落有帮助。

detailed_translations.english: when someone talks to a person in authority in order to prevent something bad happening to someone else

sentences.english: This decision should not be seen as immutable.
sentences.chinese: 不该把这个决定看成是不可改变的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不变的；不可变的；不能变的
detailed_translations.english: never changing or impossible to change

name: temperate
trans: 温和的， 温带的； 自制的

sentences.english: The Nile Valley keeps a temperate climate throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 尼罗河流域全年气候温和。

detailed_translations.chinese: 温和的；适度的；有节制的
detailed_translations.english: behaviour that is temperate is calm and sensible

name: disrupt
trans: 使分裂， 使瓦解， 破坏； 使陷于混乱； 使中断

sentences.english: Traffic was disrupted by a hoax bomb.
sentences.chinese: 有人虚报有炸弹，造成了交通混乱。

sentences.english: Climate change could disrupt the agricultural economy.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化可能给农业经济带来不良影响。

detailed_translations.english: to prevent something from continuing in its usual way by causing problems

sentences.english: His hands were badly scarred by the fire.
sentences.chinese: 他的双手被那次大火烧得疤痕累累。

sentences.english: She will probably be scarred for life .
sentences.chinese: 她有可能留下永久的疤痕。

detailed_translations.english: if a wound or cut scars you, it leaves a permanent mark on your body
a permanent mark that is left on your skin after you have had a cut or wound

sentences.english: In 8pq, the coefficient of pq is 8.
sentences.chinese: 在8pq中pq的系数为8。

detailed_translations.english: the number by which an unknown quantity is multiplied

name: carnal
trans: 肉体的； 肉欲的， 性欲的， 色欲的； 淫荡的

sentences.english: carnal desires
sentences.chinese: 肉欲

detailed_translations.chinese: 肉体的；肉欲的；淫荡的；性欲的
detailed_translations.english: relating to sex or someone’s body

name: eccentric
trans: 古怪的， 怪癖的， 异乎寻常的

sentences.english: His eccentric behaviour lost him his job.
sentences.chinese: 他古怪的行为使他丢了工作。

sentences.english: Aunt Nessy was always a bit eccentric.
sentences.chinese: 内西姑妈总是有点古怪。

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a way that is unusual and different from most people
someone who behaves in a way that is different from what is usual or socially accepted

name: callow
trans: 年轻而无经验的；  未生羽毛的

sentences.english: ...a callow youth.
sentences.chinese: ...一个羽翼未丰的年轻人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 年轻而无经验的；羽毛未丰的
detailed_translations.english: A callow young person has very little experience or knowledge of the way they should behave as an adult

name: defer
trans: 推迟， 延期； 听从， 服从

sentences.english: The committee deferred their decision .
sentences.chinese: 委员会延期作出决定。

detailed_translations.english: to delay something until a later date

sentences.english: Brass is an alloy of copper and zinc.
sentences.chinese: 黄铜是铜和锌的合金。

detailed_translations.english: to mix one metal with another
a metal that consists of two or more metals mixed together

sentences.english: The drug can make you drowsy.
sentences.chinese: 这种药会让人昏昏欲睡。

detailed_translations.chinese: 昏昏欲睡的；沉寂的；催眠的
detailed_translations.english: tired and almost asleep

sentences.english: a mass protest
sentences.chinese: 大规模的抗议

sentences.english: weapons of mass destruction
sentences.chinese: 大规模杀伤性武器

sentences.english: the problem of mass unemployment
sentences.chinese: 大批人失业的问题

detailed_translations.english: involving or intended for a very large number of people
to come together, or to make people or things come together, in a large group

detailed_translations.chinese: 众多，大量；团，块，堆；群众；质量
detailed_translations.english: a large crowd

name: revoke
trans: 撤回； 废除， 宣告无效

sentences.english: Their work permits have been revoked.
sentences.chinese: 他们的工作许可证被吊销了。

detailed_translations.english: to officially state that a law, decision, or agreement is no longer effective

name: renaissance
trans: 复兴， 复活， 新生； 文艺复兴， 文艺复兴时期

sentences.english: ...the Renaissance masterpieces in London's galleries.
sentences.chinese: …伦敦美术馆里文艺复兴时期的杰作。

detailed_translations.english: a new interest in something, especially a particular form of art, music etc, that has not been popular for a long period

sentences.english: Marx never lost an opportunity to castigate colonialism.
sentences.chinese: 马克思从不放过任何谴责殖民主义的机会。

detailed_translations.english: to criticize or punish someone severely

sentences.english: In jurisprudence it is a well-known principle that justice should not merely be done but should also be seen to be done.
sentences.chinese: 在法理学方面，人所共知的原则是：对受害者不仅应该公正对待，而且应当让人们看到他得到了公正的对待。

sentences.english: As a separate science of law, health jurisprudence should have its own theoretical system.
sentences.chinese: 作为独立的法学学科，卫生法学应形成公认的理论体系。

detailed_translations.english: the science or study of law

name: vegetable
trans: 蔬菜； 生活呆板、 单调的人

sentences.english: fresh fruit and vegetables
sentences.chinese: 新鲜果蔬

sentences.english: organic methods of growing vegetables
sentences.chinese: 蔬菜的有机种植方法

sentences.english: vegetable soup
sentences.chinese: 蔬菜汤

sentences.english: a neat vegetable garden
sentences.chinese: 整洁的菜园

sentences.english: Vitamin A is found in liver and green vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 动物肝脏和绿色蔬菜中含有维生素A。

detailed_translations.english: a plant that is eaten raw or cooked, such as a cabbage, a carrot, or peas
relating to plants in general, rather than animals or things that are not living

sentences.english: It’s despicable the way he treats those kids.
sentences.chinese: 他那样对待那些孩子，真卑鄙。

sentences.english: a despicable act of terrorism
sentences.chinese: 卑劣的恐怖主义行径

sentences.english: a despicable crime
sentences.chinese: 卑鄙的罪行

detailed_translations.english: extremely bad, immoral, or cruel

sentences.english: They were portrayed as contemptible cowards.
sentences.chinese: 他们被刻画成可鄙的胆小鬼。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可鄙的；卑劣的；可轻视的
detailed_translations.english: not deserving any respect at all

sentences.english: I got caught speeding on the A40 yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我在 A40 号干线公路上超速行驶被逮到。

detailed_translations.chinese: 飞驰，迅速前进，急行；加速；超速行驶
detailed_translations.english: to be driving faster than the legal limit
the rate at which something moves or travels

detailed_translations.chinese: 快速传送； 促进， 使加速
detailed_translations.english: to take someone or something somewhere very quickly

name: gesture
trans: 姿势， 姿态， 手势

sentences.english: Jim raised his hands in a despairing gesture.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆举起双手，做出绝望的手势。

sentences.english: The Queen has now made a gesture towards public opinion.
sentences.chinese: 女王现在摆出了尊重民意的姿态。

detailed_translations.english: a movement of part of your body, especially your hands or head, to show what you mean or how you feel

sentences.english: The seats are allotted to the candidates who have won the most votes.
sentences.chinese: 这些席位被分配给了赢得了最多选票的候选人。

detailed_translations.english: to use a particular amount of time for something, or give a particular share of money, space etc to someone or something

detailed_translations.chinese: (Allot)人名；(英)阿洛特；(西)阿略特；(法)阿洛

name: propel
trans: 推进， 推动； 激励， 驱使

sentences.english: a boat propelled by a small motor
sentences.chinese: 由小马达驱动的小船

sentences.english: One of our students was unable to propel her wheelchair up the ramp.
sentences.chinese: 我们有名学生无法把她的轮椅推上坡道。

detailed_translations.english: to move, drive, or push something forward

sentences.english: In case of urgency, call the police.
sentences.chinese: 一旦发生紧急情况，打电话给警察。

sentences.english: I appreciate the sense of urgency because I feel it myself.
sentences.chinese: 我欣赏这种紧迫的感觉因为我自己就能体会到。

sentences.english: However pressing the need and urgency of the problem one should not proceed without a plausible plan.
sentences.chinese: 无论需要多么紧迫，问题多么紧急，一个人不能没有看似有理的计划就开始行动。

name: rampant
trans: 猖獗的； 蔓生的； 猛烈的， 狂暴的

sentences.english: Pickpocketing is rampant in the downtown area.
sentences.chinese: 闹市区扒窃活动猖獗。

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["rampant inflation"]}
sentences.chinese: 失控的通货膨胀

detailed_translations.chinese: 猖獗的；蔓延的；狂暴的；奔放的
detailed_translations.english: if something bad, such as crime or disease, is rampant, there is a lot of it and it is very difficult to control

sentences.english: Goldring booked a berth on the first boat he could.
sentences.chinese: 戈德林在第一艘他能订到卧铺的船上订了个位子。

detailed_translations.english: a place where a ship can stop and be tied up
to bring a ship into a berth, or arrive at a berth

sentences.english: He went backstage and asked for her autograph.
sentences.chinese: 他到后台去请她签名。

detailed_translations.english: In a theatre, backstage refers to the areas behind the stage

sentences.english: Organic farming is better for the environment.
sentences.chinese: 有机耕作对环境更有利。

sentences.english: organic gardening
sentences.chinese: 有机园艺

detailed_translations.english: relating to farming or gardening methods of growing food without using artificial chemicals, or produced or grown by these methods

sentences.english: The prologue to the novel is written in the form of a newspaper account.
sentences.chinese: 该小说的前言是以新闻报道的形式写的。

detailed_translations.english: the introduction to a play, a long poem etc

sentences.english: a surgical face mask
sentences.chinese: 外科手术口罩

sentences.english: He was attacked and robbed by two people wearing masks .
sentences.chinese: 他被两个蒙面人袭击并抢劫。

detailed_translations.english: something that covers all or part of your face, to protect or to hide it
if a smell, taste, sound etc is masked by a stronger one, it cannot be noticed because of the stronger one

name: chaste
trans: 贞洁的； 有道德的； 朴素的

sentences.english: She led a chaste decent life.
sentences.chinese: 她过着贞洁正派的生活。

detailed_translations.chinese: 纯洁的；贞洁的；有道德的；朴素的
detailed_translations.english: not having sex with anyone, or not with anyone except your husband or wife

name: unaffected
trans: 不矫揉造作的， 自然的； 未受影响的

sentences.english: her easy unaffected manner
sentences.chinese: 她那从容而自然的举止

detailed_translations.chinese: 不受影响的；自然的；真挚的；不矫揉造作的
detailed_translations.english: not changed or influenced by something

name: autumnal
trans: 秋的， 秋天的； 已过中年的

sentences.english: autumnal colours
sentences.chinese: 秋天的色彩

detailed_translations.english: relating to or typical of autumn

name: unctuous
trans: 油脂的； 塑性的； 假装虔诚的， 假殷勤的

sentences.english: ...the kind of unctuous tone that I've heard often at diplomatic parties.
sentences.chinese: ...我在外交聚会上经常听到的那种虚情假意的腔调。

detailed_translations.chinese: 油质的；虚情假意的；油腔滑调的
detailed_translations.english: If you describe someone as unctuous, you are critical of them because they seem to be full of praise, kindness, or interest, but are obviously insincere

sentences.chinese: 汤米：我刚才打扫鸟笼来着，金丝雀不见了。

sentences.english: Your software project might have its own kind of pit canary.
sentences.chinese: 您的软件项目也可以有自己的矿井金丝雀。

sentences.english: Look for some petal earth tones like canary yellow and light natural shades like aqua! There will be soon a dramatic transformation in your wedding that soon forms a fab.
sentences.chinese: 不妨寻找一些如金丝雀黄或如水流动的天然亮色作为裙摆的颜色，这将会使你的婚礼有一个充满戏剧性的出人意料的改变！

detailed_translations.english: a small yellow bird that people often keep as a pet

sentences.english: the cubic capacity of an engine
sentences.chinese: 引擎汽缸的容积

detailed_translations.english: relating to a measurement of space which is calculated by multiplying the length of something by its width and height

name: barbarian
trans: 粗鲁无礼的； 野蛮的

sentences.english: We need to fight this barbarian attitude to science.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要向这种对待科学的野蛮态度作斗争。

detailed_translations.english: Barbarian is also an adjective
someone from a different tribe or land, who people believe to be wild and not  civilized

sentences.english: Keep it simple and avoid the use of jargon.
sentences.chinese: 简单点，避免使用术语。

detailed_translations.english: words and expressions used in a particular profession or by a particular group of people, which are difficult for other people to understand – often used to show disapproval

sentences.english: Anaesthetics and bottle feeding were popular in the early postwar years.
sentences.chinese: 麻醉药和奶瓶喂养在战后早些年代非常流行。

detailed_translations.english: Postwar is used to describe things that happened, existed, or were made in the period immediately after a war, especially World War II, 1939-45

name: overlook
trans: 看漏， 忽略； 俯瞰， 眺望； 宽容， 放任

sentences.english: Our room overlooks the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 我们的房间可以俯视大海。

sentences.english: It is easy to overlook a small detail like that.
sentences.chinese: 那样的小细节很容易被忽略。

sentences.english: She found him entertaining enough to overlook his faults.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得他很有趣，足以让她包容他的缺点。

detailed_translations.english: if a house, room etc overlooks something, it has a view of it, usually from above

name: ethereal
trans: 飘逸的； 天上的， 超凡的

sentences.english: ethereal beauty
sentences.chinese: 超凡的美丽

sentences.english: His music is ethereal.
sentences.chinese: 他的音乐超凡脱俗。

detailed_translations.chinese: 优雅的；轻飘的；缥缈的；超凡的
detailed_translations.english: very delicate and light, in a way that does not seem real

sentences.english: Might I your scribe and your confessor be.
sentences.chinese: 我可以你和你的忏悔神父是抄写员。

sentences.english: I stepped out of his office and was brought to a small window near the exit, behind which sat a scribe who I knew must be a prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 我走出他的办公室，被带到监狱出口处的一个小窗户边。窗后坐着一个抄写员，我知道他肯定是个囚徒。

detailed_translations.english: someone in the past whose job was to make written copies of official documents

name: concoct
trans: 调制， 调和； 编造

sentences.english: John concocted an elaborate excuse for being late.
sentences.chinese: 约翰为迟到编了一个巧妙的借口。

detailed_translations.chinese: 捏造；混合而制；调合；图谋
detailed_translations.english: to invent a clever story, excuse, or plan, especially in order to deceive someone

name: bass
trans: 低音部；男低音；低音乐器

sentences.english: The band features Johnson on bass (=  playing the bass guitar  ) .
sentences.chinese: 这支乐队由约翰逊弹奏低音吉他。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鲈鱼；男低音；低音部；椴树
detailed_translations.english: a very low male singing voice, or a man with a voice like this
a bass instrument or voice produces low notes

name: bask
trans: 晒太阳  ； 感到温暖、 愉快或舒适

sentences.english: All through the hot, still days of their holiday Amy basked in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 在整个炎热、寂静的假期里埃米都在晒太阳。

detailed_translations.chinese: 晒太阳；取暖；愉快或舒适
detailed_translations.english: to enjoy sitting or lying in the heat of the sun or a fire

sentences.english: We’re still searching for a peace formula.
sentences.chinese: 我们仍在寻找和平方案。

sentences.english: There is no magic formula (= a method that is certain to be successful ) that will transform sorrow into happiness.
sentences.chinese: 没有妙方可以化悲为喜。

sentences.english: With viewing figures up a million, the programme has a winning formula .
sentences.chinese: 收视人数增加了一百万，这个节目的确拥有吸引观众的法宝。

sentences.english: the formula for calculating distance
sentences.chinese: 计算距离的公式

detailed_translations.english: a series of numbers or letters that represent a mathematical or scientific rule

sentences.english: Just after the avalanche.
sentences.chinese: 就在这雪崩后不久。

sentences.english: But what if the avalanche happened?
sentences.chinese: 不过，要是发生雪崩怎么办呢？

sentences.english: If the value was much lower than one, on the other hand, the avalanche would soon die out.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，如果结果是一个比一小很多的数字，那么雪崩很快就会停止。

detailed_translations.english: a large mass of snow, ice, and rocks that falls down the side of a mountain

name: temperance
trans: 节制； 戒酒， 禁酒

sentences.english: ...a reformed alcoholic extolling the joys of temperance.
sentences.chinese: ...一个已戒掉酒瘾的人对戒酒的好处赞不绝口。

detailed_translations.chinese: 戒酒；节欲；（气候等的）温和
detailed_translations.english: when someone never drinks alcohol because of their moral or religious beliefs

name: tribute
trans: 贡品； 颂词， 称赞；  礼物

sentences.english: The players wore black armbands as a tribute to their late teammate.
sentences.chinese: 球员们戴着黑纱悼念已故的队友。

sentences.english: I’d like to pay tribute to (= praise and admire publicly ) the party workers for all their hard work.
sentences.chinese: 我谨向党内工作人员致敬，感谢他们的辛苦努力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 礼物；[税收] 贡物；颂词；（尤指对死者的）致敬，悼念，吊唁礼物
detailed_translations.english: something that you say, do, or give in order to express your respect or admiration for someone

sentences.english: India has a good scientific research base.
sentences.chinese: 印度有良好的科研基础。

detailed_translations.english: the most important part of something, from which new ideas develop
not having good moral principles
to have your main place of work, business etc in a particular place

name: endanger
trans: 使遭到危险， 危及， 危害

sentences.english: Smoking during pregnancy endangers your baby’s life.
sentences.chinese: 孕期吸烟会危及胎儿生命。

detailed_translations.english: to put someone or something in danger of being hurt, damaged, or destroyed

name: oblique
trans: 倾斜的； 间接的； 不坦率的， 无诚意的

sentences.english: an oblique glance
sentences.chinese: 斜瞥

detailed_translations.english: not looking, pointing etc directly at something

sentences.english: intonation patterns
sentences.chinese: 语调类型

detailed_translations.english: the way in which the level of your voice changes in order to add meaning to what you are saying, for example by going up at the end of a question

sentences.english: a subordinate officer
sentences.chinese: 下级官员

detailed_translations.chinese: 下级的，级别低的；次要的，从属的
detailed_translations.english: in a less important position than someone else
someone who has a lower position and less authority than someone else in an organization

detailed_translations.chinese: 使处于次要地位， 使从属于
detailed_translations.english: to put someone or something in a less important position

sentences.english: He is not only a senior leader, CEO and leadership coach of his team in excellent enterprise but also a outstanding educator, elocutionist and author of many famous leadership literatures.
sentences.chinese: 他不仅为全球卓越企业的高层领导者、CEO及其管理团队担任领导力教练，同时也是一位杰出的教育家和演说家，以及多部领导力著作和文献的作者。

sentences.english: OK, so now what the area of this parallelogram?
sentences.chinese: 那么现在这个平行四边形的面积是多少？

sentences.english: Now, above that I will have a parallelogram on my surface.
sentences.chinese: 现在在上方的曲面上，有一个平行四边形。

sentences.english: Explain again, sorry, was the question how a determinant equals the area of a parallelogram?
sentences.chinese: 再解释一下，你的问题是,为什么行列式等于平行四边形的面积？

detailed_translations.english: a flat shape with four sides in which each side is the same length as the side opposite it and parallel to it

name: ungainly
trans: 难看的； 不雅的； 笨拙的

sentences.english: a tall ungainly teenager
sentences.chinese: 一个动作笨拙的高个子少年

detailed_translations.english: moving in a way that does not look graceful

name: itinerary
trans: 行程表； 路线； 旅行路线

sentences.english: The next place on our itinerary was Sedona.
sentences.chinese: 我们旅行计划的下一站是塞多纳。

detailed_translations.chinese: 旅程，路线； 旅行日程
detailed_translations.english: An itinerary is a plan of a trip, including the route and the places that you will visit

detailed_translations.chinese: 旅程的； 巡回的，流动的

sentences.english: The professor had been pugnacious and irritable.
sentences.chinese: 那位教授好斗而易怒。

detailed_translations.english: very eager to argue or fight with people

sentences.english: ...a sound like a cow mooing.
sentences.chinese: ...听起来像牛哞哞叫的声音。

detailed_translations.english: if a cow moos, it makes a long low sound

sentences.english: the French Revolution of 1789
sentences.chinese: 1789年法国大革命

sentences.english: the planets’ revolution around the sun
sentences.chinese: 行星围绕太阳的公转

detailed_translations.english: an attempt, by a large number of people, to change the government of a country, especially by violent action

name: incentive
trans: 刺激； 动机； 鼓励

sentences.english: As an added incentive, there’s a bottle of champagne for the best team.
sentences.chinese: 给最优秀的队发一瓶香槟作为额外的鼓励。

detailed_translations.english: something that encourages you to work harder, start a new activity etc

sentences.chinese: 它吃蕨类植物的叶子以及松树。

sentences.english: Most cannot forget that year summer, he mails a piece of fern from the highest mountain for me the leaf.
sentences.chinese: 最不能忘记那年夏天，他从最高的山上为我寄来一片蕨类植物的叶子。

sentences.english: Her dark eyes watched the dance hungrily from her position behind a tall fern, and he felt his heart beat faster.
sentences.chinese: 她那乌溜溜的双眼饥饿地从一棵高大的蕨类植物后面望着舞会，他感觉到自己的心跳加快了。

detailed_translations.english: a type of plant with green leaves shaped like large feathers, but no flowers

sentences.english: He repudiated all offers of friendship.
sentences.chinese: 他拒绝任何人给他的友谊。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拒绝；否定；批判；与…断绝关系；拒付

sentences.english: Cats rely on stealth to catch their prey.
sentences.chinese: 猫科动物靠偷袭捕捉猎物。

detailed_translations.english: when you do something very quietly, slowly or secretly, so that no one notices you

sentences.english: Here, from a window, did Guinevere espy a knight standing in a woodman's cart.
sentences.chinese: 吉尼维尔是从这里透过窗户看到了站在樵夫车上的骑士。

detailed_translations.english: If you espy something, you see or notice it

sentences.chinese: 他的发言里没有浮夸或自负。

detailed_translations.english: Bombast is trying to impress people by saying things that sound impressive but have little meaning

trans: 拘泥细节的， 谨小慎微的， 一丝不苟的

sentences.english: Billy is punctilious in the performance of his duties.
sentences.chinese: 毕利执行任务总是一丝不苟的。

sentences.english: International standardized management, advanced technology, and punctilious working manner are the basis of our service and the "Minghe" brand.
sentences.chinese: 国际标准的管理，先进的技术，一丝不苟的工作态度，是我们为用户负责，为“明禾”品牌添色的基础；

sentences.english: International standardization management, the advanced technique and punctilious working manner are the integral part of companys business responsibility and Minghe's business foundation.
sentences.chinese: 国际标准的管理，先进的技术，一丝不苟的工作态度，是我们为用户负责，为“明禾”品牌添色的基础；

detailed_translations.english: very careful to behave correctly and follow rules

sentences.english: I had a slight mishap with one of the glasses.
sentences.chinese: 我犯了一个小小的错误，把其中的一个玻璃杯打破了。

name: fickle
trans: 变化无常的， 浮躁的

sentences.english: an unpredictable and fickle lover
sentences.chinese: 一个捉摸不透、三心二意的情人

detailed_translations.chinese: 浮躁的；易变的；变幻无常的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is fickle is always changing their mind about people or things that they like, so that you cannot depend on them – used to show disapproval

name: devious
trans: 偏僻的； 迂回的； 偏离的

sentences.english: a devious route
sentences.chinese: 迂回的路线

detailed_translations.chinese: 偏僻的；弯曲的；不光明正大的
detailed_translations.english: not going in the most direct way to get to a place

sentences.english: I still haven’t finished painting the spare room.
sentences.chinese: 我还没粉刷完那间空房间。

sentences.english: Do you still have Julie’s phone number?
sentences.chinese: 你还留着朱莉的电话号码吗？

detailed_translations.english: up to a particular point in time and continuing at that moment

detailed_translations.chinese: 静止的，不动的；寂静的，平静的；不起泡的
detailed_translations.english: not moving
a photograph of a scene from a film

detailed_translations.chinese: 蒸馏；使…静止；使…平静下来

sentences.english: greater levels of magnification
sentences.chinese: 更高的放大倍数

detailed_translations.chinese: 放大；放大率；放大的复制品
detailed_translations.english: the process of making something look bigger than it is

sentences.english: a degree in biology
sentences.chinese: 生物学学位

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of living things

sentences.english: I should not obtrude my affairs so much on the notice of my readers if very particular inquiries had not been made by my townsmen concerning my mode of life.
sentences.chinese: 如果我的生活方式已经被我的乡邻们详细的调查出来的话我是不会强迫我的读者来注意我的锁事的。

sentences.english: There isn’t a lot of work at this time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 每年这个时候工作机会都不多。

sentences.english: He’s been out of work (= without a job ) for two years.
sentences.chinese: 他失业有两年了。

sentences.english: More people are in work (= have a job ) than ten years ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在有工作的人比十年前多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作；[物] 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；事业；工厂；著作；文学、音乐或艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a job or activity that you do regularly, especially in order to earn money

detailed_translations.chinese: 使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进
detailed_translations.english: to do the activities and duties that are part of your job

sentences.english: The resemblance between Susan and her sister was remarkable.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊和她的姐姐十分相像。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of being or looking similar to sb/sth

name: exceptional
trans: 例外的， 异常的， 特殊的； 优越的

sentences.english: an exceptional student
sentences.chinese: 出类拔萃的学生

sentences.english: A review panel concluded that there were no exceptional circumstances that would warrant a lesser penalty for him.
sentences.chinese: 一个评估小组作出结论：没有什么例外情况可使他获得从轻惩罚。

detailed_translations.english: unusually good

sentences.english: We must redefine what constitutes a family.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须对家庭的构成重新定义。

detailed_translations.english: to be the parts that together form sth

sentences.english: an anthology of American literature
sentences.chinese: 美国文学选集

detailed_translations.english: a set of stories, poems, songs etc by different people collected together in one book

sentences.english: Murchison followed with his eye the hand of his chronometer.
sentences.chinese: 莫奇生的眼睛追随着他的时计的秒针。

sentences.english: 'Where's Walter, I wonder! ' said Solomon Gills, after he had carefully put up the chronometer again. 'Here's dinner been ready, half an hour, and no Walter! '
sentences.chinese: “不知道沃尔特在哪里！”吉尔斯把精密计时表重新小心地藏好以后，说道，“晚饭已经准备好半个小时了，可是却不见沃尔特！”

detailed_translations.english: a very exact clock, used for scientific purposes

sentences.english: The Mandarin Oriental's pool is small in real life, suitable only for a quick dip… nothing like the vast, blue expanse of water in the marketing photo.
sentences.chinese: 文华东方的游泳池在现实中是很小的，只适合快速浸泡一下......一点都不像宣传照片上那一大片宽阔的蓝色水域。

detailed_translations.english: a very large area of water, sky, land etc

sentences.english: Researchers observed one bird impale a rodent on a cactus.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员观察到，一只鸟把一个啮齿动物钉到了一棵仙人掌上。

detailed_translations.english: if someone or something is impaled, a sharp pointed object goes through them

sentences.english: People are concerned about corruption and social inequality.
sentences.chinese: 人们对腐败和社会不公感到担忧。

detailed_translations.english: an unfair situation, in which some groups in society have more money, opportunities, power etc than others

sentences.english: He has found his ideal mate.
sentences.chinese: 他已经找到了理想的配偶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物
detailed_translations.english: someone you work with, do an activity with, or share something with
if animals mate, they have sex to produce babies

name: disorient
trans: 使失去方向感； 使迷惑

sentences.english: These methods all disorient the mind and trick the subconscious into tuning into another part of the astral.
sentences.chinese: 这些方法都会使头脑失去方向感，诱使潜意识调谐至星体层的另一部分。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使失去方向感； 使迷惑

sentences.english: They are pushed to the sides of the dish where their tails are given a sharp smack with a pipette, to disable them. They are then ready to be injected into an egg.
sentences.chinese: 然后把它们头部推送到培养皿的另一侧，尾部则暴露在移液枪尖尖的吸管下，最后把它们注射到卵子中去。

detailed_translations.english: a thin glass tube for sucking up exact amounts of liquid, used especially in chemistry
to transfer or measure out (a liquid) using a pipette

sentences.english: The court ruled that the contract must be terminated.
sentences.chinese: 法庭裁决该合同必须终止。

sentences.english: to terminate a pregnancy (= to perform or have an abortion )
sentences.chinese: 终止妊娠（堕胎）

detailed_translations.english: ito end; to make sth end

sentences.english: Freudian theory has had a great influence on psychology.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德理论对心理学产生过巨大影响。

detailed_translations.english: an idea or set of ideas that is intended to explain something about life or the world, especially an idea that has not yet been proved to be true

sentences.english: Bold lipstick and bawdy dancing are the trademarks of Nida Chaudhry, who performs to packed houses at Lahore's Al Falah theater.
sentences.chinese: 大胆的口红和下流的舞蹈是奈达·乔杜里的招牌特征。 她在拉合尔阿尔法拉剧院的演出场场爆满。

name: galvanize
trans: 电镀， 镀锌； 电击

sentences.english: The report galvanized world opinion.
sentences.chinese: 这篇报道一出，世界舆论一片哗然。

detailed_translations.english: to shock or surprise someone so that they do something to solve a problem, improve a situation etc

sentences.english: As a lawyer, I would deprecate any sort of legal control on gene therapy at this stage.
sentences.chinese: 作为律师，我会反对在现阶段对基因疗法进行任何形式的法律管制。

sentences.english: Though the environment doesn't have a mouth to deprecate what humans have done to her, she retaliates through action.
sentences.chinese: 尽管环境没有嘴巴来反对人类对她所做的一切，她通过行动来报复。

detailed_translations.english: to strongly disapprove of or criticize something

sentences.english: In his early 20s, bin Laden worked in the family business; he was a priggish young man who was also studying economics at a university.
sentences.chinese: 在20岁出头的时候，本•拉登在自家的买卖中工作，同时在一所大学学习经济。 他是一个古板的年轻人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一本正经的；自负的；死板的
detailed_translations.english: If you describe someone as priggish, you think that they are a prig

name: literary
trans: 文学上的， 文学的； 精通文学的， 从事写作的

sentences.english: a literary prize
sentences.chinese: 文学奖

detailed_translations.english: relating to literature

name: stolid

sentences.english: The development and progress of sentiment-area need your support! I hope that all of us will get together to build sentiment-area more refulgent ! thank you!
sentences.chinese: 情感区的发展和进步需要你们的帮助！我希望我们能一起把情感区建设得更加辉煌！谢谢！

detailed_translations.chinese: 束缚，限制；使…抽筋；以铁箍扣紧

sentences.english: The picnic was a total washout – nobody turned up!
sentences.chinese: 野餐彻底失败——根本没人来！

detailed_translations.english: a failure

sentences.english: On Sunday, he won the 200-meter individual medley and said he needs more practice.

sentences.chinese: 是的，在混合泳接力赛中，每位运动员以一种姿势游一定距离，顺序依次是斧正游泳、蛙泳、蝶泳和自由泳。

sentences.chinese: 我的同事打着手势，匆忙地解释着他使用假护照的意图。

name: nurture

sentences.chinese: 在温室里培育的植物

sentences.english: ‘Tickets, please!’ bawled the conductor.

sentences.english: There are so many important genes on every chromosome that the loss of both members of a homologous pair would be fatal, wouldn’t even get past embryonic development.
sentences.chinese: 每一条染色体上都包含了数量巨大的重要基因，而同时丢失一对同源染色体将是致命的，生命甚至通不过胚胎发育期。

sentences.chinese: 他预交了一个月的房租，正好满足了房东的贪心。

sentences.chinese: Curiger 看到“在威尼斯大师的探求和当代艺术家热心反抗习俗中的许多共性，在我们这个时代，艺术被围攻，这些当代艺术家们敢公然反抗习俗。”

sentences.chinese: 荒凉的景色

sentences.chinese: 你不能这样继续逃避责任。

sentences.chinese: 这条小巷通往铁路桥。

sentences.chinese: ...大脑皮层。

sentences.chinese: 想到别人在我背后说闲话让我很恼火。

sentences.english: It became very clear that the incident was not just an aberration; it was not just a single incident.
sentences.chinese: 已经很明确这次事件并不仅仅是一次失常，也不只是一个单独的事件。

sentences.chinese: 她俯身向前，更仔细地读那份文件。

sentences.chinese: 背诵伟大诗人的诗

sentences.chinese: 他离校时没有拿到任何文凭。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a qualification, you have passed an examination or course to show you have a particular level of skill or knowledge in a subject

trans: 次序， 顺序， 序列； 数列

sentences.english: Be careful to perform the actions in the correct sequence.
sentences.chinese: 注意要按正确的顺序来完成动作。

sentences.chinese: 能量通过点火柴燃烧释放出来。

sentences.chinese: 我们难以招聘到足够的合格职员。

sentences.english: Many government officials were recruited from private industry.
sentences.chinese: 很多政府官员是从私营企业招募来的。

sentences.english: Drill sergeants have eight weeks to turn fresh recruits into soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 操练军士要在八个星期之内把新兵训练成真正的士兵。

sentences.english: This would introduce only a small number of GM plants into the environment, so farmers could choose not to harvest them while still benefiting from their pathogen-detecting ability.
sentences.chinese: 这只需要把少量转基因作物引入到环境中，因此农民可以选择不收获它们，同时仍然享受它们的病原体探测能力的益处。

sentences.english: Scientists talk about the 'virulence' of a pathogen, but what does that mean to laypeople?
sentences.chinese: 科学家谈论一种病原体的“毒力”，但是这对于普通人的意义是什么？

sentences.english: a senile old man
sentences.chinese: 一个年老糊涂的老人

detailed_translations.chinese: 高龄的；老衰的；高龄所致的
detailed_translations.english: If old people become senile, they become confused, can no longer remember things, and are unable to take care of themselves

name: jade
trans: 碧玉， 翡翠； 老马

sentences.english: a jade necklace
sentences.chinese: 翡翠项链

detailed_translations.english: a hard, usually green stone often used to make jewellery

name: insure
trans: 保险， 给…保险； 保证

sentences.english: Have you insured the contents of your home?
sentences.chinese: 你给家庭财产投保了吗？

sentences.english: facilities to insure the safety of cyclists
sentences.chinese: 确保骑车人安全的设施

sentences.english: I had been in action, bombarding the Normandy coast.
sentences.chinese: 我参加过轰炸诺曼底海岸的行动。

detailed_translations.english: to attack a place for a long time using large weapons, bombs etc

sentences.english: Delay always breeds danger; and to protract a great design is often to ruin it.
sentences.chinese: 推迟经常孕育危险；拖延一个伟大的工程常常意味着毁灭它。

sentences.chinese: 镇上的这个地段盗车案屡见不鲜。

sentences.english: It is a commonplace to say that Northern Ireland is a backwater in the modern Europe.

name: libel

sentences.english: restrictions on press freedom, such as libel laws
sentences.chinese: 诽谤法之类对新闻自由的限制

detailed_translations.chinese: 诽谤罪；诋毁；毁坏名誉的东西；控诉书
detailed_translations.english: when someone writes or prints untrue statements about someone so that other people could have a bad opinion of them

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the resin of urea and formaldehyde is used for medium-density overlay (MDO), a combination of concrete and plywood, used in concrete moulds.
sentences.chinese: 同时，尿素甲醛的树脂用于制造中密度板（MDO），这是一种混凝土和夹板的组合体，通常用于混凝土模具中。

sentences.english: Nitrogen compounds, like urea, a big component of urine, are transformed over several steps.
sentences.chinese: 含氮化合物如尿的主要组成成分尿素则经过几步被转化。

sentences.english: "Marine animals release small amounts of urea, but the pollution problem is almost entirely human caused, " says Kudela.
sentences.chinese: 库德拉认为海洋动物排泄的尿素很少，污染问题几乎都是人类造成的。

sentences.chinese: 我为她的聪慧所迷。

sentences.chinese: 我认为他们之间存在着宿怨。

sentences.english: Father Whittaker appeared to be in a jovial mood.

sentences.chinese: 她的尸体被发现丢在离她家不到一英里的一座废弃的仓库里。
