detailed_translations.english: a derelict building or piece of land is in very bad condition because it has not been used for a long time

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗弃物；玩忽职守者；被遗弃的人

name: retroactive
trans: 追溯的； 涉及以往的

sentences.english: a retroactive pay increase
sentences.chinese: 补发的加薪

detailed_translations.chinese: 追溯的；有追溯效力的；反动的
detailed_translations.english: a law or decision that is retroactive is effective from a particular date in the past

name: sinecure
trans: 工作清闲而报酬丰厚的职位， 挂名职务， 闲职

sentences.english: She found him an exalted sinecure as a Fellow of the Library of Congress.
sentences.chinese: 她给他找了一个级别很高的闲职：国会图书馆研究员。

detailed_translations.english: a job which you get paid for even though you do not have to do very much work

name: unused
trans: 未用过的； 空着的， 未消耗的； 无经验的， 不习惯的

sentences.english: unused land
sentences.chinese: 闲置的土地

detailed_translations.english: not being used, or never used

name: despotic
trans: 专制的； 专横的； 暴虐的

sentences.english: The country was ruled by a despotic tyrant.
sentences.chinese: 该国家被一位专横的暴君统治着。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone is despotic, you are emphasizing that they use their power over other people in a very unfair or cruel way

sentences.english: He will be particularly discomfited by the governor's dismissal of his plan.
sentences.chinese: 州长撤下他计划将让他尤其难堪。

sentences.english: The solemn intensity of Jade's gaze discomfited him.
sentences.chinese: 在杰德强烈而严肃的凝视下他狼狈不堪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 挫败；扰乱，破坏；使…为难；使…破灭
detailed_translations.english: If you are discomfited by something, it causes you to feel slightly embarrassed or confused

sentences.english: Exchange programs open up new vistas for students.
sentences.chinese: 交流计划为学生展现了新的前景。

detailed_translations.chinese: 远景，狭长的街景；展望；回顾
detailed_translations.english: a view of a large area of beautiful scenery

name: appropriate
trans: 适当的， 恰如其分的

sentences.english: The timing of the announcement was particularly appropriate .
sentences.chinese: 通告发布的时机很合适。

sentences.english: Where appropriate , I delegate as much work as possible.
sentences.chinese: 只要合适，我就尽量把工作分派出去。

sentences.english: Mark box 1 or 2, as appropriate .
sentences.chinese: 把方框1和2中的合适者标出来。

sentences.english: I can assure you that appropriate action will be taken.
sentences.chinese: 我向你保证会采取适当的行动。

detailed_translations.english: correct or suitable for a particular time, situation, or purpose
to take something, especially money, to use for a particular purpose

sentences.english: Take a deep breath, then exhale slowly.
sentences.chinese: 深吸一口气，然后慢慢呼出。

detailed_translations.english: to breathe air, smoke etc out of your mouth

sentences.english: a negative connotation
sentences.chinese: 负面的含义

detailed_translations.chinese: 内涵；含蓄；暗示，隐含意义；储蓄的东西（词、语等）
detailed_translations.english: a quality or an idea that a word makes you think of that is more than its basic meaning

name: brusque
trans: 唐突的， 无礼的； 直率的； 粗暴的

sentences.english: a brusque manner
sentences.chinese: 简慢的态度

detailed_translations.english: using very few words, in a way that seems rude

sentences.english: Does your rent include utilities?
sentences.chinese: 你的房租包括公用事业费吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 公用事业〔如煤气、电力等〕
detailed_translations.english: a service such as gas or electricity provided for people to use

name: resignation
trans: 辞职， 让位， 退职； 屈从， 服从， 听任

sentences.english: She gave a sigh of resignation.
sentences.chinese: 她无奈地叹了一口气。

sentences.english: He accepted her decision with resignation.
sentences.chinese: 他无可奈何地接受了她的决定。

detailed_translations.english: when someone calmly accepts a situation that cannot be changed, even though it is bad

sentences.english: She was treated for cuts and abrasions.
sentences.chinese: 她因划伤和擦伤而接受治疗。

detailed_translations.english: an area on the surface of your skin that has been injured by being rubbed against something hard

sentences.english: What’s your waist measurement?
sentences.chinese: 你腰围是多少？

sentences.english: accurate measurement of body temperature
sentences.chinese: 体温的精确测量

detailed_translations.english: the length, height etc of something

sentences.english: Bruckner’s Fifth Symphony
sentences.chinese: 布鲁克纳的《第五交响曲》

detailed_translations.english: a long piece of music usually in four parts, written for an orchestra

sentences.english: Halsey was identified as a leading proponent of the values of progressive education.
sentences.chinese: 哈尔西被认为是进步教育价值观的首要支持者。

detailed_translations.chinese: 支持者；建议者；提出认证遗嘱者
detailed_translations.english: someone who supports something or persuades people to do something

name: clamorous
trans: 吵闹的， 喧哗的， 吵吵嚷嚷的

sentences.english: There is always a clamorous din when I go to visit my father.
sentences.chinese: 每当我去看视父亲的的时候，总有一个声音在那里大喊大叫。

sentences.english: The silent night has the beauty of the mother and the clamorous day of the child.
sentences.chinese: 静悄悄的黑夜具有母亲的美丽，而吵闹的白天具有孩子的美丽。

name: shiftless
trans: 无能的； 不思上进的； 偷懒的

sentences.english: In retrospect, I was a sad little boy and a standard-issue, shiftless, egotistical, dejected teen-ager.
sentences.chinese: 回顾往事，我曾是一个悲哀的小男孩，一个无能的、任性的、沮丧的标准问题少年。

detailed_translations.chinese: 偷懒的；无计谋的；无能的

sentences.english: submarine plant life
sentences.chinese: 海生植物

detailed_translations.english: growing or used under the sea
a ship, especially a military one, that can stay under water

sentences.english: ...the voting public's antipathy toward the president.
sentences.chinese: …投票民众对总统的憎恶。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of strong dislike towards someone or something

sentences.english: Action and experimentation are the cornerstones of empiricism.
sentences.chinese: 行动和尝试是经验主义的基石。

sentences.english: Another kind of empiricism has to do with where we get our knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 另一种经验主义与我们从哪里获取知识有关。

sentences.english: OK, so that's one kind of empiricism.
sentences.chinese: 好，这是一种经验主义。

detailed_translations.english: the belief in basing your ideas on practical experience

name: elevated
trans: 提高的； 严肃的； 欢欣的

sentences.english: elevated philosophical language
sentences.chinese: 充满智慧的哲学语言

detailed_translations.chinese: 提高的；高尚的；严肃的；欢欣的
detailed_translations.english: elevated thoughts, words etc seem to be intelligent or of high moral standard

detailed_translations.chinese: 提高；抬起；振奋；提拔（elevate的过去分词）

sentences.english: A tidal wave caused by the earthquake hit the coast causing catastrophic damage.
sentences.chinese: 地震引发的海啸袭击了海岸，造成了灾难性的损失。

sentences.english: The water shortage in this country is potentially catastrophic.
sentences.chinese: 该国水资源的匮乏很可能是灾难性的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 灾难的；悲惨的；灾难性的，毁灭性的
detailed_translations.english: Something that is catastrophic involves or causes a sudden terrible disaster

name: prohibition
trans: 禁止， 阻止； 禁酒令

sentences.english: ...a prohibition on discrimination.
sentences.chinese: …一项对歧视的禁令。

detailed_translations.chinese: 禁止；禁令；禁酒；诉讼中止令
detailed_translations.english: the act of saying that something is illegal

sentences.english: dust particles
sentences.chinese: 尘埃

sentences.english: the sub-atomic particles that make up matter
sentences.chinese: 构成物质的次原子微粒

detailed_translations.english: a very small piece of something

sentences.english: the features which typify a Scottish Highland landscape
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰高地典型的地貌特征

sentences.english: non-violent protest, typified by Gandhi
sentences.chinese: 以甘地为典型代表的非暴力抗议

detailed_translations.chinese: 代表；作为…的典型；具有…的特点
detailed_translations.english: to be a typical example of something

sentences.english: The alimentary canal of most animals relies very little on lysosomal enzymes in digesting food.
sentences.chinese: 大多数动物的消化道在消化食物时，很少有赖于溶酶体的酶。

sentences.english: In land animals, saliva contaIns mucus, and provides lubrication for food In the alimentary canal.
sentences.chinese: 陆上动物的唾液内有粘液，并对消化道内的食物起着润滑作用。

detailed_translations.english: of or relating to nutrition

sentences.english: a stagnant pond
sentences.chinese: 死水塘

detailed_translations.chinese: 停滞的；不景气的；污浊的；迟钝的
detailed_translations.english: stagnant water or air does not move or flow and often smells bad

name: perceptive
trans: 知觉的； 感觉  的

sentences.english: He was one of the most perceptive U.S. political commentators.
sentences.chinese: 他曾是美国最具洞察力的政治评论员之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 感知的，知觉的；有知觉力的
detailed_translations.english: If you describe a person or their remarks or thoughts as perceptive, you think that they are good at noticing or realizing things, especially things that are not obvious

sentences.english: Located near the base of the neck, the thyroid is a large endocrine gland that produces hormones that help control growth and metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 甲状腺位于颈部的底部附近，是一个很大的内分泌腺体，它产生激素，协助控制生长和新陈代谢。

sentences.english: Some of the chemicals that are all around us have the ability to interfere with our endocrine systems, which regulate the hormones that control our weight, our biorhythms and our reproduction.
sentences.chinese: 我们周围的某些化学物质会影响人体的内分泌系统——其作用是通过调节激素分泌从而控制体重、生理周期以及生殖能力。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the system in your body that produces hormones

sentences.english: areas of high population density
sentences.chinese: 人口密度高的地区

detailed_translations.english: the degree to which an area is filled with people or things

sentences.english: a superlative performance
sentences.chinese: 精彩绝伦的表演

detailed_translations.chinese: 最高的；最高级的；过度的
detailed_translations.english: excellent

detailed_translations.chinese: 最高级；最好的人；最高程度；夸大话
detailed_translations.english: the superlative form of an adjective or adverb. For example, ‘biggest’ is the superlative of ‘big’.

name: canine
trans: 犬的； 似犬的； 犬齿的； 犬科的

sentences.english: canine diseases
sentences.chinese: 犬类疾病

sentences.english: her loyal canine friend
sentences.chinese: 她那忠实的狗朋友

detailed_translations.chinese: 犬的；犬齿的；犬科的；似犬的
detailed_translations.english: relating to dogs
one of the four sharp pointed teeth in the front of your mouth

sentences.english: He has not studied mechanics or engineering.
sentences.chinese: 他没有学习过力学或者工程学。

detailed_translations.english: the part of physics that deals with the natural forces that act on moving or stationary objects

name: onset
trans: 攻击， 进攻； 开始

sentences.english: the onset of winter
sentences.chinese: 冬天的来临

detailed_translations.chinese: 开始，着手；发作；攻击，进攻
detailed_translations.english: the beginning of something, especially something bad

name: logical
trans: 逻辑的； 符合逻辑的

sentences.english: It’s a logical site for a new supermarket, with the housing development nearby.
sentences.chinese: 附近有住宅区，新的超级市场选址在此是合情合理的。

sentences.english: a logical conclusion
sentences.chinese: 合理的结论

detailed_translations.chinese: 逻辑的， 合乎常理的
detailed_translations.english: seeming reasonable and sensible

name: characterize
trans: 表现…的特色， 刻画…的性格

sentences.english: Bright colours characterize his paintings.
sentences.chinese: 明亮的色彩是他绘画作品的特点。

detailed_translations.chinese: 描绘…的特性；具有…的特征
detailed_translations.english: to describe the qualities of someone or something in a particular way

name: stunt
trans: 发育迟缓； 矮小的人

sentences.english: Todd flew over the city in a hot-air balloon as a publicity stunt .
sentences.chinese: 作为一种宣传噱头，托德乘坐热气球飞越城市上空。

detailed_translations.english: something that is done to attract people’s attention, especially in advertising or politics

detailed_translations.chinese: 阻碍…的正常生长或发展
detailed_translations.english: to stop something or someone from growing to their full size or developing properly

sentences.english: That’s a ridiculous idea!
sentences.chinese: 那主意很荒唐！

sentences.english: Don’t be ridiculous!
sentences.chinese: 别傻了！

sentences.english: I’d look ridiculous in a dress like that.
sentences.chinese: 我穿那样的裙子会显得很可笑。

detailed_translations.english: very silly or unreasonable

name: aperture
trans: 孔， 穴， 缝隙；  光圈， 孔径

sentences.english: Through the aperture he could see daylight.
sentences.chinese: 通过这个孔隙他能看到日光。

detailed_translations.chinese: 孔，穴；（照相机，望远镜等的）光圈，孔径；缝隙
detailed_translations.english: a small hole or space in something

sentences.english: Podulski had been assiduous in learning his adopted language.
sentences.chinese: 珀杜斯基曾经勤奋地学习他所选的外语。

detailed_translations.english: Someone who is assiduous works hard or does things very thoroughly

sentences.english: It was the kind of rumour that it is impossible to refute.
sentences.chinese: 这是那种不可能推翻的谣言。

detailed_translations.english: to prove that a statement or idea is not correct

sentences.english: immoderate drinking
sentences.chinese: 酗酒

detailed_translations.chinese: 无节制的，过度的；不适中的
detailed_translations.english: not within reasonable and sensible limits

name: emerge
trans: 浮现， 出现， 显现

sentences.english: The flowers emerge in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 花儿在春天开放。

sentences.english: After the elections opposition groups began to emerge.
sentences.chinese: 经过选举，反对派开始露头。

detailed_translations.english: to appear or come out from somewhere

name: virile
trans: 男人的； 强壮的； 刚健的

sentences.english: He wanted his sons to become strong, virile, and athletic like himself.
sentences.chinese: 他希望他的儿子们变得像他一样身强力壮、充满阳刚之气，并擅长体育运动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 男性的；有男子气概的；刚健的
detailed_translations.english: having or showing tradition­ally male qualities such as strength, courage etc – use this to show approval

name: exploit
trans: 开拓， 开发， 开采

sentences.english: the urgent need to exploit the resources of the Irish Sea
sentences.chinese: 开发爱尔兰海资源的迫切需要

detailed_translations.english: to develop and use minerals, forests, oil etc for business or industry

sentences.english: Agreement was reached on several ancillary matters.
sentences.chinese: 就一些相关问题达成了协议。

detailed_translations.english: workers who provide additional help and services for the people who do the main work in hospitals, schools etc

sentences.english: And you know, you could have a reversible engine with lots and lots of steps, but you could always break them down into some sequence of adiabatic and isothermal steps.
sentences.chinese: 你们知道，我们可以设计一个由，很多很多个,循环步骤的热机，但是总可以把它分割成,一系列的绝热,和等温过程。

sentences.english: As long as it's reversible, you know what the efficiency has to be, and in principle, you could break it down into a bunch of steps that you could formulate as isothermal and adiabatic.
sentences.chinese: 只要这个循环过程是可逆的，你们知道效率是多少，从理论上说，可以将总过程,分解成一系列绝热,和等温的小过程。

sentences.english: The main circular window - 31-inches across - is the biggest window ever bound for space. The six windows on the perimeter are trapezoid-shaped.
sentences.chinese: “观光台”最大的玻璃直径31英寸，这也是有史以来太空飞行器上安装的最大玻璃窗，而四周的六块窗户呈梯形状。

sentences.english: I could have just drawn a trapezoid directly on my fabric, but I made a paper pattern to better illustrate how to draft the correct shape.
sentences.chinese: 我可能只是一个梯形直接绘制在我的布，但我做了一纸模式，以更好地说明如何起草正确的形状。

detailed_translations.chinese: [数] 梯形；[数] 不规则四边形
detailed_translations.english: a shape with four sides, none of which are parallel

detailed_translations.chinese: 梯形的；[数] 不规则四边形的

name: evidence
trans: 证据， 根据， 论据； 迹象， 痕迹， 征兆

sentences.english: We found further scientific evidence for this theory.
sentences.chinese: 我们找到了进一步证实这种理论的科学根据。

sentences.english: I was asked to give evidence (= to say what I knew, describe what I had seen, etc.)
sentences.chinese: 我被要求出庭作证。

detailed_translations.english: facts or signs that show clearly that something exists or is true

sentences.english: children’s books which include gratuitous violence
sentences.chinese: 包含无谓暴力内容的儿童书籍

detailed_translations.chinese: 无理由的，无端的；免费的
detailed_translations.english: said or done without a good reason, in a way that offends someone

name: flamboyant
trans: 火焰似的， 火红色的； 艳丽的， 灿烂的， 虚张的， 虚饰的

sentences.english: He lifted his arms in a flamboyant gesture .
sentences.chinese: 他抬起胳膊，做了个炫耀的手势。

detailed_translations.chinese: 艳丽的；火焰似的；炫耀的
detailed_translations.english: behaving in a confident or exciting way that makes people notice you

sentences.english: a spirit of perfect amity
sentences.chinese: 亲善无间的精神

detailed_translations.chinese: 友好；亲善关系；友好关系
detailed_translations.english: friendship, especially between countries

sentences.english: a lethal dose of heroin
sentences.chinese: 致命剂量的海洛因

sentences.english: a lethal weapon
sentences.chinese: 致命的武器

sentences.english: death by lethal injection
sentences.chinese: 注入致命剂量造成的死亡

sentences.english: a lethal cocktail of drink and pills
sentences.chinese: 一种酒和药的致命混合物

detailed_translations.english: causing death, or able to cause death

name: entangle
trans: 使…纠缠， 卷入； 连累； 使混乱

sentences.english: Bureaucracy can entangle applications for months.
sentences.chinese: 官僚主义会使申请耽搁数月之久。

detailed_translations.english: to involve someone in an argument, a relationship, or a situation that is difficult to escape from

sentences.english: She had finished the vegetables and was garnishing the roast.
sentences.chinese: 她已经做好了蔬菜，正给烤肉配饰菜。

detailed_translations.english: to add something to food in order to decorate it

detailed_translations.chinese: 为增加色香味而添加的配菜；装饰品
detailed_translations.english: a small amount of food such as salad or fruit that you place on food to decorate it

name: historical
trans: 历史的； 有关历史的

sentences.english: places of historical interest
sentences.chinese: 历史名胜

sentences.english: It is important to look at the novel in its historical context .
sentences.chinese: 在历史背景下看待这部小说很重要。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the past

sentences.english: the borough of Queens in New York City
sentences.chinese: 纽约市昆斯区

sentences.english: Lambeth Borough Council
sentences.chinese: 兰贝斯自治市议会

detailed_translations.english: a town, or part of a large city, that is responsible for managing its own schools, hospitals, roads etc

name: repellent
trans: 讨厌的， 令人厌恶的； 防…的

sentences.english: She found him physically repellent.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得他的长相很讨厌。

detailed_translations.chinese: 排斥的；防水的；弹回的；令人讨厌的
detailed_translations.english: very unpleasant

sentences.english: Refugee workers said such action was a violation of medical ethics.
sentences.chinese: 难民工作者称这种行为违背了医学道德。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伦理学；伦理观；道德标准
detailed_translations.english: Ethics are moral beliefs and rules about right and wrong

sentences.english: Children used to learn by repetition.
sentences.chinese: 过去小孩子是通过背诵来学习的。

detailed_translations.english: doing or saying the same thing many times

name: stun
trans: 使震惊， 使目瞪口呆； 把…打昏， 使昏迷

sentences.english: Redfern stunned the crowd with a last-minute goal.
sentences.chinese: 雷德芬在最后一分钟进球，使观众很是震惊。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使震惊， 使目瞪口呆； 把…打昏， 使昏迷
detailed_translations.english: to surprise or upset someone so much that they do not react immediately

name: suspense
trans: 焦虑， 悬念， 悬而不决

sentences.english: Come on then, tell me what happened; the suspense is killing me (= I feel very excited or anxious because I do not know what will happen next ) .
sentences.chinese: 快来，告诉我发生了什么事。急死我了。

sentences.english: She couldn’t bear the suspense a moment longer.
sentences.chinese: 这样提心吊胆，她再也受不了了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 悬念；悬疑；焦虑；悬而不决
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of excitement or anxiety when you do not know what will happen next

sentences.english: He attempted to mollify her.
sentences.chinese: 他想安抚她。

sentences.english: Nature reserves were set up around new power stations to mollify local conservationists.
sentences.chinese: 新的发电站附近建立了自然保护区，以安抚当地的自然环境保护主义者。

detailed_translations.chinese: 平息，缓和；使…平静；使…变软
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel less angry and upset about something

sentences.english: The main character narrates the story.
sentences.chinese: 主人公讲述故事。

detailed_translations.english: to tell a story by describing all the events in order, for example in a book

name: autonomy
trans: 自治； 自治权； 人身自由； 自主权； 自立

sentences.english: campaigners who want greater autonomy for Corsica
sentences.chinese: 希望科西嘉有更多自治权的活动家

detailed_translations.english: freedom that a place or an organization has to govern or control itself

sentences.english: Patients in whom no orthotic was used were encouraged to ambulate immediately following randomization, maintaining "neutral spinal alignment" for 8 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 随机分组后，不使用矫形器组的病人即刻被鼓励行走，保持脊椎中立位8周。

detailed_translations.english: to wander about or move from one place to another

sentences.english: It's impolite to gibe at a foreign student's English.
sentences.chinese: 嘲笑外国学生的英语是不礼貌的。

sentences.english: It's unkind to gibe at a foreign student's english even though it may sound amusing.
sentences.chinese: 嘲笑一个外国学生的英语是不应该的，就算他的英语令人捧腹。

sentences.english: "Please don't gibe me, " Lydia said. "I feel as repulsive and small as one of those deadly germs often portrayed in the horror movie genre. "
sentences.chinese: “请不要嘲笑我，”利迪娅说。“我觉得自己令人讨厌，渺小，像恐怖类电影描述的那些致命的细菌那样。”

sentences.english: the knave of hearts
sentences.chinese: 红桃杰克

detailed_translations.chinese: 无赖；流氓；（纸牌中的）杰克

sentences.english: She spoke confidently into the microphone.
sentences.chinese: 她自信地对着麦克风说话。

sentences.english: They searched the room for hidden microphones.
sentences.chinese: 他们在屋里翻找隐藏的话筒。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that you speak into to record your voice or make it louder when you are speaking or performing in public

name: surrender
trans: 投降， 交出， 放弃

sentences.english: Germany surrendered on May 7th, 1945.
sentences.chinese: 德国于 1945 年 5 月 7 日投降。

sentences.english: The terrorists were given ten minutes to surrender.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子被限定在十分钟之内投降。

detailed_translations.english: to say officially that you want to stop fighting, because you realize that you cannot win
to give up something or someone, especially because you are forced to
when you say officially that you want to stop fighting because you realize that you cannot win

name: hypnotic
trans: 催眠的， 易被催眠的

sentences.english: a hypnotic trance
sentences.chinese: 催眠后的恍惚状态

detailed_translations.chinese: 催眠的，催眠术的；易于催眠的
detailed_translations.english: relating to  hypnosis
a drug that helps you to sleep

name: caste
trans: 印度的世袭阶级；  社会地位； 社会等级制度

sentences.english: the caste system
sentences.chinese: 种姓制度

detailed_translations.chinese: （印度社会中的）种姓；（具有严格等级差别的）社会地位；（排他的）社会团体
detailed_translations.english: one of the fixed social classes, which cannot be changed, into which people are born in India

sentences.english: A car and a van collided on the motorway.
sentences.chinese: 一辆汽车和一辆小型货车在高速公路上相撞了。

sentences.english: Two trains collided head-on (= when they were moving directly towards each other ) .
sentences.chinese: 两辆火车迎头相撞。

detailed_translations.english: to hit something or someone that is moving in a different direction from you

sentences.english: Having clean hands is one of the cardinal rules when preparing food.
sentences.chinese: 双手洁净是准备食物时的一项最基本要求。

sentences.english: an issue of cardinal importance
sentences.chinese: 至关重要的问题

detailed_translations.chinese: 红衣主教；枢机主教；鲜红色；【鸟类】(北美)主红雀
detailed_translations.english: a priest of high rank in the Roman Catholic Church

detailed_translations.chinese: 主要的，基本的；深红色的
detailed_translations.english: very important or basic

sentences.english: Can you turn the volume up?
sentences.chinese: 请你把音量调大好吗？

sentences.english: The volume of the container measures 10,000 cubic metres.
sentences.chinese: 这个容器的容量是1万立方米。

sentences.english: The period from 1940 – 1945 is in volume 9.
sentences.chinese: 1940年至1945年这段时间在第9卷。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of sound produced by a television, radio etc

sentences.english: Most deals are transacted over the phone.
sentences.chinese: 大多数生意都是在电话里成交的。

detailed_translations.english: to do business with someone

name: nefarious
trans: 邪恶的， 穷凶极恶的

sentences.english: nefarious activities such as drug trafficking and fraud
sentences.chinese: 贩毒和诈骗之类的犯罪活动

detailed_translations.chinese: 邪恶的；穷凶极恶的；不法的
detailed_translations.english: evil or criminal

sentences.english: One of the main beneficiaries of the early election is thought to be the former president.
sentences.chinese: 前总统被认为是早期选举的主要受益者之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: [金融] 受益人，受惠者；封臣
detailed_translations.english: someone who gets advantages from an action or change

sentences.english: I very much hope that this case will prove to be a catalyst for change.
sentences.chinese: 我非常希望这件事终将成为促成变化的催化剂。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that makes a chemical reaction happen more quickly without being changed itself

sentences.english: Usually his cases involved errant husbands and wandering wives.
sentences.chinese: 通常他接手的案子都涉及出轨的丈夫和离家出走的妻子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不定的；周游的；错误的；偏离正路的
detailed_translations.english: Errant is used to describe someone whose actions are considered unacceptable or wrong by other people. For example, an errant husband is unfaithful to his wife.

name: gluttonous
trans: 暴食的， 饕餮的， 贪吃的

sentences.english: ...a selfish, gluttonous and lazy person.
sentences.chinese: ...一个自私、贪食而又懒惰的家伙。

detailed_translations.english: If you think that someone eats too much or is greedy, you can say they are gluttonous

name: perverse
trans: 执拗的， 任性的， 不通情理的

sentences.english: He gets perverse satisfaction from embarrassing people.
sentences.chinese: 他通过使人难堪获得变态的满足感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 堕落的，不正当的；倔强的；违反常情的

name: unawares
trans: 不料， 吃惊地； 不知不觉地

sentences.english: We had walked unawares over the border.
sentences.chinese: 我们无意中越过了边界。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不知不觉地；出其不意地；不料
detailed_translations.english: without noticing

name: indignant
trans: 愤慨的， 愤慨不平的

sentences.english: an indignant reply
sentences.chinese: 愤慨的回复

detailed_translations.chinese: 愤怒的， 愤慨的， 义愤的
detailed_translations.english: angry and surprised because you feel insulted or unfairly treated

sentences.english: changing to a decimal system
sentences.chinese: 改为十进制

sentences.english: calculations accurate to three decimal places
sentences.chinese: 精确到小数点后三位的计算

detailed_translations.english: a decimal system is based on the number 10
a  fraction (= a number less than 1 )  that is shown as a  full stop  followed by the number of  tenth s  ,  hundredth s  etc. The numbers 0.5, 0.175, and 0.661 are decimals.

sentences.english: The reforms will bring lasting benefits.
sentences.chinese: 改革将带来长久的利益。

sentences.english: Their generosity made a lasting impression on me.
sentences.chinese: 他们的慷慨给我留下了难忘的印象。

sentences.english: a solution that would bring lasting peace
sentences.chinese: 将带来持久和平的解决方案

detailed_translations.english: strong enough, well enough planned etc to continue for a very long time

name: cynical
trans: 愤世嫉俗的， 冷嘲热讽的， 玩世不恭的

sentences.english: a cynical view of human nature
sentences.chinese: 认为人性本恶的一种观点

detailed_translations.chinese: 愤世嫉俗的， 怀疑的
detailed_translations.english: unwilling to believe that people have good, honest, or sincere reasons for doing something

sentences.english: A sudden rise in oil prices could lead to a breakdown of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 油价暴涨会导致经济崩溃。

sentences.english: The breakdown of the negotiations was not unexpected.
sentences.chinese: 谈判的失败是预料之中的事。

detailed_translations.english: a failure of a relationship, discussion or system

sentences.english: The huge, iron gate was locked.
sentences.chinese: 那扇巨大的铁门被锁上了。

sentences.english: ...the highest grade iron ore deposits in the world.
sentences.chinese: …世界上最优质的铁矿床。

sentences.english: She used to iron his shirts.
sentences.chinese: 她过去常给他熨衬衫。

sentences.english: ...a man of icy nerve and iron will.
sentences.chinese: …一个头脑冷静、意志坚强的男人。

detailed_translations.english: Iron is an element that usually takes the form of a hard, dark grey metal. It is used to make steel, and also forms part of many tools, buildings, and vehicles. Very small amounts of iron occur in your blood and in food.
If you iron clothes, you remove the creases from them using an iron
You can use iron to describe the character or behaviour of someone who is very firm in their decisions and actions, or who can control their feelings well

name: tortuous
trans: 曲折的； 转弯抹角的

sentences.english: a tortuous path over the mountains to Kandahar
sentences.chinese: 翻山越岭通往坎大哈的一条蜿蜒小径

detailed_translations.english: a tortuous path, stream, road etc has a lot of bends in it and is therefore difficult to travel along

sentences.english: Somewhat less than 40% of people in the world retain the ability to digest lactose after childhood.
sentences.chinese: 全世界大约不到40%的成年人能够在童年过后保留消化乳糖的能力。

sentences.english: Some people have trouble digesting lactose, a carbohydrate in milk and milk products, because of the deficiency of enzyme lactase in the body.
sentences.chinese: 有些人无法消化乳糖，一种在牛奶和奶制品中的碳水化合物，这是因为在他们的身体中缺少乳糖消化酶。

sentences.english: Though children were able to drink milk, they typically developed lactose intolerance as they grew up.
sentences.chinese: 虽然小孩喝牛奶没有问题，但在长大后他们通常都会产生乳糖不耐受。

detailed_translations.english: a type of sugar found in milk, sometimes used as a food for babies and sick people

name: veneer
trans: 薄板， 单板； 外表， 虚饰

sentences.english: A thin veneer of politeness hid Lady Bride’s growing anger.
sentences.chinese: 布赖德夫人看上去不失礼数，内心的怒火却是愈燃愈烈。

detailed_translations.chinese: 外表；虚饰；饰面；胶合板的一层；薄木片
detailed_translations.english: a thin layer of wood or plastic that covers the surface of a piece of furniture made of cheaper material, to make it look better

sentences.english: a ribald remark
sentences.chinese: 粗俗的言论

sentences.english: ribald humour
sentences.chinese: 猥亵的幽默

detailed_translations.english: ribald remarks or jokes are humorous, rude, and about sex

detailed_translations.chinese: 言谈粗俗的人；说下流话的人

name: calamity
trans: 大灾祸， 灾难， 不幸

sentences.english: It will be a calamity for farmers if the crops fail again.
sentences.chinese: 如果再次歉收，将会给农民带来灾难。

detailed_translations.english: a terrible and unexpected event that causes a lot of damage or suffering

name: accomplish
trans: 完成， 达到； 实现

sentences.english: We have accomplished all we set out to do.
sentences.chinese: 所有计划要做的事情，我们都已完成。

sentences.english: Mission accomplished(=  we have done what we intended to do  ) .
sentences.chinese: 大功告成。

detailed_translations.english: to succeed in doing something, especially after trying very hard

name: constituent
trans: 形成的， 组成的； 选举的

sentences.english: the EU and its constituent members
sentences.chinese: 欧盟及其成员国

sentences.english: He told his constituents that he would continue to represent them to the best of his ability.
sentences.chinese: 他告诉他的选民们他会继续竭尽所能代表他们。

detailed_translations.english: being one of the parts of something
someone who votes in a particular area

name: irritate
trans: 激怒， 恼火， 使急躁； 刺激

sentences.english: It really irritates me when he doesn’t help around the house.
sentences.chinese: 家里的事情他一点都不帮忙，真让我恼火。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel annoyed or impatient, especially by doing something many times or for a long period of time

sentences.english: The earthquake wreaked havoc on the city.
sentences.chinese: 地震对这座城市造成了大破坏。

sentences.english: He points out that some past offenders in Michigan have been released only to cause havoc and end up in jail again.
sentences.chinese: 他指出，过去密歇根释放的一些犯人只是与造成严重破坏的人有关，而且最后又都重新回到监狱里。

sentences.english: The earthquake wreaked havoc on the city.
sentences.chinese: 地震对这个城市造成了大破坏。

name: illuminate
trans: 照亮， 照明； 阐明； 启蒙

sentences.english: A single candle illuminated his face.
sentences.chinese: 一支蜡烛照亮了他的脸。

sentences.english: The report illuminated the difficult issues at the heart of science policy.
sentences.chinese: 报告阐明了科学方针核心部分的难点。

detailed_translations.english: to make a light shine on something, or to fill a place with light

sentences.english: scholastic skills
sentences.chinese: 教学技巧

detailed_translations.chinese: 学校的；学者的；学术的（等于scholastical）
detailed_translations.english: relating to schools or teaching

detailed_translations.chinese: 学者；学生；墨守成规者；经院哲学家

sentences.english: an expert in ciphers
sentences.chinese: 密码专家

sentences.english: messages written in cipher
sentences.chinese: 用密码写的信息

detailed_translations.english: a system of secret writing

name: pageant
trans: 盛会， 庆典， 游行

sentences.english: a colourful pageant of Scotland’s past
sentences.chinese: 重现苏格兰历史的绚丽盛典

detailed_translations.chinese: 盛会；游行；虚饰；露天表演

sentences.english: ...a huge round mass of smooth rock protruding from the water.
sentences.chinese: …从水中突出来的一块光滑的圆形巨石。

detailed_translations.english: to stick out from somewhere

sentences.english: Barring a miracle, he won’t walk again.
sentences.chinese: 除非出现奇迹，他是不可能再行走了。

detailed_translations.english: unless something happens

name: flounder
trans: 挣扎，困难地往前走；笨拙而错乱地说或做事

sentences.english: More and more firms are floundering because of the recession.
sentences.chinese: 由于经济衰退，越来越多的公司举步维艰。

detailed_translations.chinese: 挣扎，折腾；错乱地做事或说话
detailed_translations.english: to have a lot of problems and be likely to fail completely
a European flatfish, Platichthys flesus having a greyish-brown body covered with prickly scales: family Pleuronectidae: an important food fish

sentences.english: The author enthrall, enthralled the minds of his readers.
sentences.chinese: 那位作者于读者着迷。

sentences.english: Such trends do not enthrall neutrals, many of whom would prefer to see free-scoring Barcelona win tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 这些趋势并没有迷惑住中立者，他们中的很多人更愿意火力十足的巴萨明天赢球。

sentences.english: Even now, having been tortured and imprisoned by Voldemort, the idea of the Dark wizard in possession of this wand seemed to enthrall him as much as it repulsed him.
sentences.chinese: 现在，即使在被伏地魔拷问和关押后，这老头儿对于黑巫师拥有老魔杖的想法，似乎仍是既反感又着迷。

name: residue
trans: 残余； 渣滓； 滤渣

sentences.english: The flies leave a sticky residue on crops.
sentences.chinese: 苍蝇在庄稼上留下黏糊糊的分泌物。

sentences.english: Rinse off any soap residue.
sentences.chinese: 冲净残留的肥皂。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that remains on a surface, in a container etc and cannot be removed easily, or that remains after a chemical process

sentences.english: The public is treated with contempt by broadcasters.
sentences.chinese: 公众受到了节目主持人的轻蔑对待。

sentences.english: How could she have loved a man who so clearly held her in contempt ?
sentences.chinese: 她怎么会爱上一个明显看不起她的男人呢？

detailed_translations.english: a feeling that someone or something is not important and deserves no respect

name: fulminate
trans: 使爆发； 以严词谴责

sentences.english: The newspapers fulminate against the crime.
sentences.chinese: 报纸严厉谴责这个罪行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 猛烈抨击， 严厉谴责
detailed_translations.english: to criticize someone or something angrily

sentences.english: He’s my son, in the figurative sense of the word.
sentences.chinese: 打个比方，他就像是我的儿子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比喻的；修饰丰富的；形容多的
detailed_translations.english: a figurative word or phrase is used in a different way from its usual meaning, to give you a particular idea or picture in your mind

name: deliberate
trans: 深思熟虑的， 故意的； 先有准备的

sentences.english: a deliberate attempt to humiliate her
sentences.chinese: 对她的故意羞辱

sentences.english: The attack on him was quite deliberate.
sentences.chinese: 对他的袭击完全是有预谋的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 故意的， 蓄意的； 慎重的， 深思熟虑的
detailed_translations.english: intended or planned
to think about something very carefully
someone who works in a coal mine

name: discretionary
trans: 任意的， 自由决定的

sentences.english: the court’s discretionary powers
sentences.chinese: 法庭的酌情决定权

detailed_translations.english: not controlled by strict rules, but decided on by someone in a position of authority

sentences.english: Violent crime is rife in our inner cities.
sentences.chinese: 暴力犯罪在我们的旧城区非常猖獗。

detailed_translations.english: if something bad or unpleasant is rife, it is very common

name: Calvinism
trans: 加尔文教义， 加尔文主义

sentences.english: Calvinism was the most convenient religion since the days of the ancients.
sentences.chinese: 加尔文主义是自古以来最方便的宗教。

sentences.english: American society in 19 th century - led by American " Calvinism " and Presbyterian Church.
sentences.chinese: 19世纪美国社会与文化的主流，由长老会，美国版本的加尔文主义领导！

sentences.english: He was a restless activist who tried to point England in the direction of Calvinism. later in 1559 following study under Calvin;
sentences.chinese: 他是一个忙碌不息，企图指引英国朝着加尔文主义方向的积极分子。 1559年他跟随加尔文学习。

detailed_translations.chinese: 加尔文教义， 加尔文主义
detailed_translations.english: the Christian religious teachings of John Calvin, based on the idea that events on Earth are controlled by God and cannot be changed by humans

name: charter
trans: 特权， 豁免权； 合同， 契约； 宪章

sentences.english: ...the last charter plane carrying out foreign nationals.
sentences.chinese: …运出外国侨民的最后一班包机。

detailed_translations.english: A charter plane or boat is one which is rented for use by a particular person or group and which is not part of a regular service

detailed_translations.chinese: 宪章，共同纲领；特许状，许可证；包租
detailed_translations.english: a statement of the principles, duties, and purposes of an organization
to pay a company for the use of their aircraft, boat etc

sentences.english: Police arrested several men, who were later released.
sentences.chinese: 警察逮捕了几个人，后来都释放了。

sentences.english: The bears are eventually released into the wild.
sentences.chinese: 这些熊最后被放回野生环境中。

sentences.english: You need to release the tension in these shoulder muscles.
sentences.chinese: 你需要放松肩部肌肉。

sentences.english: The new trade figures have just been released.
sentences.chinese: 新的贸易数字刚刚公布。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone go free, after having kept them somewhere

sentences.english: Every debt he owed in the world, including the pawnshop, with its usurious interest, amounted to less than a hundred dollars.
sentences.chinese: 他在世界上欠下的每一笔帐，包括高利贷的当铺债务，加在一起也不到一百元。

sentences.english: These companies, cut off from bank loans at reasonable rates of interest, had turned instead to supposedly usurious moneylenders, known as the curb market.
sentences.chinese: 这些中小企业无法以合理的贷款利率从银行获得贷款，他们因此只好求助于所谓高利贷放贷机构。

sentences.chinese: “他的长处是运营”，在彭博电视采访中一名Rodman &Renshaw 公司的分析员Ashok Kumar曾说过。

sentences.chinese: 他是我遇到过的最固执的人。

sentences.english: Don’t be so obstinate!

sentences.english: an obstinate refusal to obey

sentences.chinese: 在钎焊和界面微观结构的特点是光学显微镜，扫描电子显微镜和能谱。

sentences.english: The method and technology of oxyacetylene flame braze welding for main cable wrapping at Shantou Bay Bridge were introduced, and the difficulties of the welding were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 介绍汕头海湾大桥主缆缠丝所采用的氧- 乙炔火焰钎接焊方法及其工艺，并对主缆缠丝焊接的难点进行了分析。

sentences.english: It's also superior for braze welding of steel.
sentences.chinese: 这对钢的黄铜焊接也是较优的。

detailed_translations.english: to decorate with, make like, or make of brass

sentences.english: There were no shutters at the windows, and some of the doors hung askew.
sentences.chinese: 窗户上没有百叶窗，有些门也是歪斜着安装的。

not quite straight or in the right position

sentences.english: One day a grasshopper came upon an ant at work in a garden.
sentences.chinese: 一天， 蚱蜢碰到了一只正在花园里干活的蚂蚁。

sentences.english: I remember that it was summer. I had just come inside from catching grasshoppers and I was sorting them on my sister's bed because I didn't want to get grasshopper guts on mine.
sentences.chinese: 我记得那是夏天，我抓了些蝗虫放到妹妹的床上，根据它们还剩下几只脚来归类，有些蝗虫的内脏都冒出来了，我当然不想弄到自己的床上。

detailed_translations.english: an insect that has long back legs for jumping and that makes short loud noises

sentences.english: He prayed to God night and day endue him with the spirit of holiness.
sentences.chinese: 他日夜祈求上帝赋予他虔敬的心。

sentences.english: The value of life is up to the ultimate mission you endue with yourself .
sentences.chinese: 生命的价值取决于你赋予自己的终极使命。

sentences.english: The society endues us the mission , and the clients endue us the responsibility !
sentences.chinese: 社会赋予我们使命，客户赋予我们责任！

trans: 割让， 转让， 【律】 让与  债权

sentences.chinese: 1818年西班牙割让的领土

detailed_translations.english: the act of giving up land, property, or rights, especially to another country after a war, or something that is given up in this way

sentences.english: We want to dispel the myth that you cannot eat well in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 我们要消除在英国吃不好的误解。

sentences.english: Light poured into the hall, dispelling the shadows.
sentences.chinese: 阳光洒进大厅，驱散了阴影。

sentences.english: Learning is a cumulative process.
sentences.chinese: 学习是个逐渐积累的过程。

name: supplicate
trans: 恳求， 哀求， 恳请

sentences.english: A man can scarce allege his own merits with modesty, much less extol them; a man cannot sometimes brook to supplicate or beg; and a number of the like.
sentences.chinese: 一个人不能自承有功而免矜夸之嫌，更不用说是不能表扬自己底功绩了；他有时也不能低首下心地去有所恳求；诸如此类的事很多。

detailed_translations.english: to make a humble request to (someone); plead

sentences.english: light shining through a slit in the door
sentences.chinese: 透过门缝照进来的光线

trans: 谜一般的， 高深莫测的

sentences.chinese: 她主演了威尔斯最神秘的电影当中的一部。

detailed_translations.chinese: 神秘的；高深莫测的；谜一般的
detailed_translations.english: Someone or something that is enigmatic is mysterious and difficult to understand

sentences.english: The force of the crash was so strong that the roof of one car flew into the air and landed on an overpass above the tracks.
sentences.chinese: 撞击的力量如此之大，以至于一节车厢的车顶腾空飞起，落在轨道上方的一个天桥上。

sentences.english: Otherwise, why would nobody fall in love with a homeless person who lives under an overpass?
sentences.chinese: 她继续说道，“不然的话，为何没人会同一个无家可归、生活在天桥下的人相爱呢？”

sentences.english: Seven species of birds of prey have been observed.
sentences.chinese: 已有七种猛禽被观察到。

sentences.english: pandas and other endangered species
sentences.chinese: 熊猫以及其他濒危物种

detailed_translations.english: a group of animals or plants whose members are similar and can breed together to produce young animals or plants

sentences.english: They didn’t tell the police for fear of reprisal .
sentences.chinese: 由于害怕报复，他们没有报警。

detailed_translations.english: something violent or harmful which you do to punish someone for something bad they have done to you

sentences.english: The omens betide better results.
sentences.chinese: 这预兆表明会产生较好的效果。

sentences.english: As we saw in the preceding chapter, groups can be powerful agents of socialization.
sentences.chinese: 如我们在前一章所见，团组可以是社会化的有力动因。

sentences.chinese: 这个问题使整个国家变得两极化。

sentences.english: Their principle function is production of type III collagen, elastin, and proteoglycans of the extracellular matrix of the alveolar septa.
sentences.chinese: 其主要的功能是产生III型胶原，弹性蛋白和肺泡隔细胞外基质中的蛋白多糖。

sentences.english: The effects of quartz on membranous fluidity labelled with DPH and ANS and the production of oxygen free radicals of alveolar macrophages were studied in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 采用体外细胞实验方法，观察了石英尘对DPH和ANS标记的肺胞巨噬细胞膜流动性和荧光性质的影响，同时测定了肺泡巨噬细胞活性氧的产生。

a  consonant  sound such as /  t  / or /  d  / that you make by putting the end of your tongue behind your upper front teeth

sentences.english: The lines between salubrious and unwholesome government information are not easy to draw.
sentences.chinese: 有益和有害的政府信息之间的界线并不那么容易划分。

sentences.english: His features were pretty yet, and his eye and complexion brighter than I remembered them, though with merely temporary lustre borrowed from the salubrious air and genial sun.
sentences.chinese: 他的相貌挺好看，眼睛和气色也比我所记得的有精神些，虽然那仅仅是从有益健康的空气与和煦的阳光中借来的暂时的光辉。

sentences.english: Shortly after his admission into the hospital he had a massive brain haemorrhage and died.
sentences.chinese: 他住进医院不久，因脑部大量内出血而去世了。

sentences.chinese: 我把3个儿子都生下来之后，严重内出血。

sentences.chinese: 我从销售上学到的有关教育的东西和我研究教育学时候学到的一样多——可能更多。

sentences.english: They are making progress by investing in research, reforming traditional approaches to curricula and pedagogy, and beginning to attract outstanding faculty from abroad.
sentences.chinese: 他们必然要斥巨资投入研究，改革现就的传统的教育模式和课程设置，并积极吸引外国外国教员。

sentences.english: ...air pollution, traffic congestion, and the steady degradation of our quality of life.
sentences.chinese: …空气污染、交通阻塞以及我们生活质量的持续恶化。

sentences.chinese: 他们自豪地宣布自己是新自治省的一部分。

sentences.chinese: 审理定于下周开始。

trans: 理解， 知觉； 感受， 体会； 知觉作用， 知觉过程； 理解力， 洞察力

sentences.chinese: 当他们这样做时，你觉得他们的知觉是怎样的？

sentences.chinese: 回国休假的年轻士兵

sentences.chinese: 他得到消息时显得异常镇静。

sentences.chinese: 存在于西伯利亚的许多当地文化

trans: 上笼头； 昂首 ； 抑制

sentences.english: The metal mouthpiece of a bridle, serving to control, curb, and direct an animal.
sentences.chinese: 马勒， 嚼子放在嘴里的金属制马勒，用于控制约束和驾御牲畜。

sentences.english: Inadvertently the paper added a comma to the ad, which read instead:Horse, saddle and bridle for $50.
sentences.chinese: 无意中报纸在广告语中加了个逗号，读起来成这样了，50元卖马，马鞍和马缰绳。

sentences.english: These included a saddle, bridle, clay vase, wooden bowl, trough, iron kettle, the remains of an entire horse, and ancient clothing.
sentences.chinese: 这些物品包括一个鞍，缰绳，黏土花瓶，木碗，饲料槽，铁壶，一整匹马的遗骸以及一件古老的衣服。

detailed_translations.chinese: 上笼头； 昂首 ； 抑制

a set of leather bands put around a horse’s head and used to control its movements

sentences.english: I tried to visualize the house while he was describing it.
sentences.chinese: 我一边听他描述，一边想象那房子的样子。

sentences.english: I came back from holiday feeling rejuvenated.
sentences.chinese: 我度假回来，感到恢复了活力。

sentences.chinese: 公民咨询局

sentences.chinese: 车站的入口处

sentences.chinese: 布里奇特动作夸张地进了房间。

sentences.chinese: 我会像体谅体弱病残的人那样，体谅性格内向的人，但两者都失去许多人生体验。

sentences.chinese: 我同情那些内向的人正如我会同情病人一样，因为他们的生活中都有缺失的部分。

sentences.english: How do you think the introvert and the extrovert will behave in such an environment?
sentences.chinese: 在完全相同的环境下，你认为内向的人和外向的人都会如何表现呢？

detailed_translations.english: someone who is quiet and shy, and does not enjoy being with other people

sentences.chinese: ...如吉夫花生酱的落后生产线。

someone or something that is very slow or late

sentences.english: ...a motley collection of vans, old buses, cattle trucks, and even a fire engine.
sentences.chinese: ...杂七杂八的一堆车，有运货车、旧公共汽车、运牛卡车，甚至有一辆消防车。

detailed_translations.chinese: 杂色的；混杂的；五颜六色的
detailed_translations.english: You can describe a group of things as a motley collection if you think they seem strange together because they are all very different

trans: 爱闹着玩的， 嬉戏的

sentences.chinese: 在不远的将来，当小狗崽长到可以四处奔跑嬉戏的时候——狼会回到山坡。

sentences.english: Grass was awarded the Nobel Prize in 1999 for his "frolicsome black fables [which] portray the forgotten face of history".
sentences.chinese: 格拉斯因他“嬉闹的黑色寓言、描绘历史被遗忘的一面”获得1999年诺贝尔文学奖。

detailed_translations.english: given to frolicking; merry and playful

sentences.english: The charlatan boasted that he could charm off any disease.
sentences.chinese: 这个江湖骗子吹牛说他能用符咒治好各种疾病。

sentences.english: Incapable of moral clarity, he could never quite admit to himself that he was a charlatan and that his scheme was an impossible fiasco.
sentences.chinese: 由于缺乏明确的道德准则，他从来不承认自己是一个江湖骗子以及他的计划是个彻底的失败品。

sentences.english: If you are too trusting of the invisible, then you buy that $89 ebook that comes with the promise of instant riches, or you sign up for ear candling, or invest time and money with a charlatan.
sentences.chinese: 如果你对这些无形的事物相当信任，那么你可能会花89美元买一个承诺给你一夜暴富的电子书，或报名参加一次耳烛疗法，或跟一个江湖郎中花费你的时间和金钱。

sentences.english: The Palestinians would balk at that as far too much, even if they got the equivalent acreage back, perhaps adjacent to the Gaza Strip.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦方对于这个提议望而却步，即便他们能换回同样多的英亩数，还有可能得到加沙地带的邻近区域。

sentences.english: The prevailing price levels for critical commodities should see a significant acreage response in the coming months as countries begin their cultivation cycles.
sentences.chinese: 现行价格水平为关键的商品应该会看到一个显着的反应面积在未来数月随着各国开始他们的培养周期。

detailed_translations.english: the area of a piece of land measured in acres

sentences.english: The precision of liquid column manometer was described. The correct use method and error correction of U tube manometer and double tube differential pressure gauge were analysed.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了液柱式压力计的精度，对U形管压力计和双管差压计的正确使用方法及误差修正做了简要分析。

detailed_translations.chinese: 压力计；[流] 测压计；血压计
detailed_translations.english: an instrument for comparing pressures; typically a glass U-tube containing mercury, in which pressure is indicated by the difference in levels in the two arms of the tube U

name: acoustic
trans: 有关声音的， 声学的

sentences.english: In our case, we have found the true acoustic echo beacon.
sentences.chinese: 但在这种情况下，我们发现了真正的声学‘回声灯塔’ ”。

sentences.english: This gives it excellent thermal and acoustic properties, but the suitability of the product for a large-scale commercial project was questioned.
sentences.chinese: 这给了它出色的热学和声学属性，但是这种产品是否适合于一个大尺度的商业项目还是个问题。

sentences.english: Her performance contains a strong element of self-parody (= when someone makes fun of their own style ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的表演包含了强烈的自嘲元素。

sentences.english: Burgundy has always been considered a major centre of gastronomy.
sentences.chinese: 勃艮第常被看作主要的美食中心。

detailed_translations.chinese: 烹饪法，美食法；享乐主义
detailed_translations.english: the art and science of cooking and eating good food

sentences.english: Tragic literature dignifies sorrow and disaster.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧性文学使悲伤和灾难显得尊贵。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使高贵；增威严；授以荣誉

name: outlandish
trans: 外国气派的； 古怪的， 奇异的

sentences.english: Her story seemed so outlandish.
sentences.chinese: 她的故事太不寻常了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 古怪的；奇异的；异国风格的；偏僻的

sentences.english: Telling a lie as a joke or to fool someone is a harmless type of lie, also known as a jocose lie.
sentences.chinese: 开玩笑或捉弄人般地说谎是无害的谎言，也称为戏虐性的谎言。

sentences.english: A young couple planed to make a wedding trip in the tropical rain forest.
sentences.chinese: 一对年轻夫妇准备去热带雨林蜜月旅行，出发之前妻子在早晨已经修整了头发。

sentences.english: A few occasional flaps of the wings of a butterfly in a South American tropical rain forest in the Amazon Basin may cause a tornado in Texas, the United States two weeks later.
sentences.chinese: 亚马孙盆地的南美热带雨林中的一只蝴蝶，偶尔扇动了几下翅膀，两周后在美国得克萨斯州可能引起一场龙卷风。

sentences.chinese: 对国防需求的缜密分析

sentences.chinese: 先天畸形

sentences.english: a congenital defect
sentences.chinese: 先天性缺陷

detailed_translations.english: a congenital medical condition or disease has affected someone since they were born

name: velvety
trans: 像天鹅绒的， 柔软的

sentences.english: The grass grew thick and velvety.
sentences.chinese: 草长得又茂密又柔软光滑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 天鹅绒般柔软的；醇和的，可口的
detailed_translations.english: If you describe something as velvety, you mean that it is pleasantly soft to touch and has the appearance or quality of velvet

sentences.english: I felt a prickle of disquiet.
sentences.chinese: 我焦躁得如坐针毡。

detailed_translations.chinese: 刺；刺痛；植物的皮刺；针刺般的感觉
detailed_translations.english: a long thin sharp point on the skin of some animals or the surface of some plants

detailed_translations.chinese: 针一般地刺；戳；使感到刺痛
detailed_translations.english: if something prickles your skin, it makes it sting slightly

sentences.english: Deliberately making people suffer is immoral.
sentences.chinese: 故意使人吃苦头是不道德的。

sentences.english: It’s immoral to be rich while people are starving and homeless.
sentences.chinese: 不管别人忍饥挨饿、居无定所而自己发家致富是不道德的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不道德的；邪恶的；淫荡的
detailed_translations.english: morally wrong

name: dissipate
trans: 使消散， 使消失； 浪费， 挥霍

sentences.english: As he thought it over, his anger gradually dissipated.
sentences.chinese: 他想明白后，怒气就渐渐消了。

sentences.english: Little by little, the smoke was dissipated by the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 在微风的吹拂下烟雾渐渐地消散了。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually become less or weaker before disappearing completely, or to make something do this

detailed_translations.chinese: 使消散， 使消失， 驱散； 浪费， 挥霍
detailed_translations.english: to gradually become less or weaker before disappearing completely, or to make something do this

name: querulous
trans: 爱发牢骚的； 易怒的； 爱挑剔的

sentences.english: ‘But why can’t I go?’ he said in a querulous voice.
sentences.chinese: “可是为什么我不能去呢？”他抱怨道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 易怒的，暴躁的；爱发牢骚的，抱怨的；爱挑剔的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is querulous complains about things in an annoying way

sentences.english: He took out a metal flask from a canvas bag.
sentences.chinese: 他从帆布袋里拿出了一个金属水瓶。

detailed_translations.english: a special type of bottle that you use to keep liquids either hot or cold, for example when travelling

sentences.english: Prices are subject to fluctuation.
sentences.chinese: 价格可能会有波动。

detailed_translations.english: a change in a price, amount, level etc

sentences.english: Her impassive face showed no reaction at all.
sentences.chinese: 她表情冷淡，毫无反应。

detailed_translations.english: not showing any emotion

name: occult
trans: 神秘的， 玄妙的； 超自然的； 隐蔽的

sentences.english: occult practices
sentences.chinese: 神秘习俗

sentences.english: the occult powers
sentences.chinese: 超自然力量

detailed_translations.chinese: 神秘的；超自然的；难以理解的
detailed_translations.english: magical and mysterious
mysterious practices and powers involving magic and spirits

sentences.english: ...watching my mother and grandmothers doing needlework.
sentences.chinese: ...看我母亲和外祖母做针线活。

detailed_translations.english: the activity or art of sewing, or things made by sewing

sentences.english: I am athirst for faraway things.
sentences.chinese: 我渴望着遥远的事物。

sentences.english: I am restless. I am athirst for faraway things.
sentences.chinese: 我心绪不宁。我渴望着遥远的事物。

sentences.english: I will give unto him that is athirst of the fountain of the water of life freely.
sentences.chinese: 我要将生命泉的水白白赐给那口渴的人喝。

detailed_translations.english: having an eager desire; longing

name: simultaneous
trans: 同时的， 同时发生的

sentences.english: They grabbed each other’s hands in simultaneous panic.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩同时惊慌起来，相互抓住对方的手。

sentences.english: Up to twenty users can have simultaneous access to the system.
sentences.chinese: 最多可有20名用户同时登该系统。

sentences.english: The speeches will be broadcast live, with simultaneous translation (= immediate translation, as the person is speaking ) into English.
sentences.chinese: 这些演讲将作现场直播，并配有英语同声传译。

detailed_translations.english: things that are simultaneous happen at exactly the same time

sentences.english: We think of these strategies as having been in response to competition and in response to predation.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为，它们的这种生存策略是为了应对生存竞争和其他生物的捕食。

sentences.english: The fastest land animal in the world, cheetahs once thrived in Africa and Asia, but lion predation haunts their young, and farms and ranching have reduced their habitat.
sentences.chinese: 猎豹是陆地上速度最快的动物，曾在亚非大地上大量生长，但它们的幼兽常为狮子等捕食，栖息场所也因不断增加的农庄和牧场而缩减。

detailed_translations.english: when an animal kills and eats another animal

sentences.english: The bank will only lend me money if my parents guarantee the loan.
sentences.chinese: 只有我父母作担保，银行才会给我贷款。

sentences.english: I’m afraid there’s no guarantee of success.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕不能保证一定会成功。

detailed_translations.english: to promise that you will pay back money that someone else has borrowed, if they do not pay it back themselves
a formal promise that something will be done

sentences.english: As the nebula collapsed because of its gravity, it spun faster and flattened into a disk.
sentences.chinese: 随着由于重力引起的星云坍缩，它旋转得越来越快，并变成了盘状。

sentences.english: There is one other possible explanation for what scientists have seen: They could be watching the birth instead of a pulsar wind nebula.
sentences.chinese: 对于科学家的最新观察结果，还有其他解释：他们所看到的或许只是一个“脉冲星风星云”的诞生。

sentences.english: As for the spiral itself, current supposition is that this is the result of a star in a binary star system entering the planetary nebula phase, when its outer atmosphere is ejected.
sentences.chinese: 至于螺旋本身，最近的推测是这是双子星系统中的一个恒星进入行星星云阶段的结果，此时它的外层大气会被喷出。

detailed_translations.english: a mass of gas and dust among the stars, which often appears as a bright cloud in the sky at night

name: literal
trans: 文字的； 照字面上的， 无夸张的

sentences.english: In many cases, the people there are fighting, in a literal sense, for their homes.
sentences.chinese: 多数情况下，那里的人们实际上都是在为他们的家园而战斗。

detailed_translations.english: the literal meaning of a word or expression is its basic or original meaning

name: prodigious
trans: 庞大的； 惊异的； 奇妙的

sentences.english: the artist’s prodigious output
sentences.chinese: 那位艺术家惊人的高产

detailed_translations.chinese: 惊人的，异常的，奇妙的；巨大的
detailed_translations.english: very large or great in a surprising or impressive way

name: amorous
trans: 多情的， 恋爱的， 表示爱情的

sentences.english: She resisted his amorous advances .
sentences.chinese: 她拒绝了他的挑逗。

sentences.english: He was always boasting about his amorous adventures .
sentences.chinese: 他老是吹嘘自己的风流韵事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 多情的；恋爱的；热情的；色情的
detailed_translations.english: showing or concerning sexual love

sentences.english: Many towns allow recyclable items to be commingled for collection in a single container.
sentences.chinese: 在许多城镇，可回收物品可以混放在一个容器里统一收走。

detailed_translations.english: to mix together, or to make different things do this

sentences.english: The former investment banker has not been indolent: his department has been a factory for acronyms since the crisis began.
sentences.chinese: 这位前投资银行家并非懒惰，自危机开始以来，他的部门已成为加工厂的代称。

sentences.english: In a 1942 presentation at the New York Academy of Medicine, the scientists reported that after lobotomy, patients did sometimes become “indolent” or “outspoken.
sentences.chinese: 在1942年纽约医学专科学院的一个介绍会中，一些科学家提出，额叶切除术后，病人的确有时变得“懒惰”或“直言”。

detailed_translations.english: lazy

sentences.english: the shouts of street vendors
sentences.chinese: 街头小贩的吆喝声

detailed_translations.chinese: 卖主；小贩；供应商；[贸易] 自动售货机
detailed_translations.english: someone who sells things, especially on the street

name: mawkish
trans: 令人作恶的； 无味的

sentences.english: a mawkish love story
sentences.chinese: 无病呻吟的爱情故事

detailed_translations.chinese: 令人作呕的，令人厌恶的；自作多情的；淡而无味的
detailed_translations.english: showing too much emotion in a way that is embarrassing

name: attribute
trans: 把…归于； 认为…是…所为
属性； 品质； 特征

sentences.english: Women tend to attribute their success to external causes such as luck.
sentences.chinese: 女性往往把她们的成功归因于外因，如运气。

detailed_translations.english: If you attribute something to an event or situation, you think that it was caused by that event or situation
a quality or feature, especially one that is considered to be good or useful

name: repentant
trans: 后悔的， 悔改的； 有后悔表现的

sentences.english: He was feeling guilty and depressed, repentant and scared.
sentences.chinese: 他现在觉得既内疚又沮丧，既悔恨又害怕。

detailed_translations.english: sorry for something wrong that you have done

name: genetic
trans: 基因的， 遗传  的

sentences.english: genetic defects
sentences.chinese: 遗传性缺陷

sentences.english: each person’s genetic make-up
sentences.chinese: 每个人的遗传特征

sentences.english: genetic research
sentences.chinese: 基因研究

detailed_translations.english: relating to genes or genetics

name: triumph
trans: 狂喜； 胜利， 成功

sentences.english: All her life, Kelly had stuck with difficult tasks and challenges, and triumphed.
sentences.chinese: 凯利在一生中遭遇了种种艰巨任务与挑战，但成功了。

detailed_translations.english: If someone or something triumphs, they gain complete success, control, or victory, often after a long or difficult struggle
an important victory or success after a difficult struggle

detailed_translations.chinese: [眼科] 白内障；大瀑布；暴雨，洪水；奔流
detailed_translations.english: a medical condition that causes the  lens  of your eye to become white, so that you slowly lose your sight

sentences.english: We welcome this development and we look forward to early ratification of the treaty by China.
sentences.chinese: 我们欢迎这一进展并期望中国早日批准本条约。

detailed_translations.english: The ratification of a treaty or written agreement is the process of ratifying it

sentences.english: The plant makes alumina -- a derivative of the metal ore bauxite that is used to make aluminum.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂生产矾土。 矾土是金属矿石铝土矿的衍生品，用来制造金属铝。

detailed_translations.chinese: 矾土，[矿物] 铁铝氧石；[矿物] 铝土矿
detailed_translations.english: a soft substance that  aluminium  is obtained from

sentences.english: ...slick television ads touting the candidates.
sentences.chinese: …吹嘘那些候选人的华而不实的电视广告。

detailed_translations.chinese: 兜售；招徕；刺探赛马情报
detailed_translations.english: to try to persuade people to buy goods or services you are offering

sentences.english: There was a palpable sense of relief among the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 众人显然都感到如释重负。

detailed_translations.chinese: 明显的；可感知的；易觉察的
detailed_translations.english: a feeling that is palpable is so strong that other people notice it and can feel it around them

sentences.english: By a fortunate coincidence, a passer-by heard her cries for help.
sentences.chinese: 所幸正巧有个过路人听到了她的呼救。

detailed_translations.chinese: 幸运的；侥幸的；吉祥的；带来幸运的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is fortunate has something good happen to them, or is in a good situation

name: tour
trans: 旅行， 游览；  巡回演出， 巡回医疗；  任期

sentences.english: We met on a coach tour in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 我们是在意大利乘长途客车旅游时相识的。

detailed_translations.english: a journey for pleasure, during which you visit several different towns, areas etc

sentences.english: He was fairly easily persuaded .
sentences.chinese: 他很轻易就被说服了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 说服，劝说；使某人相信；劝某人做（不做）某事
detailed_translations.english: to make someone decide to do something, especially by giving them reasons why they should do it, or asking them many times to do it

name: consensus
trans: 一致同意； 多数人的意见； 舆论

sentences.english: The EU Council of Finance Ministers failed to reach a consensus on the pace of integration.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟财政部长会议未能就一体化的进度达成共识。

sentences.english: the current consensus of opinion
sentences.chinese: 目前观点上的一致

sentences.english: The general consensus was that technology was a good thing.
sentences.chinese: 大家都认为科技是好东西。

sentences.english: the consensus politics of the fifties
sentences.chinese: 50年代的共识政治

detailed_translations.english: an opinion that everyone in a group agrees with or accepts

name: exacting
trans: 苛求的， 严格的； 吃力的， 需付出极大耐心

sentences.english: She was an exacting woman to work for.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位对下属要求严格的女性。

detailed_translations.english: demanding a lot of effort, careful work, or skill

sentences.english: The worst reason to launch an attack would be a fear of seeming irresolute.
sentences.chinese: 发起攻击最坏的理由就是因为害怕看起来犹豫不决。

detailed_translations.chinese: 优柔寡断的；踌躇不定的；无决断的
detailed_translations.english: Someone who is irresolute cannot decide what to do

sentences.english: Can you explain to me the function of judicature?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我解释一下司法系统的功能吗？

sentences.english: And it is inadvisable to criminate the abettor separately by the aspect of legislation and judicature.
sentences.chinese: 在个罪意义的立法和司法操作中也不宜于对教唆犯单独定罪。

sentences.english: As to the permeation from moral to law, it is not only incarnated on legislation layer, but also obviously displayed on judicature layer.
sentences.chinese: 至于道德对法律领域的渗透 ，不仅体现在立法层面 ，在司法层面上亦是显而易见的。

detailed_translations.english: judges as a group, and the organization, power etc of the law

name: embellish
trans: 装饰， 美化； 添加细节

sentences.english: The boat was embellished with carvings in red and blue.
sentences.chinese: 这艘船饰有红、蓝雕刻。

detailed_translations.english: to make something more beautiful by adding decorations to it

name: retract
trans: 缩回， 缩进； 收回， 取消， 撤销

sentences.english: The sea otter can retract the claws on its front feet.
sentences.chinese: 海獭能缩回前掌上的爪子。

detailed_translations.english: if part of a machine or an animal’s body retracts or is retracted, it moves back into the main part

name: blazon
trans: 细致准确地绘制或描述

sentences.english: Contains a heraldic formula or phrase, typically found as part of a blazon , coat of arms, etc.
sentences.chinese: 包含一个纹章学的常规或词汇，通常是装饰、或盾形纹章等的一部分。

detailed_translations.english: a conventional description or depiction of heraldic arms

sentences.english: Drivers coming in the opposite direction swerved to avoid the bodies.
sentences.chinese: 从反方向过来的司机们突然转向以避开这些尸体。

sentences.english: He swung the car to the left and that swerve saved Malone's life.
sentences.chinese: 他把车猛转向左边，那一转救了马隆的命。

detailed_translations.english: to make a sudden sideways movement while moving forwards, usually in order to avoid hitting something
Swerve is also a noun

name: gossip
trans: 传播流言蜚语； 说长道短

sentences.english: Who knows how much of the gossip was true.
sentences.chinese: 有谁知道这些流言蜚语有多少是真的呢？

sentences.english: You must avoid gossip and focus on what you have to do.
sentences.chinese: 务必避免流言蜚语，关注你必须做的事务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 流言蜚语；爱说长道短的人
detailed_translations.english: information that is passed from one person to another about other people’s behaviour and private lives, often including unkind or untrue remarks

sentences.english: ‘Good of you to arrive on time,’ George said, with heavy sarcasm (= very clear sarcasm ) .
sentences.chinese: “你到得真准时啊。”乔治不加掩饰地挖苦道。

detailed_translations.english: a way of speaking or writing that involves saying the opposite of what you really mean in order to make an unkind joke or to show that you are annoyed

sentences.english: That's an antecedent standard. Moral desert.
sentences.chinese: 道德应得，那是一个先行标准。

sentences.english: Some patients state that lesions develop at the site of antecedent trauma.
sentences.chinese: 一些患者指出，病灶出现在先前的创伤部位。

sentences.english: The user can then explore the lattice by using specified criteria, such as support and confidence bounds, or by placing restrictions on the antecedent sequence.
sentences.chinese: 用户然后可以使用指定的条件（比如支持和置信界限），或在先前的序列上设置限制来分析该格子。

detailed_translations.english: an event, organization, or thing that is similar to the one you have mentioned but existed earlier

sentences.english: His novel has a didactic tone.
sentences.chinese: 他的小说有一种道德说教的口吻。

detailed_translations.english: speech or writing that is didactic is intended to teach people a moral lesson

sentences.english: ...a colloquial expression.
sentences.chinese: …一个口语表达法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 白话的；通俗的；口语体的
detailed_translations.english: language or words that are colloquial are used mainly in informal conversations rather than in writing or formal speech

sentences.english: Ella has done some sterling work.
sentences.chinese: 埃拉做了一些出色的工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 纯正的；英币的；纯银制的

detailed_translations.english: the standard unit of money in the United Kingdom, based on the pound

name: granular
trans: 由小粒而成的， 粒状的

sentences.english: ...a granular fertilizer.
sentences.chinese: ...一种粒状化肥。

detailed_translations.english: consisting of granules

sentences.english: fatuous questions
sentences.chinese: 愚昧的问题

detailed_translations.chinese: 愚笨的；昏庸的；发呆的；自满的
detailed_translations.english: very silly or stupid

name: incorporate
trans: 合并， 纳入， 结合

sentences.english: It allows you to harness existing technologies and incorporate them into one application.
sentences.chinese: 它允许您利用现有的技术并将它们合并到同一个应用程序中。

sentences.english: The next step is to generate the report and then incorporate it as an affiliated document of the master document.
sentences.chinese: 紧接着的步骤就是产生这个报告，然后将它作为主文档的附属文档与主文档合并。

sentences.english: an attempt to recapture the city
sentences.chinese: 收复这座城市的尝试

detailed_translations.chinese: 夺回；拿回；再体验；政府征收再经历
detailed_translations.english: to take control of a place again by fighting for it

detailed_translations.chinese: 夺回；取回；政府对公司超额收益或利润的征收

name: clemency
trans: 温和； 仁慈， 和蔼

sentences.english: The republican party has vociferously opposed any clemency for convicted terrorists.
sentences.chinese: 共和党已经高声反对给被判有罪的恐怖分子以任何仁慈。

detailed_translations.chinese: 温和； 仁慈， 宽厚
detailed_translations.english: forgiveness and less severe punishment for a crime

sentences.english: The minister pronounced the benediction.
sentences.chinese: 牧师做了赐福祈祷。

detailed_translations.chinese: 祝福；赐福；恩赐；祈求上帝赐福的仪式
detailed_translations.english: a Christian prayer that asks God to protect and help someone

name: reiterate
trans: 反复地说， 重申； 重做

sentences.english: Let me reiterate the most important points.
sentences.chinese: 我来把最重要的几点重申一遍。

detailed_translations.english: to repeat a statement or opinion in order to make your meaning as clear as possible

sentences.english: Decorate with orange segments.
sentences.chinese: 用几瓣橙子作点缀。

detailed_translations.english: a part of something that is different from or affected differently from the whole in some way

sentences.english: There is a sinister side to these events.
sentences.chinese: 这些事件有邪恶的一面。

sentences.english: He was a handsome man, in a sinister sort of way.
sentences.chinese: 他英俊的外貌中带着一点阴险。

sentences.english: a sinister atmosphere
sentences.chinese: 不祥的气氛

detailed_translations.chinese: 阴险的；凶兆的；灾难性的；左边的
detailed_translations.english: making you feel that something evil, dangerous, or illegal is happening or will happen

sentences.english: dark menacing clouds
sentences.chinese: 可怕的乌云

sentences.english: a low menacing laugh
sentences.chinese: 带威胁的低声一笑

sentences.english: His tone grew more menacing.
sentences.chinese: 他的语气越来越可怕。

detailed_translations.english: making you expect something unpleasant

sentences.english: The political pendulum has swung in favour of the liberals.
sentences.chinese: 政治的钟摆已经摆向了自由派。

detailed_translations.english: a long metal stick with a weight at the bottom that swings regularly from side to side to control the working of a clock

sentences.english: The mission will also observe clouds and aerosol particles in the troposphere.
sentences.chinese: 此次任务还将观测对流层中的云和气溶胶粒子。

sentences.chinese: 氯氟甲烷主要使用在气溶胶喷雾罐和作为冷冻剂。

sentences.english: They also found that new aerosol particles — ultrafine particles suspended in the atmosphere — can form at these heights.
sentences.chinese: 他们还发现新的气溶胶颗粒——悬浮在大气中的超细颗粒——可以在这个高度形成。

name: termination
trans: 结局； 末端， 终点

sentences.english: This includes initialization, sharing resources, and resource termination or resource clean up.
sentences.chinese: 这包括初始化、共享资源及终止资源或清理资源。

sentences.chinese: 用一个终止节点结束流程的每个分支，或在分支结束时提供数据作为输出，这也是一种很好的建模方法。

sentences.english: Teachers today are threatened with termination or transfer if they dare to even hint that there could be another option in the scientific world, regarding where and how life originated on this planet.
sentences.chinese: 今天的老师如果他们胆敢在科学的世界里有另一种选择。 他们将被恐吓终止或是转移这样的想法，关于在这星球上生命是在哪和怎样起源的？

detailed_translations.english: the act of ending something, or the end of something

sentences.english: The food was superb.
sentences.chinese: 食物好吃极了。

sentences.english: superb weather

trans: 复原； 逆行； 使倒退

sentences.chinese: 如果你的孩子退步到幼稚的行为，你可以肯定的是孩子正处在压力之下。

name: duplicate
trans: 复制的， 二重的， 二倍的
复写， 复制， 使加倍

detailed_translations.english: exactly the same as something, or made as an exact copy of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 完全一样的东西，复制品
detailed_translations.english: an exact copy of something that you can use in the same way

If you say that a particular conclusion is surmise, you mean that it is a guess based on the available evidence and you do not know for certain that it is true

sentences.english: Conservationists say the law must be strengthened.

sentences.chinese: 如果这是一个围绕，地球的椭圆形轨道，那么这是近地点，这是远地点。

sentences.chinese: 呼吸系统的主要功用是提供空气到肺的通路及气体交换的场所。

sentences.chinese: 她把小姑娘抱起来，搂在怀里。 她们俩在光明和快乐飞走了，越飞越高，飞到既没有寒冷，又没有饥饿和痛苦的地方，因为她们来到了极乐世界。

sentences.chinese: 一个五十岁出头的矮胖男人

sentences.chinese: 对于如果网站对内容不收费这些内容的质量是否会变差的调查有矛盾：34%的人认为会变差，同时30%的认为不会，而36%的人没有固定的意见。

sentences.english: Looking back on it, I can see how the statement looked ambivalent and a touch arrogant, but it was an honest expression of how I felt, as I began the first campaign since 1982 that I could have lost.
sentences.chinese: 现在回头想想，我能够看出，在这个声明中，我所流露出的矛盾心理和些许的傲慢，但它确实是我内心感受的真实表达，因为这是自1982年以来，我第一次开始进行可能会失利的竞选活动。

detailed_translations.english: not sure whether you want or like something or not

trans: 清晰的， 明确的， 清楚的； 直率的， 不含糊的

sentences.chinese: 中文翻译：那小孩一看到满屋子都是陌生人， 感到非常局促不安。

sentences.chinese: 与其他增塑剂混用，可以克服挥发性大和低温结晶化等缺点。

sentences.english: On arrival, she buys a glass factory on a whim, and challenges him to transport a church built entirely of glass by boat from Sydney 250 miles up the coast.

sentences.english: An idle whim, I fear, sir,' was my answer; `or else an idle whim is going to spirit me away.
sentences.chinese: “恐怕是一种无聊的奇想，先生，”这是我的回答，“不然就是一种无聊的奇想又要诱使我走开。

trans: 泛滥，  溢出，  充溢

of, relating to, or resembling a salutation

sentences.chinese: 而我本人也即将出海，乘着双桅船，和一个吹哨子的水手长以及留着辫子、唱着歌的水手们一道出海； 出海，驶向一个不知名的岛，去寻找埋藏着的宝藏！

sentences.chinese: 他不想提问让她尴尬。

sentences.chinese: 有多种选择。

sentences.chinese: 这并非是他的唯一选择。

sentences.chinese: 少女妈妈往往别无选择，只能与父母同住。

sentences.chinese: 单身父母在社会上的名声不光彩。

sentences.chinese: 如果一艘武装到牙齿的舰船其雷达和声纳是不合格的，那能好到哪里？

sentences.chinese: 在雷达、声纳和超声的开发工作中，他进行了所有的必要测试，并提供了所需的一切论证。

sentences.chinese: 英国国防部的一位发言人表示：“皇家海军能证明他们并没有在这一海域使用声纳，而且他们在这片水域逗留的时间也不长。

sentences.chinese: 最轻微的运动都会使显微镜散焦。

sentences.chinese: 反对党领导人说政府的计划就像“一场闹剧”。

trans: 候选人； 候补者； 报考者

sentences.chinese: 总统候选人

sentences.chinese: 这次考试的应试者不可以使用计算器。
