sentences.chinese: 一个黑色的金属小盒子

sentences.english: They traded in gold and other precious metals (= valuable metals used especially for making jewellery ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们做黄金和其他贵金属的交易。

sentences.english: The old trucks were sold as scrap metal (= old metal that is melted and used again ) .
sentences.chinese: 这些旧卡车被当作金属废料卖掉了。

detailed_translations.english: a hard, usually shiny substance such as iron, gold, or steel

sentences.english: I can’t believe he had the audacity to ask me for more money!
sentences.chinese: 我真不敢相信，他竟胆敢还向我要钱！

detailed_translations.english: the quality of having enough courage to take risks or say impolite things

sentences.english: Although the European perspective has been instrumental in guiding young democracies out of the grip of authoritarianism and autarchy, this power to transform the fringe is slipping.
sentences.chinese: 尽管欧洲一直以来对指引新的民主国家脱离专政与独裁起到了帮助作用，但是，这种能够改变外围的力量正处在不稳定中。

detailed_translations.english: unlimited rule; autocracy

sentences.english: To study germination characteristics of Mirabilis jalapa and Althaea rosea by soaking their dormant seeds.
sentences.chinese: 摘要对紫茉莉和蜀葵休眠种子浸种处理研究其发芽特性。

sentences.english: Abstract: To study germination characteristics of Mirabilis jalapa and Althaea rosea by soaking their dormant seeds.
sentences.chinese: 摘要对紫茉莉和蜀葵休眠种子浸种处理研究其发芽特性。

sentences.english: Spring gis coming, all things recovery, willow twigs of already germination, the swallow flew back from the south, depression of the earth again full of vitality.
sentences.chinese: 春天到了，万物复苏，杨柳的嫩枝已经发芽了，燕子从南方飞了回来，萧条的大地又开始充满生机。

sentences.english: It would cost a fortune to make the place habitable.
sentences.chinese: 要想让这个地方可以住人得花一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.english: good enough for people to live in

sentences.english: She had seen herself repeatedly maligned in the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 她看到自己在报纸上一再受到诽谤。

sentences.english: a much maligned politician
sentences.chinese: 一个备受中伤的政治家

detailed_translations.english: to say unpleasant things about someone that are untrue
harmful

sentences.english: They lay on the firm sands, listening to the plaintive cry of the seagulls.
sentences.chinese: 他们躺在坚实的沙滩上，听着海鸥的哀鸣。

detailed_translations.english: a plaintive sound is high, like someone crying, and sounds sad

sentences.english: a lively child
sentences.chinese: 精力充沛的孩子

detailed_translations.chinese: 活泼的；生动的；真实的；生气勃勃的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is lively has a lot of energy and is very active

name: malleable
trans: 有延展性的， 可锻的； 易受影响的， 能根据环境的变化而调整的， 适应的

sentences.english: malleable steel
sentences.chinese: 展性钢

detailed_translations.chinese: 可锻的；可塑的；有延展性的；易适应的
detailed_translations.english: something that is malleable is easy to press or pull into a new shape

name: supplement
trans: 补角， 指两角之和为180度

sentences.english: vitamins and other dietary supplements
sentences.chinese: 各种维生素和其他膳食补充剂

detailed_translations.chinese: 增补， 补充； 增刊， 副刊
detailed_translations.english: something that you add to something else to improve it or make it complete
to add something, especially to what you earn or eat, in order to increase it to an acceptable level

sentences.english: Making some simple alterations to your diet will make you feel fitter.
sentences.chinese: 对你的饮食做一些简单的改变会使你感觉更健康。

detailed_translations.english: a small change that makes someone or something slightly different, or the process of this change

sentences.english: In systems such as this we also often find that there are either no tests around this configuration code, or the tests that do exist are brittle and/or not realistic.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的系统中，我们经常会发现对于这些配置代码没有进行测试，或者尽管存在测试，但它很脆弱且/或不切实际。

sentences.english: But while our screens are brittle, theirs is flexible––at what they say is one tenth the price.
sentences.chinese: 但我们的屏幕都很脆弱，他们的却很柔软，而且价钱是我们的十分之一。

name: affinity
trans: 构造相似； 特点相近； 密切关系

sentences.english: He has a close affinity with the landscape and people he knew when he was growing up.
sentences.chinese: 他对他成长过程中所熟悉的景色和人们有一种很强的亲切感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 密切关系；吸引力；姻亲关系；类同
detailed_translations.english: a close relationship between two things because of qualities or features that they share

sentences.english: ...the largest gypsy community of any country.
sentences.chinese: …所有国家中最大的吉卜赛人社区。

detailed_translations.chinese: 吉卜赛人；吉卜赛语；像吉布赛的人；歌舞剧中的歌舞队员
detailed_translations.english: a member of a group of people originally from India, who traditionally live and travel around in  caravans  , and who now live all over the world. Most gypsies prefer to be called  romanies  .

detailed_translations.chinese: 象吉卜赛人的；吉卜赛人的；无照的
detailed_translations.english: Gypsy is also an adjective

name: pedestal
trans: 基座， 台座， 柱脚

sentences.english: ...a larger than life-sized bronze statue on a granite pedestal.
sentences.chinese: …在花岗岩基座上的一尊比真人大的铜像。

detailed_translations.english: A pedestal is the base on which something such as a statue stands

sentences.english: In the wide wide world there might be found another, his equal in pertinacity, but never in this little lane of ours.
sentences.chinese: 在这个广袤的世界里，也许可以找到另外一个跟他一样执拗的人，但是在我们这个小巷子里根本不可能。

sentences.english: An expert problem-solver must be endowed with two incompatiblequalities – a restless imagination and a patient pertinacity.
sentences.chinese: 一个解决问题的专家必须要具备两项矛盾的品质——天马行空的想象力以及不撞南墙不回头的顽固精神。

sentences.english: The difficulty for new growth mode to emerge reflects the pertinacity of traditional mode, the ability of traditional mode to remain unfailing lies in its solid institutional base.
sentences.chinese: 新增长模式的难产反映了传统模式的顽固，而传统模式的经久不衰，又在于它深厚的制度根基。

sentences.english: She was trying to get her thoughts back into some semblance of order .
sentences.chinese: 她想稍微理出个头绪来。

sentences.english: After the war, life returned to a semblance of normality.
sentences.chinese: 战后，生活稍微恢复了正常。

detailed_translations.english: a situation, condition etc that is close to or similar to a particular one, usually a good one

sentences.english: Wherefore, I strongly advise you, my lords, to put aside all care and solicitude and to receive readily the most holy Body and Blood of our Lord Jesus Christ in holy commemoration of Him.
sentences.chinese: 为此，我强烈地建议你们，大人，把（对此世的）关心和渴望放到一边并接受我们的主基督在祂神圣的纪念仪式中已经是最神圣的身体和血。

name: admonish
trans: 劝告， 训诫， 警告

sentences.english: They admonished me for taking risks with my health.
sentences.chinese: 他们告诫我不要拿自己的健康来冒险。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone severely that they have done something wrong

sentences.english: It can give you the ability to store indefinitely your session data where it can be retrieved not only after a restart, but from any of a number of machines in a cluster.
sentences.chinese: 它可以给予您无限地存储会话数据的能力，使您的会话数据不仅可以在重新启动后检索，还可以从群集中许多机器中的任意一个检索。

sentences.english: Assuming the systems keep operating, like I've said, we can command the vehicle from the ground and operate it fine, and remain on orbit indefinitely.
sentences.chinese: 假定系统继续运行，我和所说的那样，我们可以很好地从地面指挥和操作飞船，使它无限期地留在轨道上。

detailed_translations.english: without giving clear or exact details

name: gibberish
trans: 快速而含混不清的言语， 胡言乱语

sentences.english: When he was talking to a girl he could hardly speak, and when he did speak he talked gibberish.
sentences.chinese: 跟女孩讲话时，他几乎说不出来，好不容易说出来了，又都是些胡言乱语。

detailed_translations.chinese: 乱语；快速而不清楚的言语
detailed_translations.english: If you describe someone's words or ideas as gibberish, you mean that they do not make any sense

name: occurrence
trans: 发生， 出现； 事件， 事故， 发生的事情

sentences.english: The greatest occurrence of coronary heart disease is in those over 65.
sentences.chinese: 冠心病的最高发病率在65岁以上的人群中。

sentences.english: Complaints seemed to be an everyday occurrence.
sentences.chinese: 投诉似乎成了天天发生的事。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of something happening

sentences.english: ...Christmas trees decorated with coloured baubles.
sentences.chinese: ... 装饰着五颜六色小饰物的圣诞树。

detailed_translations.chinese: 小玩意；美观而无价值的饰物
detailed_translations.english: a cheap piece of jewellery

name: recede
trans: 退， 退去， 渐渐远去； 向后倾斜； 缩进

sentences.english: The flood waters finally began to recede in November.
sentences.chinese: 11 月，洪水终于开始退去。

detailed_translations.english: if water recedes, it moves back from an area that it was covering

name: delegate
trans: 委派  …为代表； 授 ， 把…委托给

sentences.english: Around 350 delegates attended the conference.
sentences.chinese: 大约有350名代表参加了大会。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been elected or chosen to speak, vote, or take decisions for a group

detailed_translations.chinese: 委派…为代表； 授 ， 把…委托给
detailed_translations.english: to choose someone to do a particular job, or to be a representative of a group, organization etc

name: literature
trans: 文学； 文学作品； 文献

sentences.english: He has read many of the major works of literature.
sentences.chinese: 他读过许多重要的文学作品。

sentences.english: Italian literature
sentences.chinese: 意大利文学

sentences.english: literature on the history of science
sentences.chinese: 科学史的文献资料

detailed_translations.chinese: 文学，文学作品；文献；文献
detailed_translations.english: books, plays, poems etc that people think are important and good

sentences.english: Because the earth spins, it is not a perfect sphere.
sentences.chinese: 因为地球旋转，所以它不是个完完全全的球体。

detailed_translations.english: a ball shape

detailed_translations.chinese: 包围；放入球内；使…成球形

sentences.english: Most babies can digest a wide range of food easily.
sentences.chinese: 大多数婴儿能轻易地消化很多种食物。

sentences.english: I struggled to digest the news.
sentences.chinese: 我费力地琢磨着那条新闻。

sentences.english: a monthly news digest
sentences.chinese: 每月新闻摘要

detailed_translations.english: to change food that you have just eaten into substances that your body can use
a short piece of writing that gives the most important facts from a book, report etc

sentences.english: He spoke in a quiet melodious voice.
sentences.chinese: 他说话的声音轻柔悦耳。

detailed_translations.english: something that sounds melodious sounds like music or has a pleasant tune

sentences.english: Extensive mining will cause irreparable damage to the area.
sentences.chinese: 大量采矿会对该地区造成无法弥补的损害。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不能挽回的；不能修补的
detailed_translations.english: irreparable damage, harm etc is so bad that it can never be repaired or made better

sentences.english: The torrent, swollen by the melting snow, plunges into a tremendous abyss.
sentences.chinese: 因融化的雪水而高涨的急流泻入一个巨大的深渊之中。

detailed_translations.english: a deep empty hole in the ground

name: belief
trans: 信仰， 信条； 相信， 信念

sentences.english: a strong belief in God
sentences.chinese: 笃信上帝

sentences.english: When you get something wrong, it can shake your belief in yourself.
sentences.chinese: 如果有什么事情没做好，就会动摇你对自己的信心。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that something is definitely true or definitely exists

name: veto
trans: 否决〔尤指他人或其他组织已赞同之事〕

sentences.english: The Senate had a sufficient majority to override the presidential veto (= not accept his refusal ).
sentences.chinese: 参议院有足够的多数票可以推翻总统的否决。

detailed_translations.english: a refusal to give official permission for something, or the right to refuse to give such permission
if someone in authority vetoes something, they refuse to allow it to happen, especially something that other people or organizations have agreed

sentences.english: If you lift up a heavy rock, you may find a centipede living under it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你举起一块大石，可能会发现底下有蜈蚣。

sentences.english: "To tell you the truth", said the centipede, "I do not manage them at all.
sentences.chinese: “说实话，”蜈蚣说，“我根本就不打理它们。”

sentences.english: There was once a one-legged dragon who said to the centipede, "How do you manage all those legs?
sentences.chinese: 从前有一条独脚龙，它对蜈蚣说：“这么多腿你管得过来吗？

detailed_translations.english: a small creature like a  worm  with a lot of very small legs

sentences.english: The band came back onstage for an encore.
sentences.chinese: 乐队回到台上加演了一曲。

detailed_translations.chinese: 再演唱的要求；经要求而再唱

name: exuberant
trans: 繁茂的； 丰富的； 兴高采烈的， 热情洋溢的

sentences.english: exube-rant carvings
sentences.chinese: 充满生气的雕刻品

detailed_translations.chinese: 繁茂的；生气勃勃的，充溢的
detailed_translations.english: exuberant decorations, patterns etc are exciting and complicated or colourful

sentences.english: a proficient typist
sentences.chinese: 熟练的打字员

detailed_translations.english: able to do something well or skilfully

sentences.english: a Holocaust remembrance
sentences.chinese: 大屠杀纪念

detailed_translations.chinese: 回想，回忆；纪念品；记忆力
detailed_translations.english: a memory that you have of a person or event

name: halve
trans: 把…平分为二； 将…减半

sentences.english: Cash cuts have halved the number of places available on training courses.
sentences.chinese: 经费削减使培训名额减少了一半。

detailed_translations.english: to reduce something by a half

sentences.english: She’s really obnoxious.
sentences.chinese: 她这人真讨厌。

sentences.english: an obnoxious idea
sentences.chinese: 令人作呕的念头

sentences.english: obnoxious odours
sentences.chinese: 难闻的气味

detailed_translations.chinese: 讨厌的；可憎的；不愉快的
detailed_translations.english: very offensive, unpleasant, or rude

sentences.english: a penitent expression
sentences.chinese: 愧疚的表情

detailed_translations.english: feeling sorry because you have done something wrong, and are intending not to do it again
someone who is doing  penance

name: impromptu
trans: 即席演出， 即兴之作

sentences.english: When do we make impromptu speeches?
sentences.chinese: 我们什么时候要做即席演讲？

sentences.english: When Marco was asked to give an impromptu speech on“Addictions,”he divided the topic /into/ several parts. Notice how he used the pattern of related subtopics in the outline that follows.
sentences.chinese: 举个例子，马可要做一个关于“嗜好”的即席演讲，他将这个主题分成了几部分，注意下面他在大纲中是如何运用有关联副主题模式的。

detailed_translations.english: done or said without any preparation or planning

sentences.english: For once, his usually verbose wife was content to listen.
sentences.chinese: 他那个一贯唠叨的老婆难得一次愿意倾听。

sentences.english: Legal writing is often unclear and verbose.
sentences.chinese: 法律文书往往措辞含糊，行文冗长。

detailed_translations.english: using or containing too many words

sentences.english: This is the energy of an ultraviolet photon, a "large" energy on the atomic scale .
sentences.chinese: 这是一个紫外光子的能量，在原子尺度上，它是一个“大”能量。

sentences.english: This in turn left its mark on the polarization of the next photon, so amplifying the signal.
sentences.chinese: 光子就这样轮流地将它的偏振标记留给下一个光子，因而增强了信号。

sentences.english: The light from these dim objects arrives at a trickle of only one photon per minute in each square centimeter.
sentences.chinese: 当这些昏暗物体发出的光抵达地球，在每平方公分内每分钟只有一个光子。

detailed_translations.english: a unit of  energy  that carries light and has  zero mass

name: slender
trans: 修长的， 苗条的； 微小的， 微薄的

sentences.english: She is slender and stylish.
sentences.chinese: 她身材修长，穿着时髦。

sentences.english: The company only has a slender hope of survival.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司维持下去的希望很渺茫。

detailed_translations.english: thin in an attractive or graceful way

sentences.english: What time does the train reach the terminus?
sentences.chinese: 火车什么时间到达终点站?。

sentences.english: Trains vomit out crowds of passengers at a terminus.
sentences.chinese: 成群的旅客在终点站从列车中挤出来。

sentences.english: Casablanca was the terminus of a long rickety railway line .
sentences.chinese: 卡莎布兰卡是一长而软弱的铁路线的终点。

detailed_translations.english: the station or stop at the end of a railway or bus line

name: compensate
trans: 偿还， 补偿， 付报酬

sentences.english: the government’s promise to compensate victims of the flood
sentences.chinese: 政府对水灾灾民给予补偿的许诺

sentences.english: The firm will compensate workers for their loss of earnings.
sentences.chinese: 公司将补偿工人的收入损失。

detailed_translations.english: to pay someone money because they have suffered injury, loss, or damage

detailed_translations.chinese: 专员，公使；使馆随员；大使馆专员

name: conscious
trans: 意识到的， 自觉的； 有意识的， 神志清醒的

sentences.english: I became conscious of someone watching me.
sentences.chinese: 我察觉到有人在监视我。

sentences.english: a conscious act of cruelty
sentences.chinese: 有意而为的残暴行径

detailed_translations.english: noticing or realizing something

sentences.english: You might expect politicians to smooth things out when civil servants are being dilatory.
sentences.chinese: 当公务员办事拖拉时，你可能期望政治家们能够把事情顺利解决。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拖拉的；缓慢的，不慌不忙的
detailed_translations.english: slow in doing something

sentences.english: ...tons of malodorous rubbish bags.
sentences.chinese: …散发恶臭的数吨垃圾袋。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有恶臭的；令人极为反感的；不合法的
detailed_translations.english: smelling unpleasant

sentences.english: The teacher gives public recognition, the animadversion has never appeared her name as well.
sentences.chinese: 老师表扬、 批评也从未出现过她的名字。

sentences.english: But , suffer in the " Barbie " public extensive welcome of at the same time, also suffered the animadversion from everyone's.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在“芭比”受到公众广泛欢迎的同时，也受到了来自各方面的批评。

detailed_translations.english: criticism or censure

sentences.english: a prodigal lifestyle
sentences.chinese: 奢侈的生活方式

detailed_translations.english: spending money, wasting time etc in a careless way
someone who spends money carelessly and wastes their time – used humorously

sentences.english: He had always been an outcast, unwanted and alone.
sentences.chinese: 他一直是个被排斥的人，无人理睬，孤孤单单。

detailed_translations.english: An outcast is someone who is not accepted by a group of people or by society

detailed_translations.chinese: 被遗弃的；无家可归的；被逐出的

sentences.english: a large, placid baby
sentences.chinese: 一个胖胖的、安静的婴儿

sentences.english: She sat still, placid and waiting.
sentences.chinese: 她安安静静坐着等候。

detailed_translations.english: a placid person does not often get angry or upset and does not usually mind doing what other people want them to

sentences.english: ‘Please, Vic, come with us,’ Nancy coaxed.
sentences.chinese: “求你了，维克，跟我们一起去吧。”南希哄劝道。

detailed_translations.english: to persuade someone to do something that they do not want to do by talking to them in a kind, gentle, and patient way

sentences.english: He gave a sigh of contentment , and fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 他满意地舒了口气后就睡着了。

sentences.english: a feeling of deep contentment
sentences.chinese: 深深的满足感

detailed_translations.english: the state of being happy and satisfied

name: beatify
trans: 使享福；  为  行宣福礼

sentences.english: In May, Pope John Paul is to beatify Gianna Beretta.
sentences.chinese: 五月份，约翰·保罗教皇将为吉娜·伯莱塔宣福。

detailed_translations.english: if the Pope beatifies someone, he says officially that they are a holy or special person

name: laudable
trans: 值得赞美的， 值得称赞的

sentences.english: a laudable attempt
sentences.chinese: 值得称道的尝试

detailed_translations.english: deserving praise, even if not completely successful

sentences.english: Put the eggs in the centre of the dish, with the vegetables and herbs around the edge.
sentences.chinese: 把鸡蛋放在盘子中间，盘边一圈放些蔬菜和香草。

sentences.english: He stood at the water’s edge staring across the lake.
sentences.chinese: 他站在水边，凝视着湖对面。

sentences.english: A leaf was on the ground, curling up at the edges.
sentences.chinese: 地上有一片叶子，叶边卷曲着。

sentences.english: a knife with a sharp edge
sentences.chinese: 刀刃锋利的小刀

detailed_translations.english: the part of an object that is furthest from its centre

name: brotherhood
trans: 手足情谊， 兄弟关系

sentences.english: the spirit of brotherhood
sentences.chinese: 互爱精神

detailed_translations.chinese: 兄弟关系；手足情谊；四海之内皆兄弟的信念
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of friendship between people

sentences.english: She wore a white blouse and a plain black skirt.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着白衬衣和纯黑的裙子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of outer clothing worn by women and girls, which hangs down from the waist like the bottom part of a dress
to avoid talking about an important subject, especially because it is difficult or embarrassing – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: He directed an orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 他指挥一个管弦乐队。

sentences.english: She conducted an orchestra of forty instruments.
sentences.chinese: 她在一个拥有40种乐器的管弦乐队里当指挥。

name: widespread
trans: 分布广泛的， 普遍的

sentences.english: the widespread use of chemicals in agriculture
sentences.chinese: 化学品在农业中的广泛使用

detailed_translations.english: existing or happening in many places or situations, or among many people

sentences.english: an antique rosewood desk
sentences.chinese: 古董红木书桌

detailed_translations.chinese: 古老的，年代久远的；过时的，古董的；古风的，古式的
detailed_translations.english: antique furniture, jewellery etc is old and often valuable

detailed_translations.chinese: 古董，古玩；古风，古希腊和古罗马艺术风格
detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture, jewellery etc that was made a very long time ago and is therefore valuable

name: asexual
trans: 无性的； 无性生殖的

sentences.english: asexual reproduction
sentences.chinese: 无性繁殖

detailed_translations.chinese: [生物] 无性的；无性生殖的
detailed_translations.english: not having sexual organs or not involving sex

sentences.english: Daniel seems very morose and gloomy.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔好像闷闷不乐，情绪低落。

detailed_translations.english: bad-tempered, unhappy, and silent

name: toxic
trans: 有毒的， 因中毒引起的

sentences.english: fumes from a toxic waste dump
sentences.chinese: 有毒废料堆产生的毒气

sentences.english: a highly toxic pesticide
sentences.chinese: 毒性很强的杀虫剂

detailed_translations.english: containing poison, or caused by poisonous substances

name: coalescence
trans: 合并， 接合； 联合

sentences.english: The stability of any foam ultimately relies on the hindrance of bubble coalescence.
sentences.chinese: 任何泡沫的稳定性归根到底都依赖于阻止泡泡们的合并。

sentences.english: Eventually, our group began to coalesce with other anti-abortion groups. The coalescence gave us a stronger voice, but we also lost an element of control over the group’s activities.
sentences.chinese: 后来，我们的组织开始联合其他反堕胎组织，这一联合使我们的呼声更具威力，但组织活动还缺少些许控制。

sentences.english: He writes, "Convergence involved the coalescence of various deities, and or some of their features into the figure of Yahweh" There's a period of convergence and blending of the deities.
sentences.chinese: 他写到“集合包括多个神灵的合并，他们的一些特别最终集合于耶和华“,有过一段众神集合混杂的时期。

name: contest
trans: 争论， 争辩， 竞赛， 争夺
竞争， 竞赛， 比赛

sentences.english: Stone decided to hold a contest to see who could write the best song.
sentences.chinese: 斯通决定举行一场比赛，看谁能够写出最佳歌曲。

sentences.english: I only entered the contest for fun.
sentences.chinese: 我只是为了好玩才参加这次比赛的。

sentences.english: It is clear that the election will be a close contest .
sentences.chinese: 显然这次选举将是一场难分高下的角逐。

sentences.english: the 1975 Liberal leadership contest
sentences.chinese: 1975年自由党的领导权之争

detailed_translations.english: a competition or a situation in which two or more people or groups are competing with each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 争夺， 与…竞争； 对…提出质疑， 辩驳
detailed_translations.english: to say formally that you do not accept something or do not agree with it

sentences.english: She lived through the turmoil of the French Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 她经历过法国大革命的混乱之后仍旧活着。

detailed_translations.english: a state of confusion, excitement, or anxiety

sentences.english: There were basically complete organelle structure in matural oocyte .
sentences.chinese: 成熟卵子内已有基本完整的细胞器结构。

sentences.english: There is distinct nucleolus the naked nucleus and some dispersed organelle as lysosome around the nucleus.
sentences.chinese: 电镜下裸核有明显核仁，核周围有溶酶体等散落的细胞器。

sentences.english: Functional aspects of nuclear: : It is the largest organelle in the cell and the place for genetic storage, replication and transcription.
sentences.chinese: 细胞核的功能： 细胞核是真核细胞中最大的细胞器，也是遗传物质储存、复制和转录的场所。

detailed_translations.english: a structural and functional unit, such as a mitochondrion, in a cell or unicellular organism

sentences.english: Your carelessness will overleap yourself!
sentences.chinese: 你过于粗心大意，这会毁了你!

sentences.english: An exact diagnosis can only be made by obtaining a blood sample.
sentences.chinese: 只有抽取血样才能作出准确的诊断。

detailed_translations.english: the process of discovering exactly what is wrong with someone or something, by examining them closely

name: doctrinaire
trans: 空谈家； 教条主义者

sentences.english: The party followed an increasingly doctrinaire course.
sentences.chinese: 该政党走的是一条越来越教条的路线。

detailed_translations.chinese: 教条主义的；空谈理论的
detailed_translations.english: certain that your beliefs or opinions are correct and unwilling to change them

detailed_translations.chinese: 教条主义者；空论家，纯理论家

sentences.english: Three plus six equals nine (3+6=9).
sentences.chinese: 3 加6等于9。

sentences.english: The total cost was $10,000, plus 14% interest.
sentences.chinese: 全部费用是1万美元，外加14%的利息。

sentences.english: Daytime temperatures barely reached plus 5˚.
sentences.chinese: 白天的气温仅零上5度。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that one number or amount is added to another
more than zero – used especially when talking about temperatures

sentences.english: In 1162 Milan was razed to the ground by imperial troops.
sentences.chinese: 1162年米兰被帝国军队夷为平地。

detailed_translations.chinese: 夷为平地；破坏；消除；拆毁
detailed_translations.english: to completely destroy a town or building

sentences.english: No special license will be regranted to anyone from now on.
sentences.chinese: 特殊许可证今后不得向任何人再行发放。

sentences.english: Remind me to renew the driver's license.It will lapse next month.
sentences.chinese: 提醒我更换驾驶执照，它下个月就失效了。

sentences.english: The next time the client connects to the server, it will obtain another license.
sentences.chinese: 在客户端下一次连接到服务器时，它将获得另一个许可证。

detailed_translations.english: to give official permission for someone to do or produce something, or for an activity to take place

name: expand
trans: 膨胀，  扩张； 张开， 展开

sentences.english: Water expands as it freezes.
sentences.chinese: 水结冰时会膨胀。

sentences.english: Sydney’s population expanded rapidly in the 1960s.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪60年代，悉尼的人口迅速增加。

sentences.english: exercises that expand the chest muscles
sentences.chinese: 扩展胸肌的运动

sentences.english: his expanding waistline
sentences.chinese: 他那逐渐增大的腰围

detailed_translations.english: to become larger in size, number, or amount, or to make something become larger

sentences.english: Wilson was claiming compensation for unfair dismissal .
sentences.chinese: 威尔逊正在就无理解雇要求赔偿。

sentences.english: No dismissals have been announced yet.
sentences.chinese: 尚未宣布有人被解雇。

detailed_translations.english: when someone is removed from their job

sentences.english: Referring to the main picture above, the two anode connections uppermost form a 50 ohm balanced line from where the output power is extracted.
sentences.chinese: 表示主要的照片上方，二个阳极连接在最上形成被平衡线的一个50 欧姆从输出力量被摘录哪里。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring electrical resistance

sentences.english: The home team squandered a number of chances in the first half.
sentences.chinese: 主队在上半场浪费了几次机会。

detailed_translations.english: to carelessly waste money, time, opportunities etc

sentences.english: ...the perimeter of the airport.
sentences.chinese: …机场周边。

detailed_translations.chinese: 周长；周界；[眼科] 视野计
detailed_translations.english: the whole length of the border around an area or shape

sentences.english: High spiking fever with chills is suggestive of a complicating pylephlebitis.
sentences.chinese: 伴有寒战的高热，暗示合并门静脉炎。

sentences.english: In addition, "small forest (omit 27 words)" sexually suggestive language was also netizen criticism.
sentences.chinese: 此外，“小树林（省略27个字）”等性暗示语言也遭到网友批判。

sentences.english: A double promise revealed by some suggestive event of both immediate or literal and sentimental significance.
sentences.chinese: 一些直接的或间接的重要心理暗示揭示了双重的允诺。

detailed_translations.english: similar to something

sentences.english: She bent down to retrieve her earring.
sentences.chinese: 她俯身去捡回耳环。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重新得到， 取回， 收回； 挽回， 补救； 检索
detailed_translations.english: to find something and bring it back

name: cantata
trans: 清唱剧； 康塔塔； 大合唱

detailed_translations.chinese: 大合唱；（意）清唱剧；康塔塔（一种声乐套曲）
detailed_translations.english: a piece of religious music for singers and instruments

sentences.english: James bore her no malice (= did not feel any malice towards her ) .
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯对她并无恶意。

detailed_translations.english: the desire to harm someone because you hate them

sentences.english: The thermometer registered over 100˚C.
sentences.chinese: 温度计显示高于100摄氏度。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that measures the temperature of the air, of your body etc

sentences.english: Ice needs heat to melt.
sentences.chinese: 冰需要热才能融化。

sentences.english: Insulating the attic is a good way to reduce heat loss.
sentences.chinese: 为阁楼安装隔热层是减少热量流失的好方法。

sentences.english: The heat was making them tired.
sentences.chinese: 炎热的天气令他们疲倦。

sentences.english: Heat the milk until it boils.
sentences.chinese: 把牛奶煮开。

detailed_translations.english: warmth or the quality of being hot
to make something become warm or hot

sentences.english: Even Enrico Fermi apparently did not bother to read Hasenöhrl's papers properly before concluding wrongly that the discrepant 3/4 prefactor was due to the electron self-energy identified by Abraham.
sentences.chinese: 就连恩里科·费米显然也没有下功夫好好拜读哈泽内尔的著作，才会错误地将3／4前因数的误差归咎于亚伯拉罕的电子自能。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有差异的；相差的；矛盾的

sentences.english: A deep furrow appeared between his brows.
sentences.chinese: 他眉间出现了一道深深的皱纹。

detailed_translations.english: a deep line or fold in the skin of someone’s face, especially on the forehead
to make a wide deep line in the surface of something

name: code
trans: 密码； 代码， 代号， 编码

sentences.english: The spy sent his message in code.
sentences.chinese: 这个间谍用密码发送情报。

sentences.english: But we have not yet implemented this in the code.
sentences.chinese: 但我们在代码中尚未实现此功能。

sentences.english: The hacker came smack up against the company's policy of keeping its records in code.
sentences.chinese: 这个计算机黑客突然碰壁了，因这家公司实行了用密码保存公司纪录的政策。

sentences.english: She received a small legacy from her aunt.
sentences.chinese: 她从姨妈那里继承了一小笔遗产。

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗产，遗赠；先人(或过去)留下的东西
detailed_translations.english: money or property that you receive from someone after they die

name: displace
trans: 移置， 转移； 取代， 置换

sentences.english: Coal has been displaced by natural gas as a major source of energy.
sentences.chinese: 作为一种主要能源，煤的地位已为天然气所取代。

sentences.english: immigrants who displace US workers in the job market
sentences.chinese: 在就业市场上取代美国工人的移民

detailed_translations.english: to take the place or position of something or someone

sentences.english: The yellow, usually spherical portion of an egg of a bird or reptile, surrounded by the albumen and serving as nutriment for the developing young.
sentences.chinese: 蛋黄鸟类或爬行动物蛋内的黄色的、通常是球形的部分，回周包有蛋白，作为哺育幼鸟（仔）的营养物。

sentences.english: Main Ingredients: colostrum, lactobacillus, soybean lecithin, albumen powder, taurine, folic acid, immune-enhancing substance, comprehensive vitamin, comprehensive nutriment, and mineral substance.
sentences.chinese: 主要成份：牛初乳，乳酸菌，大豆卵磷脂，蛋白粉，牛磺酸，叶酸，免疫增强素，综合营养素，综合维生素，矿物质。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that gives plants and animals what they need in order to live and grow

sentences.english: a big tax swindle
sentences.chinese: 巨额税款诈骗

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which someone gets money by deceiving someone else
to get money from someone by deceiving them

sentences.english: The power behind much of this automation is the regular expression, a veritable set of hieroglyphics to find, match, and decompose strings.
sentences.chinese: 实现这种自动化主要依靠正则表达式，它是用来查找、匹配和分解字符串的一组真正的象形文字。

sentences.english: Following drawn-out patent wars, Baekeland negotiated a merger with his rivals that put him at the helm of a veritable Bakelite empire.
sentences.chinese: 经过持久的专利战，贝克兰和他的对手签约合作，使他获得了一个真正的酚醛塑料大企业的领导权。

sentences.english: Please wait for the result of your hemoglobin test.
sentences.chinese: 请等一下你的血红蛋白化验结果。

sentences.english: Some, like hemoglobin, deliver oxygen from the lungs to the far reaches of the body.
sentences.chinese: 有些蛋白质像血红蛋白一样，可以把氧从肺部输送到身体各处。

sentences.english: Usually, if you or I or any nonadapted person went to high altitude, we would increase our hemoglobin levels to compensate for the low amount of oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 通常，如果你、我或其他任何不适应的人去了高海拔地区，就会使体内血红蛋白的水平增高，以弥补那里低的氧气量。

detailed_translations.chinese: [生化] 血红蛋白（等于haemoglobin）；血红素
detailed_translations.english: Haemoglobin is the red substance in blood, which combines with oxygen and carries it around the body

name: inestimable
trans: 无价的， 无法估计的

sentences.english: a painting of inestimable value
sentences.chinese: 一幅价值连城的画

detailed_translations.english: too much or too great to be calculated

name: illusion
trans: 错觉， 幻觉； 假象

sentences.english: She was under no illusion that he loved her.
sentences.chinese: 她不再幻想他爱她了。

sentences.english: It is an illusion that the Arctic is dark in winter.
sentences.chinese: 认为北极冬天一片黑暗是错误的。

sentences.english: She had no illusions about her physical attractiveness.
sentences.chinese: 她对自己外表的吸引力不抱幻想。

sentences.english: ‘I hate to shatter your illusions,’ he said.
sentences.chinese: “我不愿意打破你的幻想。”他说。

detailed_translations.chinese: 幻想， 错误的观念； 错觉， 幻觉， 假象
detailed_translations.english: an idea or opinion that is wrong, especially about yourself

name: whine
trans: 哭诉， 发牢骚， 发呜呜声

sentences.english: Oh Charlotte, please stop whining.
sentences.chinese: 哎呀，夏洛特，请你别再抱怨了。

sentences.english: ...the whine of air-raid sirens.
sentences.chinese: …空袭警报的尖叫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发牢骚；哭诉；嘎嘎响；发呜呜声
detailed_translations.english: if a machine whines, it makes a continuous high sound
Whine is also a noun

name: considerable
trans: 相当大  的， 可观的； 值得考虑的， 重要的

sentences.english: Michael has already spent considerable time in Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔在巴塞罗那已经待了相当长的时间了。

sentences.english: issues of considerable importance
sentences.chinese: 相当重要的问题

sentences.english: The series has aroused considerable interest.
sentences.chinese: 这套系列节目引起了观众相当浓厚的兴趣。

detailed_translations.english: fairly large, especially large enough to have an effect or be important

sentences.english: Tests showed increased levels of toxin in shellfish.
sentences.chinese: 测试表明贝类中的毒素级别上升了。

detailed_translations.english: a poisonous substance, especially one that is produced by  bacteria  and causes a particular disease

name: subsist
trans: 生存， 生活； 供养

sentences.english: The prisoners subsisted on one mug of the worst quality porridge three times a day.
sentences.chinese: 犯人一天三次靠一杯最差的粥维持生活。

detailed_translations.english: to stay alive when you only have small amounts of food or money

sentences.english: We stopped by Alice’s house for a brief visit.
sentences.chinese: 我们顺路在艾丽斯家小坐片刻。

sentences.english: Let’s keep this conversation brief; I have a plane to catch.
sentences.chinese: 我们长话短说吧，我还要赶飞机。

sentences.english: A Defense Department spokesman briefed reporters.
sentences.chinese: 一位国防部发言人向记者们介绍了情况。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for a short time

detailed_translations.chinese: 向…介绍基本情况，做…的提要
detailed_translations.english: If someone briefs you, especially about a piece of work or a serious matter, they give you information that you need before you do it or consider it
a short spoken or written statement giving facts about a law case

name: recover
trans: 重新获得； 痊愈， 复原

sentences.english: After a few days of fever, she began to recover.
sentences.chinese: 发烧几天之后，她开始恢复。

sentences.english: Two bodies were recovered from the wreckage.
sentences.chinese: 残骸中找到了两具尸体

detailed_translations.english: to get better after an illness, accident, shock etc

sentences.english: ...problems caused by the influx of refugees.
sentences.chinese: …难民大量涌入所造成的问题。

detailed_translations.english: the arrival of large numbers of people or large amounts of money, goods etc, especially suddenly

sentences.english: The city centre was devastated by the bomb.
sentences.chinese: 市中心被这枚炸弹摧毁了。

detailed_translations.english: to damage something very badly or completely

name: prodigy
trans: 天才  ； 奇观， 奇事

sentences.english: The Russian tennis prodigy is well on the way to becoming the youngest world champion of all time.
sentences.chinese: 这位俄罗斯网球奇才已很有望成为历史上最年轻的世界冠军。

detailed_translations.chinese: 奇迹，奇事；奇才；奇观；预兆
detailed_translations.english: A prodigy is someone young who has a great natural ability for something such as music, mathematics, or sports

sentences.english: The official report basically exonerated everyone.
sentences.chinese: 该官方报告基本洗脱了所有人的干系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 证明…无罪；  免受指控
detailed_translations.english: to state officially that someone who has been blamed for something is not guilty

sentences.english: Rationing had put an end to a surfeit of biscuits long ago.
sentences.chinese: 定量供应很久以前就结束了饼干过剩的情况。

detailed_translations.chinese: 过度；饮食过度；恶心（由于饮食过度所引起）
detailed_translations.english: A surfeit of something is an amount which is too large

detailed_translations.chinese: 使饮食过度；使厌腻；使过度沉溺于

name: disavow
trans: 不承认， 否认； 否定， 抵赖

sentences.english: Dr. Samuels immediately disavowed the newspaper story.
sentences.chinese: 塞缪尔斯医生马上否认了报纸上的这条新闻。

detailed_translations.chinese: 否认，否定；抵赖；拒绝对…的责任
detailed_translations.english: to say that you are not responsible for something, that you do not know about it, or that you are not involved with it

sentences.english: ...a solid maple worktop.
sentences.chinese: …一张结实的枫木工作台。

detailed_translations.english: a tree which grows mainly in northern countries such as Canada. Its leaves have five points and turn red or gold in autumn.

sentences.english: For years I had tried to be a compliant and dutiful wife.
sentences.chinese: 多年来我都在努力做一个顺从尽职的妻子。

detailed_translations.english: willing to obey or to agree to other people’s wishes and demands

sentences.english: Hundreds paid their last respects at his obsequies.
sentences.chinese: 数百支付其最后的敬意在他的葬礼。

sentences.english: Once in the city, they even conducted obsequies for Him.
sentences.chinese: 一旦在城市，他们甚至进行了葬礼他。

sentences.english: On that soldier's obsequies the general award his wife a medal and a American flag.
sentences.chinese: 在那位士兵的葬礼上，将军授予士兵的妻子一枚勋章和一面美国国旗。
