detailed_translations.english: to refuse to consider someone’s idea, opinion etc, because you think it is not serious, true, or important

sentences.english: questions about the verisimilitude of the document
sentences.chinese: 针对这份文件的真实性提出的问题

detailed_translations.chinese: 逼真，貌似真实；逼真的事物
detailed_translations.english: the quality of being true or real

name: intelligence
trans: 智力， 聪明； 理解力； 情报， 消息， 报导

sentences.english: To be good at the game, you need a reasonable level of intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 要想把这种游戏玩好，需要一定的智力水平。

sentences.english: According to our intelligence, further attacks were planned.
sentences.chinese: 根据我们的情报，还会有更进一步的攻击。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to learn, understand, and think about things

name: utilitarian
trans: 功利的； 功利主义的

sentences.english: ugly utilitarian buildings
sentences.chinese: 丑陋但实用的建筑物

sentences.english: One of the greatest utilitarians was Claude Helvetius.
sentences.chinese: 最伟大的功利主义者之一是克劳德·爱尔维修。

detailed_translations.chinese: 功利的；功利主义的；实利的
detailed_translations.english: intended to be useful and practical rather than attractive or comfortable
A utilitarian is someone with utilitarian views

sentences.english: The paper introduces the working principle of the whole system of gold foil manipulating automaton and PLC control system.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了金箔装叠精细操作机器人自动化系统总体工作原理及PLC控制系统原理。

sentences.english: Man like every other animal is by nature indolent. if nothing spurs him on then he will hardly think and will bahave from habit like an automaton.
sentences.chinese: 人如其他动物一样本性慵懒，如果没有什么鞭策著他，他几乎不思考，只是象机器人一样按照习惯去做。

detailed_translations.english: a machine, especially one in the shape of a human, that moves without anyone controlling it

sentences.english: How do you analyze this change?
sentences.chinese: 你该如何分析这种变化？

sentences.english: You have to hoover anything before you can analyze it.
sentences.chinese: 在你不具备分析能力之前，你只得胡乱吸收你所能学到的东西。

sentences.english: We should learn to discern and analyze the essentials of complicated questions.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该学会认识和分析复杂问题的本质。

name: dishevel
trans: 使蓬乱； 使头发蓬松； 使衣服弄皱； 弄乱

detailed_translations.chinese: 使蓬乱；使头发凌乱；弄乱
detailed_translations.english: to disarrange (the hair or clothes) of (someone)

sentences.english: The bulk of consumers are based in towns.
sentences.chinese: 大多数消费者都是城镇居民。

sentences.english: The dough will rise until it is double in bulk.
sentences.chinese: 面团会发酵到原来的两倍大。

detailed_translations.english: the main or largest part of something

name: antiquary
trans: 古文物研究者， 收集古文物者， 古董商

detailed_translations.chinese: 古文物研究者；古董商人；收集古文物者
detailed_translations.english: An antiquary is a person who studies the past, or who collects or buys and sells old and valuable objects

sentences.english: To the despair of the workers, the company announced the closure of the factory.
sentences.chinese: 令工人们感到绝望的是，公司宣布关闭工厂了。

sentences.english: Despite his illness, Ron never despaired.
sentences.chinese: 尽管疾病缠身，罗恩却从不绝望。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling that you have no hope at all
to feel that there is no hope at all

sentences.english: the world heavyweight boxing champion
sentences.chinese: 世界重量级拳击冠军

sentences.english: the Olympic champion
sentences.chinese: 奥运会冠军

sentences.english: He passionately championed the poor.
sentences.chinese: 他曾热情地捍卫穷人。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that has won a competition, especially in sport
If you champion a person, a cause, or a principle, you support or defend them

name: stoic
trans: 坚忍克己的人；不以苦乐为意的人

sentences.english: But, in most instances, people living in poverty respond to these societal ills with stoic resilience as they work to escape the degrading reality of their daily lives.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在大多数情况下，生活贫穷的人们以坚忍的韧性来面对这些社会弊疾，努力逃避他们日常生活中有辱尊严的现实。

sentences.english: People of the Tohoku region are stoic, compassionate, calm and humble.
sentences.chinese: 东北地区的人们坚忍顽强、平静怜悯、谦逊大度。

detailed_translations.english: someone who does not show their emotions and does not complain when bad things happen to them

sentences.english: They were promised dispensation from military service.
sentences.chinese: 他们被许诺将被特免不用服兵役。

detailed_translations.english: A dispensation is special permission to do something that is normally not allowed

sentences.english: We did a circuit of the old city.
sentences.chinese: 我们绕着老城走了一圈。

detailed_translations.english: a path that forms a circle around an area, or a journey along this path

sentences.english: The new law restricts the sale of hand guns.
sentences.chinese: 新法规限制手枪的销售。

sentences.english: You may need to restrict access to certain files (= limit the number of people who can read them ) .
sentences.chinese: 某些档案可能需要限制查阅。

sentences.english: The agreement will restrict competition.
sentences.chinese: 这个协议将限制竞争。

sentences.english: The cramped living conditions severely restricted the children’s freedom to play.
sentences.chinese: 拥挤的居住条件严重限制了孩子们玩耍的自由。

detailed_translations.english: to limit or control the size, amount, or range of something

sentences.english: an avuncular pat on the shoulder
sentences.chinese: 慈爱地拍拍肩膀

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a kind and nice way to someone who is younger, rather like an uncle

sentences.english: Introduce the tube into that conduit, please.
sentences.chinese: 请把电线插入那个导管内。

sentences.english: Secure the payload and base ends of the conduit using fittings removed previously.
sentences.chinese: 使用先前卸下来的配件将导管的有效负载端和底端固定住。

sentences.english: Apply a non-hardening sealant to the threads of the terminal box connection port flexible metal conduit and seal fitting for waterproofing.
sentences.chinese: 在接线盒连接口、挠性金属导管及密封件螺纹处涂上非硬化密封剂，用于防水。

detailed_translations.english: a pipe or passage through which water, gas, a set of electric wires etc passes

name: instant
trans: 立即的，直接的；紧迫的；速溶的，方便的

sentences.english: an instant success
sentences.chinese: 马到成功

sentences.english: a system that provides instant access to client information
sentences.chinese: 能立即查到客户信息的系统

sentences.english: The women took an instant dislike to one another.
sentences.chinese: 这些女人立刻就彼此厌恶起来。

sentences.english: The programme brought an instant response.
sentences.chinese: 节目立即引起了反响。

sentences.english: For an instant, Barney was tempted to flee.
sentences.chinese: 那一瞬间，巴尼很想逃走。

detailed_translations.chinese: 立即的； 紧急的； 可以速食的
detailed_translations.english: happening or produced immediately
An instant is an extremely short period of time

sentences.english: The dirty-faced waif was only five or six years old.
sentences.chinese: 这个流浪儿脸上脏兮兮的，只有五六岁大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 流浪者；流浪儿；飘流物；无主物；信号旗
detailed_translations.english: If you refer to a child or young woman as a waif, you mean that they are very thin and look as if they have nowhere to live

name: antiquate
trans: 使成为过时而淘汰， 因陈旧而废弃

detailed_translations.chinese: 废弃；使…过时；使…具有古旧形式或风格
detailed_translations.english: to make obsolete or old-fashioned

name: native
trans: 本地的； 与生俱来的

sentences.english: Singapore has many native species of palm.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡有很多土生的棕榈树种。

sentences.english: You can always tell the difference between the tourists and the natives.
sentences.chinese: 游客与当地人之间的区别一望即知。

detailed_translations.english: growing, living, produced etc in one particular place
someone who lives in a place all the time or has lived there a long time

name: legislate
trans: 制定法律， 通过立法

sentences.english: Most member countries have already legislated against excessive overtime.
sentences.chinese: 大部分成员国已经立法禁止过度加班。

detailed_translations.english: to make a law about something

sentences.english: Everyone hates the prolix Gadaffi, particularly Arab despots who he routinely blasts as  “old women in robes,” “Zionist lackeys,” and “cowards and thieves.
sentences.chinese: 任何一个痛恨卡扎菲说话罗嗦的人，尤其是阿拉伯独裁君主们，他们例行公事似地攻击卡扎菲是“穿着长袍的老女人”，“犹太复国主义走狗”，和“懦夫和小偷”。

detailed_translations.english: a prolix piece of writing has too many words and is boring

sentences.english: The Nobel Prize has become the ultimate accolade in the sciences.
sentences.chinese: 诺贝尔奖已成为科学界的最高荣誉。

sentences.english: He won accolades as one of America's top test pilots.
sentences.chinese: 他作为美国顶级试飞员之一赢得了众多荣誉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 荣誉；荣誉称号授予仪式；连谱号；称赞
detailed_translations.english: If someone is given an accolade, something is done or said about them which shows how much people admire them

name: imperative
trans: 必要的事， 必须完成的事； 祈使语气

sentences.english: It is imperative that politicians should be good communicators.
sentences.chinese: 政治家应该是很好的沟通者，这很重要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 必要的；紧急的，极重要的；命令的
detailed_translations.english: extremely important and needing to be done or dealt with immediately

detailed_translations.chinese: 必要的事， 必须完成的事； 【语】祈使语气
detailed_translations.english: something that must be done urgently

sentences.english: It was built piecemeal over some 130 years.
sentences.chinese: 它是在大约一百三十年间一点一点建造起来的。

detailed_translations.english: Piecemeal is also an adverb
a process that is piecemeal happens slowly and in stages that are not regular or planned properly

name: linear
trans: 线的， 直线的， 线状的； 线性的

sentences.english: a linear diagram
sentences.chinese: 线形图

sentences.english: linear measurements
sentences.chinese: 长度量度

detailed_translations.english: consisting of lines, or in the form of a straight line

sentences.english: a robust man of six feet four
sentences.chinese: 一个身高六英尺四英寸的壮汉

detailed_translations.english: a robust person is strong and healthy

name: dominant
trans: 支配的， 统治的， 占优势的

sentences.english: The dominant male gorilla is the largest in the group.
sentences.chinese: 领头的公猩猩是这群大猩猩中体形最大的一个。

sentences.english: Japan became dominant in the mass market during the 1980s.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪80年代日本在大众市场上开始占据优势。

sentences.english: its dominant position within the group
sentences.chinese: 它在该组织中的突出地位

detailed_translations.chinese: 显性的；占优势的；支配的，统治的
detailed_translations.english: more powerful, important, or noticeable than other people or things

sentences.english: Nigeria has just devalued its currency .
sentences.chinese: 尼日利亚刚刚令自己的货币贬值。

detailed_translations.english: to reduce the value of one country’s money when it is exchanged for another country’s money

sentences.english: ...rural electrification.
sentences.chinese: …乡村电气化。

detailed_translations.english: The electrification of a house, town, or area is the connecting of that place to a supply of electricity

name: inconsistent
trans: 不一致的； 不协调的； 矛盾

sentences.english: The accounts of the witnesses are inconsistent.
sentences.chinese: 几位目击者的说法不一致。

detailed_translations.english: two statements that are inconsistent cannot both be true

sentences.english: I couldn’t read his scribble.
sentences.chinese: 我看不懂他潦草的字。

detailed_translations.chinese: 潦草写成的东西；潦草的写法；杂文
detailed_translations.english: untidy writing that is difficult to read
to write something quickly and untidily

name: denounce
trans: 谴责， 公开指责， 公然抨击； 告发某人

sentences.english: The group denounced the failure by the authorities to take action.
sentences.chinese: 该团体谴责当局没有采取行动。

sentences.english: She denounced him to the police.
sentences.chinese: 她向警方告发了他。

detailed_translations.english: to express strong disapproval of someone or something, especially in public

name: jaded
trans: 疲倦不堪的； 厌倦的

sentences.english: The concert should satisfy even the most jaded critic.
sentences.chinese: 这场音乐会应该能让最不易打动的评论家都觉得满意。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is jaded is no longer interested in or excited by something, usually because they have experienced too much of it

detailed_translations.chinese: 厌倦（jade的过去分词）；变得疲倦；精疲力竭

sentences.english: He dismissed the prime minister’s comments as ‘pure humbug’.
sentences.chinese: 他对首相的评论不屑一顾，认为是“纯粹的假道学”。

detailed_translations.english: insincere or dishonest words or behaviour

name: caucus
trans: 领导人秘密会议； 核心小组会议

sentences.english: ...the Black Caucus of minority congressmen.
sentences.chinese: …由少数派国会议员组成的黑人核心组织。

detailed_translations.chinese: 干部会议；核心会议；党团会议
detailed_translations.english: a meeting of the members of a political party to choose people to represent them in a larger meeting, election etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 召开干部会议；开核心会议

sentences.english: The mayor had become ineffectual in the struggle to clamp down on drugs.
sentences.chinese: 该市长在打击毒品的斗争中行动不力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无效的，不起作用的；徒劳无益的
detailed_translations.english: If someone or something is ineffectual, they fail to do what they are expected to do or are trying to do

detailed_translations.chinese: 无用的人；无一技之长者

sentences.english: This is actually just a microorganism. But it has roughly 500 genes.
sentences.chinese: 这其实只不过是一个微生物，却拥有约500个基因。

sentences.english: Spread the contents of the amber onto a petri dish containing a microorganism food like starch or soy.
sentences.chinese: 把琥珀内嵌标本放在皮氏培养皿中，并加入微生物食品，比如淀粉或大豆。

sentences.english: Slight mutations that allow a microorganism to resist the full killing power of a medicine are an evolutionary advantage that greatly expedites the development of drug resistance.
sentences.chinese: 略微的突变即可使微生物具有抵抗力，使药物完全失去杀伤力，这种突变是一个进化优势，大大加快了耐药性的产生。

detailed_translations.english: a living thing that is so small that it cannot be seen without a  microscope

sentences.english: His face had been disfigured in an accident.
sentences.chinese: 在一次意外事故中他毁了容。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使变丑；损毁…的外形；使大为减色
detailed_translations.english: to spoil the appearance that something naturally has

sentences.english: The mind exists as a separate entity.
sentences.chinese: 思想作为一个独立的实体存在。

sentences.english: Good design brings a house and garden together as a single entity.
sentences.chinese: 优秀的设计能把一所房子和花园合为一体。

detailed_translations.english: something that exists as a single and complete unit

sentences.english: His life is chronicled in a new biography published last week.
sentences.chinese: 他的生平被写成一本新传记，于上周出版。

sentences.english: The book chronicles the events leading up to the war.
sentences.chinese: 该书记述了导致战争爆发的一系列事件。

detailed_translations.english: to describe events in the order in which they happened

name: prohibit
trans: 禁止， 不准， 阻止

sentences.english: Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the factory.
sentences.chinese: 厂区严禁吸烟。

detailed_translations.english: to say that an action is illegal or not allowed

name: asperity
trans: 严酷； 粗暴； 刻薄

sentences.english: "I told you Preskel had no idea," remarked Kemp with some asperity.
sentences.chinese: "我跟你说过普瑞克一无所知"，坎普有点儿不耐烦地说。

detailed_translations.chinese: （表面的）粗糙；（气候等的）严酷；艰苦的条件；（性格）粗暴
detailed_translations.english: if you speak with asperity, you say something in a way that is rough or severe, showing that you are feeling impatient

sentences.english: As children we were taught to be frugal and hard-working.
sentences.chinese: 我们小时候被教育要节俭和勤劳。

sentences.english: He led a remarkably frugal existence.
sentences.chinese: 他过着极其节俭的生活。

detailed_translations.chinese: 节俭的；朴素的；花钱少的
detailed_translations.english: careful to buy only what is necessary

sentences.english: Some of these bacteria are actually good for you.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，这些细菌有的对你是很有好处的。

sentences.english: When you eat off the plate, all of those bacteria go into your stomach.
sentences.chinese: 当你吃掉了盘子里的食物时，这些细菌就会进入你的肚子。

sentences.english: But she correctly points out that bacteria are everywhere: on us, in us and all around us.
sentences.chinese: 但是她正确地指出细菌无处不在：在我们身上，在我们体内以及在我们周围。

detailed_translations.english: very small living things, some of which cause illness or disease

sentences.english: replica guns
sentences.chinese: 仿真枪

detailed_translations.english: an exact copy of something, especially a building, a gun, or a work of art

sentences.english: They told him to stay home with his wife instead of going out and carousing with friends.
sentences.chinese: 他们告诉他与他的妻子在一起呆在家里，不要出去和朋友们一起痛饮狂欢。

detailed_translations.english: to drink a lot, be noisy, and have fun

detailed_translations.chinese: 喧闹的酒会或宴会；一饮而尽

name: assessor
trans: 估价员，  审核员； 估税员

detailed_translations.chinese: 评审员；确定税款的人；顾问
detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to calculate the value of something or the amount of tax someone should pay

sentences.english: Last night confusion reigned about how the debate, which continues today, would end.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚，这场在今天继续进行的辩论将如何结束的问题令人困惑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 当政， 统治； 占主导地位
detailed_translations.english: If you say, for example, that silence reigns in a place or confusion reigns in a situation, you mean that the place is silent or the situation is confused

detailed_translations.chinese: 君主的统治，君主的统治时期
detailed_translations.english: the period when someone is king, queen, or  emperor

sentences.english: In Brazil Nestlé sends its comestibles to local entrepreneurs who sell them to their neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 在巴西，雀巢把食品运送到当地的企业家手中。 企业家再把食品卖给邻居。

sentences.english: But cultural shifts alone were not sufficient to exploit these calorie-rich comestibles. Our predecessors had to adapt genetically to them.
sentences.chinese: 不过要利用这些高热量食物，光是文化改变还不够，人类在遗传上也必须有所改变。

sentences.english: I beckoned him daily with a variety of comestibles, although sugar worked best.
sentences.chinese: 我每天都用各种食物来引诱它，不过糖最奏效了。

detailed_translations.english: food

sentences.english: Cocaine is a crystalline tropane alkaloid that is obtained from the leaves of the coca plant.
sentences.chinese: 可卡因是一种结晶状的莨菪生物碱，是从古柯叶中提取得来的。

sentences.english: The company insists, however, that coca leaves are used as a flavoring agent only after removing the illegal cocaine alkaloid.
sentences.chinese: 然而，公司坚持古柯叶是在消除了非法可卡因生物碱之后才被用作调味剂。

sentences.english: Scientists are not clear how the fungus controls the ants, but know that it releases alkaloid chemicals into the insect as it consumes it from the inside.
sentences.chinese: 科学家还不清楚寄生菌是如何控制木蚁的，只知道寄生菌在木蚁体内吸收营养物质的同时释放出生物碱。

detailed_translations.english: any of a group of nitrogenous basic compounds found in plants, typically insoluble in water and physiologically active

sentences.english: philosophers who accept scientific rationalism
sentences.chinese: 接受科学唯理论的哲学家们

detailed_translations.english: the belief that your actions should be based on scientific thinking rather than emotions or religious beliefs

sentences.english: a servile attitude
sentences.chinese: 卑躬屈膝的态度

detailed_translations.chinese: 奴隶的；奴性的；卑屈的；卑屈的
detailed_translations.english: very eager to obey someone because you want to please them – used to show disapproval

name: scrupulous
trans: 小心谨慎的， 细心的

sentences.english: scrupulous attention to detail
sentences.chinese: 对细节的一丝不苟

detailed_translations.chinese: 细心的；小心谨慎的；一丝不苟的
detailed_translations.english: doing something very carefully so that nothing is left out

sentences.english: ...the neo-Gothic buttresses of Riverside Church in Manhattan.
sentences.chinese: …曼哈顿的里弗赛德教堂中的新哥特式扶璧。

detailed_translations.english: a brick or stone structure built to support a wall
to support a system, idea, argument etc, especially by providing money

sentences.english: a kidney transplant
sentences.chinese: 肾脏移植

detailed_translations.english: one of the two organs in your lower back that separate waste products from your blood and make urine

name: aphorism
trans: 格言， 警语， 谚语

sentences.english: It's one thing to forget the past, with predictable consequences, as the favorite aphorism goes. But what about those who refuse to comprehend the present?
sentences.chinese: 正如格言所说，展望未来，忘记过去。话是这样说，但是那些拒绝理解现在的人怎么办呢？

sentences.english: That's more than a folksy aphorism when it comes to infectious diseases.
sentences.chinese: 对于传染疾病而言，这句格言可就不仅仅是一句民间习语了。

sentences.english: What’s the science behind this old aphorism?
sentences.chinese: 这句古老的格言背后有什么样的科学依据呢？

detailed_translations.english: a short phrase that contains a wise idea

sentences.english: They feared that the publicity surrounding him would detract from their own election campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 他们担心围绕他的宣传会有损他们自已的竞选活动。

detailed_translations.english: If one thing detracts from another, it makes it seem less good or impressive

sentences.english: gangs of rowdy youths
sentences.chinese: 几伙吵闹的年轻人

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a noisy rough way that is likely to cause arguments and fighting
someone who behaves in a rough noisy way
a metal container that holds a fire and is used to keep people warm outside

name: stock
trans: 备料， 库存， 现货； 股票， 公债； 砧木

sentences.english: We stock a wide range of kitchen equipment.
sentences.chinese: 我们备有各种厨房用品。

detailed_translations.english: if a shop stocks a particular product, it keeps a supply of it to sell
something that is available in a shop and does not have to be ordered

detailed_translations.chinese: 原料，库存品；股本，公债；世系，血统；汤汁；家畜，牲畜
detailed_translations.english: a liquid made by boiling meat or bones and vegetables, which is used to make soups or to add  flavour  to other dishes

sentences.english: Prepare - Research what you want to sell using Completed Listings. Have credit card and bank information ready for verification.
sentences.chinese: 准备-通过调查已经发布的广告确认你究竟要卖什么，拥有供查证的信用卡和银行信息。

sentences.english: The General Dynamics-led team will provide training for hardware and software, and also furnish independent verification and validation of sensors and systems.
sentences.chinese: 通用动力公司领导的团队将提供硬件和软件训练，也将提供传感器和系统的独立查证和确认。

name: suspend
trans: 吊， 悬挂； 推迟； 暂停

sentences.english: Sales of the drug will be suspended until more tests are completed.
sentences.chinese: 这种药品在完成进一步检验之前将暂停销售。

sentences.english: Talks between the two countries have now been suspended.
sentences.chinese: 两国间的对话现已中止。

detailed_translations.english: to officially stop something from continuing, especially for a short time

sentences.english: As the term suggests, male pattern baldness follows a typical sequence or pattern.
sentences.chinese: 这个术语暗示，男性模式光秃遵循一定的顺序或者模式。

sentences.english: This type of hair loss does not represent typical male baldness, but it does require a diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 这些类型的脱发都不能代表典型的男性光秃，但是它需要去诊治。

sentences.english: Relatives are tonight comforting the distraught parents.
sentences.chinese: 亲戚们今晚都在安慰这对忧心如焚的父母。

detailed_translations.english: so upset and worried that you cannot think clearly

name: misbehave
trans: 行为不礼貌； 行为不端

sentences.english: When the children misbehaved she was unable to cope.
sentences.chinese: 当孩子们捣乱时，她无能为力。

detailed_translations.english: If someone, especially a child, misbehaves, they behave in a way that is not acceptable to other people

name: vociferous
trans: 大声叫的， 喊叫的； 喧嚷的

sentences.english: They became more vociferous, and some of them began calling out what they thought of Hanna.
sentences.chinese: 他们变得更加吵闹了，一些人开始叫嚷着对汉娜的看法。

sentences.english: And one by one, encouraged by vociferous applause, speaking with fire and enthusiasm and excited gestures, they replied to the attack.
sentences.chinese: 他们一个个受到喧闹的欢呼鼓掌的鼓励，怀着火焰和激情，打着激动的手势，回答了对他们的攻击。

sentences.english: ancient pagan rituals
sentences.chinese: 古老的异教仪式

sentences.english: the importance of religion and ritual in our lives
sentences.chinese: 我们生活中宗教和宗教仪式的重要性

sentences.english: The lady of the house performs the sacred ritual of lighting two candles.
sentences.chinese: 由女主人来完成点燃两根蜡烛的神圣仪式。

detailed_translations.english: a ceremony that is always performed in the same way, in order to mark an important religious or social occasion

name: quarrelsome
trans: 喜欢吵架的， 好争论的

sentences.english: He became quarrelsome after drinking too much.
sentences.chinese: 他喝多了就爱找人吵架。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is quarrelsome quarrels a lot with people

name: voluble
trans: 易旋转的； 流利的， 健谈的

sentences.english: She was voluble with excitement.
sentences.chinese: 她因为激动而变得很健谈。

sentences.english: Bert is a voluble, gregarious man.
sentences.chinese: 伯特是个健谈且善于交际的人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 健谈的；缠绕的；易旋转的
detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone is voluble, you mean that they talk a lot with great energy and enthusiasm

sentences.english: He tends to belittle her efforts.
sentences.chinese: 他往往轻视她的努力。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone or something seem small or unimportant

name: indiscriminate
trans: 不加分析的， 不加选择的

sentences.english: the indiscriminate use of chemical fertilizers
sentences.chinese: 化肥的滥用

detailed_translations.chinese: 任意的；无差别的；不分皂白的
detailed_translations.english: an indiscriminate action is done without thinking about what harm it might cause

sentences.english: an affected laugh
sentences.chinese: 假笑

detailed_translations.chinese: 受到影响的；做作的；假装的
detailed_translations.english: not sincere or natural

detailed_translations.chinese: 影响；假装；使…感动（affect的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: resolute opposition
sentences.chinese: 坚决的反对

sentences.english: resolute leadership
sentences.chinese: 果断的领导

sentences.english: She remained resolute in her belief that the situation would improve.
sentences.chinese: 她依然坚信情况将会好转。

detailed_translations.english: doing something in a very determined way because you have very strong beliefs, aims etc

sentences.english: Senator Kennedy
sentences.chinese: 肯尼迪参议员

detailed_translations.english: a member of the Senate or a senate

sentences.english: I did not mean to impugn her professional abilities.
sentences.chinese: 我并不是怀疑她的专业能力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 指责，非难；抨击；反驳；对…表示怀疑
detailed_translations.english: to express doubts about someone’s honesty, courage, ability etc

name: tempt
trans: 诱惑， 引诱； 吸引， 使感兴趣

sentences.english: If you leave valuables in your car it will tempt thieves.
sentences.chinese: 如果把贵重物品留在车上，会招来小偷的。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone want to have or do something, even though they know they really should not

sentences.english: Treasure was buried for many reasons: to keep it out of enemy hands, to "bank" a fortune, to serve as a votive offering.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，埋藏财宝有这样几个原因：让财宝远离敌人；为了储藏财富；作为宗教上的布施与贡献。

detailed_translations.english: offered, given, undertaken, performed or dedicated in fulfilment of or in accordance with a vow

name: reciprocate
trans: 互给； 回报； 报答

sentences.english: When he spoke I was expected to reciprocate with some remark of my own.
sentences.chinese: 他在说话时，我也应该说点什么回应他。

detailed_translations.english: to do or give something, because something similar has been done or given to you

name: agape
trans: 张口发呆的， 目瞪口呆的

sentences.english: Vince watched, his mouth agape in horror.
sentences.chinese: 文斯注视着，吓得张大了嘴。

name: inveterate
trans: 根深蒂固的； 积习的

sentences.english: ...an inveterate gambler.
sentences.chinese: ...一个恶心成瘾的赌徒。

detailed_translations.english: If you describe someone as, for example, an inveterate liar or smoker, you mean that they have lied or smoked for a long time and are not likely to stop doing it

sentences.english: A police investigation yesterday absolved the police of all blame in the incident.
sentences.chinese: 警方昨天的调查为其开脱了在这件事故中所有的责任。

detailed_translations.english: to say publicly that someone is not guilty or responsible for something

sentences.english: They enjoyed ten days of peace and seclusion.
sentences.chinese: 他们享受了十天与世隔绝的宁静生活。

detailed_translations.english: to give a specific name to; designate

name: complication
trans: 复杂化；  因素； 【医】 并发症

sentences.english: The fact that the plane was late added a further complication to our journey.
sentences.chinese: 飞机误点给我们的旅行带来了更大的麻烦。

sentences.english: Pneumonia is one of the common complications faced by bed-ridden patients.
sentences.chinese: 肺炎是卧床病人所面临的常见并发症之一。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or situation that makes something more difficult to understand or deal with

sentences.english: People often procrastinate when it comes to paperwork.
sentences.chinese: 遇到文书工作，人们常常会拖拖拉拉。

detailed_translations.english: to delay doing something that you ought to do, usually because you do not want to do it

sentences.english: ...a sweetish smell of ether and iodine.
sentences.chinese: ...乙醚和碘酒散发出的微甜味。

detailed_translations.english: Ether is a colourless liquid that burns easily. It is used in industry and in medicine as an anaesthetic.

sentences.english: He was aware of every nuance in her voice.
sentences.chinese: 他听得出她声音中的每一个细微变化。

sentences.english: subtle nuances of meaning
sentences.chinese: 含义的细微差别

detailed_translations.english: a very slight, hardly noticeable difference in manner, colour, meaning etc

sentences.english: He went into the hospital to undergo tests for a pain in his abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 他去了医院接受对他的腹部疼痛进行的各项检查。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body between your chest and legs which contains your stomach,  bowel s  etc

sentences.english: Before new campaign begins, doubt of sanded roars of a tiger fights the embattle plan of the ministry is passive take a beating.
sentences.chinese: 新战役开始前，沙虎啸质疑作战部的布阵方案是被动挨打。

detailed_translations.english: to deploy (troops) for battle

name: latency
trans: 潜伏， 潜在； 潜伏物

sentences.english: He was accosted by four youths and forced to give them all his money.
sentences.chinese: 四个少年走上前来和他搭讪，逼迫他交出身上所有的钱。

sentences.english: Everybody knew that something awful was afoot.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都知道糟糕的事在酝酿之中。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在进行中的；徒步的；准备中
detailed_translations.english: being planned or happening

sentences.english: ...the acquittal of six police officers charged with beating up a suspect.
sentences.chinese: …对被控殴打一嫌疑犯的６名警官作出的无罪判决。

detailed_translations.chinese: 赦免；无罪开释；履行；尽职；（债务等的）清偿

sentences.english: a grievous shortage of hospital beds
sentences.chinese: 医院床位的严重短缺

detailed_translations.english: very serious and causing great pain or suffering

name: pursue
trans: 追赶， 追踪； 继续； 从事

sentences.english: She plans to pursue a career in politics.
sentences.chinese: 她计划从政。

sentences.english: Students should pursue their own interests , as well as do their school work.
sentences.chinese: 除了完成课业之外，学生也应该追求自己的兴趣。

sentences.english: a campaign promise to pursue policies that will help the poor
sentences.chinese: 贯彻扶贫政策的竞选承诺

detailed_translations.english: to continue doing an activity or trying to achieve something over a long period of time

name: vulgar
trans: 粗俗的， 庸俗的； 普通的， 通俗的

sentences.english: vulgar behaviour
sentences.chinese: 粗俗的行为

detailed_translations.english: remarks, jokes etc that are vulgar deal with sex in a very rude and offensive way

sentences.english: From all points of view, war would be a catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 从各个方面来看，战争都会是一场灾难。

detailed_translations.english: a terrible event in which there is a lot of destruction, suffering, or death

name: convey
trans: 运送， 搬运； 传达， 表达

sentences.english: All this information can be conveyed in a simple diagram.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些信息可以通过一张简单的图表来表示。

sentences.english: Ads convey the message that thin is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 广告传递的信息是: 瘦就是美。

sentences.english: He was sent to convey a message to the UN Secretary General.
sentences.chinese: 他被派去向联合国秘书长传达一条信息。

detailed_translations.english: to communicate or express something, with or without using words

name: redeem
trans: 赎回， 挽回； 恢复， 补偿； 兑换

sentences.english: Olivier’s performance redeemed an otherwise second-rate play.
sentences.chinese: 奥利维尔的表演补救了一出本是二流水平的戏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 赎回；挽回；兑换；履行；补偿；恢复
detailed_translations.english: to make something less bad

sentences.english: Organizational effectiveness does not lie in that narrow minded concept called rationality. It lies in the blend of clearheaded logic and powerful intuition.
sentences.chinese: 组织的有效性并不在于那个称为合理性的坐井观天的概念。它是清晰的逻辑和强有力的直觉的融合。

sentences.english: But whoever has undergone the intense experience of successful advances made in this domain is moved by profound reverence for the rationality made manifest in existence.
sentences.chinese: 但凡是曾经在这个领域里胜利前进中有过深切经验的人，对存在中所显示出来的合理性，都会感到深挚的崇敬。

sentences.english: The military conceptual model is the first abstract to the military action world(space), the accuracy and rationality it expresses the military system is the key point of battle simulation.
sentences.chinese: 军事概念模型是对军事行为空间进行的第一次抽象，它对军事系统表达的准确性和合理性将是作战仿真模拟质量的关键。

sentences.english: We must act in conformity with local regulations.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须按当地的法规行事。

detailed_translations.english: in a way that obeys rules, customs etc

sentences.english: Monogamy is rare in most animal groups, but is common among birds.
sentences.chinese: 单配偶现象在大多数兽类群体里很少见，但在鸟类中却很常见。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一夫一妻制；[动] 单配偶，[动] 单配性
detailed_translations.english: the custom of being married to only one husband or wife

name: hysterical
trans: 情绪异常激动的， 歇斯底里的

sentences.english: Janet became hysterical and began screaming.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮特歇斯底里起来，开始尖叫。

sentences.english: Everyone in the studio burst into hysterical laughter .
sentences.chinese: 演播室里的每个人都爆发出一阵狂笑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 歇斯底里的；异常兴奋的
detailed_translations.english: unable to control your behaviour or emotions because you are very upset, afraid, excited etc

sentences.english: The cholera outbreak has been contained.
sentences.chinese: 霍乱的爆发已被遏制住。

sentences.english: What is cholera?
sentences.chinese: 什么是霍乱？

sentences.english: People began to feel alarmed about the cholera.
sentences.chinese: 人们开始对霍乱感到惊恐起来。

detailed_translations.english: a serious disease that causes sickness and sometimes death. It is caused by eating infected food or drinking infected water.

sentences.english: He had slumped into a state of torpor from which nothing could rouse him.
sentences.chinese: 他陷入了一种麻木状态，什么事都不能唤起他的兴趣。

sentences.english: The sick person gradually falls into a torpor.
sentences.chinese: 这位病人逐渐陷入了萎靡状态中。

detailed_translations.english: Torpor is the state of being completely inactive mentally or physically, for example, because of illness or laziness

name: allude
trans: 暗指， 影射， 间接提到

sentences.english: With friends, she sometimes alluded to a feeling that she herself was to blame for her son's predicament.
sentences.chinese: 和朋友们一起时，她有时暗示她感到儿子的困境要怪她自己。

detailed_translations.chinese: 暗指，转弯抹角地说到；略为提及，顺便提到
detailed_translations.english: If you allude to something, you mention it in an indirect way

sentences.english: He had been patiently waiting in the anteroom for an hour.
sentences.chinese: 他已经在前厅耐心等待了一个小时。

detailed_translations.english: An anteroom is a small room leading into a larger room

name: chagrin
trans: 懊恼； 气愤； 委屈

sentences.english: To the chagrin of their parents, neither Phil nor Pam went to church anymore.
sentences.chinese: 令父母失望的是，菲尔和帕姆都再也不去教堂了。

detailed_translations.english: annoyance and disappointment because something has not happened the way you hoped
to feel annoyed and disappointed

sentences.english: ...the custodian of the holy shrines in Mecca and Medina.
sentences.chinese: …在麦加和麦地那的圣地的管理员。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is responsible for looking after something important or valuable

sentences.english: The company’s property may even be forfeit.
sentences.chinese: 公司财产甚至可能被没收。

detailed_translations.chinese: 罚金；没收物；丧失的东西
detailed_translations.english: something that is taken away from you or something that you have to pay, because you have broken a rule or made a mistake

detailed_translations.chinese: 因受罚而丧失的；被没收的
detailed_translations.english: to be legally or officially taken away from you as a punishment

detailed_translations.chinese: （因犯罪、失职、违约等）丧失（权利、名誉、生命等）

sentences.english: ‘Pass away’ is a euphemism for ‘die’.
sentences.chinese: “去世”是“死”的委婉语。

detailed_translations.english: a polite word or expression that you use instead of a more direct one to avoid shocking or upsetting someone

sentences.english: an evening of choral music
sentences.chinese: 合唱音乐晚会

detailed_translations.english: related to music that is sung by a large group of people together

sentences.english: It had rained for four consecutive days.
sentences.chinese: 雨接连下了四天。

sentences.english: Can they win the title for the third consecutive season?
sentences.chinese: 他们能连续第三个赛季赢得冠军称号吗？

detailed_translations.english: consecutive numbers or periods of time follow one after the other without any interruptions

sentences.english: Process of soaking up or assimilation of one substance by another.
sentences.chinese: 一种介质向另一种介质渗透和同化的过程。

sentences.english: The first period of the English Renaissance was one of imitation and assimilation.
sentences.chinese: 英国文艺复兴初期只是一个学习模仿与同化的阶段。

sentences.english: Ethnic amalgamation ethnic assimilation and ethnic fusion of culture are three kinds of different phenomena in ethnic relation.
sentences.chinese: 民族融合、民族同化和民族文化融合是民族关系中存在的三种不同的现象。

detailed_translations.english: the process of understanding and using new ideas

sentences.english: She was rescued from a burning building.
sentences.chinese: 她被人从着火的大楼里救了出来。

detailed_translations.english: on fire

sentences.english: Computer games can improve children’s manual dexterity .
sentences.chinese: 电脑游戏可以提高儿童手的灵活性。

detailed_translations.english: skill and speed in doing something with your hands

sentences.english: Which number is the quotient in the equation?
sentences.chinese: 在这个等式中，哪个数是商？

sentences.english: The paper discusses the relation of entropy change and quotient of heat-temperature based on the second law of thermodynamics.
sentences.chinese: 通过热力学第二定律，从理论上分析熵变与热温商之间的关系，再进一步由实践验证。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the calculus of residues of quotient function at ist pole, then obtains some computational formulas by the use of determinant.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了商函数在其极点处的残数计算，得到几个用行列式表示的计算公式，并介绍了它们的应用。

detailed_translations.english: the number which is obtained when one number is divided by another

sentences.english: the Encyclopedia of Music
sentences.chinese: 音乐百科全书

detailed_translations.english: a book or cd, or a set of these, containing facts about many different subjects, or containing detailed facts about one subject

name: renunciation
trans: 放弃， 弃权； 脱离关系

sentences.english: The talks were dependent on a renunciation of terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 会谈以放弃恐怖主义为前提。

detailed_translations.chinese: 放弃；脱离关系；拒绝承认；抛弃；弃权
detailed_translations.english: when someone makes a formal decision to no longer believe in something, live in a particular way etc

sentences.english: Henry’s army returned loaded down with plunder.
sentences.chinese: 亨利的部队满载战利品而归。

detailed_translations.english: things that have been stolen during a violent attack, especially during a war
to steal large amounts of money or property from somewhere, especially while fighting in a war

sentences.english: A handful of pebbles in the bottom of a flowerpot will help drainage.
sentences.chinese: 在花盆底下放一把鹅卵石能够帮助排水。

sentences.english: a plan to improve the town’s drainage system
sentences.chinese: 改善城里排水系统的计划

detailed_translations.english: the process or system by which water or waste liquid flows away

sentences.english: As the cilia attempt to clear out the inhaled particles, it can lead to coughing.
sentences.chinese: 在纤毛尝试清除吸入颗粒的时候，它的运动会导致咳嗽。

sentences.english: This little spheroid sports thousands of tiny hairs around the outer edge of its body called cilia that propel it at lightning speeds through freshwater scum.
sentences.chinese: 这个小小的球状体的身体外壳上有着上千条细小的发丝，叫做纤毛，推进它以闪电般的速度穿行于淡水泡沫中。

sentences.english: A more biological explanation for how the Neti pot works has to do with tiny, hair-like structures called cilia that line the inside of the nasal and sinus cavities.
sentences.chinese: 一个对洗鼻壶有效性更加具有生物学意义的解释与一种称为纤毛的细小毛发状结构有关，它排列在鼻腔以及鼻窦腔内。

name: indecipherable
trans: 破译不出的， 难领悟的

sentences.english: an indecipherable signature
sentences.chinese: 难以辨认的签名

detailed_translations.chinese: 无法解释的；破译不出的；难辨认的
detailed_translations.english: impossible to read or understand

sentences.english: During her life Elizabeth Barrett Browning conjectured that Browning would indulge in some "feeble bigamy" after her death.
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白·巴雷特·勃朗宁在生时推测丈夫在她死后会陷入“虚弱的重婚罪”里。

sentences.english: But because a court in Liverpool also found him guilty of bigamy and fraud, with all the charges bundled together, his case provides an iffy precedent, if one at all.
sentences.chinese: 该男子目前已被定罪，却是因为利物浦一法院还判定他犯有重婚和诈骗等罪行。 这一数罪并罚的案件提供了一个模棱两可的先例，如果也算是一个先例的话。

detailed_translations.english: the crime of being married to two people at the same time

sentences.english: His father and mother immigrated when he was two.
sentences.chinese: 他的父母在他两岁时移民到这里。

detailed_translations.english: to come into a country in order to live there permanently

name: apparatus
trans: 器械， 设备， 仪器， 装置

sentences.english: Astronauts have special breathing apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 航天员有专门的呼吸装装备。

sentences.english: The tax will require a massive administrative apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 税收需要大规模的行政机构。

detailed_translations.chinese: 器械，器具，仪器；机构，组织
detailed_translations.english: the set of tools and machines that you use for a particular scientific, medical, or technical purpose

sentences.english: The Act proscribes discrimination on the grounds of race.
sentences.chinese: 这项法令禁止种族歧视。

detailed_translations.english: to officially say that something is not allowed to exist or be done

sentences.english: Her body was already starting to decay.
sentences.chinese: 她的尸体已经开始腐烂。

sentences.english: Most archaeological finds are broken, damaged, or decayed.
sentences.chinese: 大部分考古发现物都已破裂、损坏或腐烂。

sentences.english: decaying organic matter
sentences.chinese: 腐烂的有机物

sentences.english: In Orthodox Europe, mass religion seems to have decayed less.
sentences.chinese: 在正教会流行的欧洲地区，集体宗教信仰的影响力似乎衰退得没那么严重。

sentences.english: tooth decay
sentences.chinese: 蛀牙

detailed_translations.english: to be slowly destroyed by a natural chemical process, or to make something do this
the natural chemical change that causes the slow destruction of something

sentences.english: The government shoulders ethic obligation, she has to induct and maintain the rationalization of the living world.
sentences.chinese: 政府在生活世界中引导和维护生活世界的合理化，肩负著伦理责任；

sentences.english: a stress fracture in his left knee
sentences.chinese: 他左膝上的应力性骨折

sentences.english: a hairline fracture
sentences.chinese: 细小的裂缝

sentences.english: The immense pressure causes the rock to fracture.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的压力造成岩石断裂。

detailed_translations.english: a crack or broken part in a bone or other hard substance
if a bone or other hard substance fractures, or if it is fractured, it breaks or cracks

sentences.english: Michelle and her mother once gave me a figurine of a beautiful black child sitting in a wheelchair.
sentences.chinese: 米歇尔和她的母亲曾经送给我一座小雕像，是一个坐在轮椅上的漂亮黑人小孩。

sentences.english: It was very early in the morning while I was doing my prayer time when the figurine of Michelle, for no apparent reason, fell from my bookshelf to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 有一个很早的清晨，我正在祈祷，但是莫名其妙地，米歇尔的小雕像从书架上跌落到了地上。

sentences.english: This recycled fair trade plastic bag chicken figurine is handcrafted by disadvantaged crafters in the townships near Cape Town, South Africa, and produced exclusively for Wow!
sentences.chinese: 这组可回收的平价公鸡小塑像是由一群南非开普敦附近乡镇的贫民工匠们手工制作完成，并且专供给WOW进口公司。

detailed_translations.english: a small model of a person or animal used as a decoration

name: liberty
trans: 自由； 冒失， 冒昧， 失礼

sentences.english: the fight for liberty and equality
sentences.chinese: 争取自由和平等的斗争

detailed_translations.english: the freedom and the right to do whatever you want without asking permission or being afraid of authority

sentences.english: plans for a secret rendezvous
sentences.chinese: 秘密约会的计划

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement to meet someone at a particular time and place, often secretly
to meet someone at a time or place that was arranged earlier

sentences.english: the camaraderie of the women’s basketball team
sentences.chinese: 女子篮球队的队友情谊

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of friendship that a group of people have, especially when they work together

sentences.english: The apprentice lingered his work.
sentences.chinese: 这个徒弟磨洋工。

sentences.english: His apprentice always leaves the tools about.
sentences.chinese: 他的徒弟老是乱放工具。

sentences.english: That would be good for my apprentice to have, complementary.
sentences.chinese: 补充说一下，那会是成为我徒弟的优势。

name: marsh
trans: 湿地， 沼泽， 沼泽地

sentences.english: He led them away from a marsh.
sentences.chinese: 他把他们带离沼泽。

sentences.english: My urine and excrement are recycled by a system of ducts, pipes, wires, plants, and marsh-microbes, and redeemed into water and food which I can eat.
sentences.chinese: 由众多的导管、管线、植物和沼泽微生物构成的系统回收了我的尿液和粪便，并将其还原成水和食物供我食用。

detailed_translations.english: an area of low flat ground that is always wet and soft

detailed_translations.chinese: 沼泽的；生长在沼泽地的

sentences.english: "In anthropology, you can't equate third gender with homosexuality," he said.
sentences.chinese: “在人类学中，你不能将同性恋和第三性别混同，”他说。

sentences.english: When I was a student at Cambridge I remember an anthropology professor holding up a picture of a bone with 28 incisions carved in it.
sentences.chinese: 当我还在剑桥读书的时候，我记得有一位人类学的教授拿出一张照片，上面是一根有28个切口的骨头。

sentences.english: Not to be the skunk at this party, but I think it's important to ask whether neuroscience reveals anything more than we already know from, say, anthropology.
sentences.chinese: 我并不想成为派对上的讨厌鬼，但我认为很重要的是，要问清楚神经科学是否揭示出我们已知之外的东西，比如人类学。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of people, their societies,  culture s  etc

sentences.english: The country was plunged into economic chaos.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家陷入了经济大混乱。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which everything is happening in a confused way and nothing is organized or arranged in order

sentences.english: This controls the absorption of liquids.
sentences.chinese: 这可以控制液体的吸收。

detailed_translations.chinese: 吸收；全神贯注，专心致志
detailed_translations.english: a process in which something takes in liquid, gas, or heat

name: abundant
trans: 丰富的， 充分的， 充裕的

sentences.english: an abundant supply of fresh water
sentences.chinese: 充足的淡水供应

sentences.english: abundant opportunities for well qualified staff
sentences.chinese: 提供给高素质的员工的大量机会

detailed_translations.chinese: 丰富的， 富裕的； 大量的， 充足的
detailed_translations.english: something that is abundant exists or is available in large quantities so that there is more than enough

sentences.english: Melanin is the dark brown pigment of the hair, skin and eyes.
sentences.chinese: 黑色素是头发、皮肤以及眼睛中的深棕色色素。

sentences.english: The artist Sandy Lee uses natural pigments in her work.
sentences.chinese: 画家桑迪·李在她的作品中使用天然颜料。

detailed_translations.english: a natural substance that makes skin, hair, plants etc a particular colour

sentences.english: The weather forecast is good for tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 天气预报说明天是晴天。

sentences.english: Rain was forecast for the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 预报周末有雨。

detailed_translations.english: a description of what is likely to happen in the future, based on the information that you have now
to make a statement saying what is likely to happen in the future, based on the information that you have now

sentences.english: Ethel’s health has deteriorated.
sentences.chinese: 埃塞尔的健康状况恶化了。

sentences.english: America’s deteriorating economy
sentences.chinese: 美国日渐恶化的经济

detailed_translations.english: to become worse

sentences.english: to input text/data/figures
sentences.chinese: 把文本 / 数据 / 数字输入计算机

sentences.english: data input
sentences.chinese: 数据输入

detailed_translations.english: to put information into a computer
the act of putting information into a computer; the information that you put in

name: induce
trans: 劝诱； 促使； 引起， 导致； 感应

sentences.english: Nothing would induce me to vote for him again.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么能诱使我再投他的票了。

sentences.english: Doctors said surgery could induce a heart attack.
sentences.chinese: 医生们说手术可能导致心脏病。

detailed_translations.english: to persuade someone to do something, especially something that does not seem wise

sentences.english: A long cobbled street bisects the town from east to west.
sentences.chinese: 一条长长的鹅卵石街道从东向西把小镇一分为二。

detailed_translations.english: to divide something into two equal parts

detailed_translations.chinese: 受过严格训练的人；良种动物
良种的；受过严格训练的；优秀的

sentences.english: abnormal behaviour
sentences.chinese: 反常行为

sentences.english: an abnormal level of cholesterol
sentences.chinese: 胆固醇水平异常

sentences.english: My parents thought it was abnormal for a boy to be interested in ballet.
sentences.chinese: 我父母认为一个男孩子对芭蕾舞感兴趣并不正常。

detailed_translations.english: very different from usual in a way that seems strange, worrying, wrong, or dangerous

sentences.english: My enthusiasm for the project was waning.
sentences.chinese: 我对这个项目的热情逐渐减退了。

sentences.english: The group’s influence had begun to wane by this time.
sentences.chinese: 此时，这个团体的影响力已经开始减弱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 衰落；变小；亏缺；退潮；消逝
detailed_translations.english: if something such as power, influence, or a feeling wanes, it becomes gradually less strong or less important

sentences.english: That is one electron volt.
sentences.chinese: 就是一单位的电子伏特。

sentences.english: If I multiply these two, what is the coulomb times a volt?
sentences.chinese: 如果我把这两个乘起来，库仑乘以伏特是多少？

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring the force of an electric current

sentences.english: a play satirizing the fashion industry
sentences.chinese: 一部讽刺时装业的戏剧

detailed_translations.english: to use satire to make people see someone’s or something’s faults

name: shrewd
trans: 敏捷的， 机灵的， 精明的， 伶俐的

sentences.english: Malcolm is a shrewd businessman.
sentences.chinese: 马尔科姆是个精明的商人。

sentences.english: She was shrewd enough to guess who was responsible.
sentences.chinese: 她很精明，一猜就知道是谁干的。

sentences.english: Capra looked at her with shrewd eyes.
sentences.chinese: 卡普拉眼神犀利地看着她。

detailed_translations.english: good at judging what people or situations are really like

sentences.english: There’s a big difference between knowing that something is true, and being able to prove it.
sentences.chinese: 知道什么正确与能够证明它正确，这之间有很大的不同。

sentences.english: There's not much difference in price between the two computers.
sentences.chinese: 这两种计算机价格上没有多大的差别。

sentences.english: We have our differences , but she's still my sister.
sentences.chinese: 我们之间虽然不和，但她仍旧是我的妹妹。

detailed_translations.english: a way in which two or more people or things are not like each other

name: baffle
trans: 困惑； 阻碍； 为难

sentences.english: The question baffled me completely.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题把我彻底难倒了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…困惑；使…受挫折；用挡板控制
detailed_translations.english: if something baffles you, you cannot understand or explain it at all

sentences.english: It represents a last-ditch attempt by the country to extricate itself from its economic crisis.
sentences.chinese: 这是该国摆脱经济危机的最后一搏。

detailed_translations.english: to escape from a difficult or embarrassing situation, or to help someone escape

sentences.english: The molecules of oxygen gas contain just two atoms.
sentences.chinese: 氧分子中只有两个原子。

detailed_translations.english: the smallest unit into which any substance can be divided without losing its own chemical nature, usually consisting of two or more atoms

sentences.english: Draw a circle 10cm in diameter.
sentences.chinese: 画一个直径10厘米的圆形。

sentences.english: Johnson was part of the President’s inner circle (= the people who have the most influence ) .
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊是总统核心集团的人。

sentences.english: Sooner or later, fashion comes full circle.
sentences.chinese: 时尚迟早会流行回来的。

sentences.english: This is the road that circles the city.
sentences.chinese: 这就是那条环城路。

detailed_translations.english: a completely round shape, like the letter O
to move in the shape of a circle around something, especially in the air

sentences.english: Her face wore a reminiscent smile.
sentences.chinese: 她面带微笑，沉浸在往事之中。

detailed_translations.chinese: 怀旧的，回忆往事的；耽于回想的
detailed_translations.english: thinking about the past

sentences.english: a baby’s soft little butt
sentences.chinese: 宝宝软软的小屁股

detailed_translations.chinese: 屁股；烟头；笑柄；靶垛；粗大的一端
detailed_translations.english: the part of your body that you sit on
to hit or push against something or someone with your head

name: safeguard
trans: 安全装置， 安全措施

sentences.english: International safeguards prevent the increase of nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 国际安全条约防止核武器数量增加。

detailed_translations.chinese: [安全] 保护；保卫；保护措施
detailed_translations.english: a rule, agreement etc that is intended to protect someone or something from possible dangers or problems
to protect something from harm or damage

sentences.english: a diligent student
sentences.chinese: 勤勉的学生

detailed_translations.chinese: 勤勉的；用功的，费尽心血的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is diligent works hard and is careful and thorough

name: sophisticated
trans: 尖端的， 复杂的， 先进的； 老练的， 老于世故的

sentences.english: sophisticated software
sentences.chinese: 很先进的软件

sentences.english: a highly sophisticated weapons system
sentences.chinese: 非常精密的武器系统

detailed_translations.english: a sophisticated machine, system, method etc is very well designed and very advanced, and often works in a complicated way

name: anomaly
trans: 不规则， 异常的人或物

sentences.english: In those days, a woman professor was still an anomaly.
sentences.chinese: 那个时候，女教授仍旧十分稀罕。

detailed_translations.english: something that is noticeable because it is different from what is usual

name: equivocal
trans: 意义不明确的； 模棱两可的； 可疑的

sentences.english: His answer was equivocal.
sentences.chinese: 他的回答模棱两可。

sentences.english: She was rather equivocal about her work.
sentences.chinese: 她谈到她的工作时有点含糊其词。

detailed_translations.english: if you are equivocal, you are deliberately unclear in the way that you give information or your opinion

sentences.english: Only the kinkajou's tail is prehensile, like a monkey's, and only the kinkajou has been a pet for Paris Hilton.
sentences.chinese: 二者仅有的不同点在于蜜熊的尾巴像猴子一样可以用来抓握，而且还曾被帕里斯·希尔顿拿来当宠物养。

detailed_translations.chinese: 适于抓握的；善于领会的
detailed_translations.english: a prehensile tail, foot etc can curl around things and hold on to them

sentences.english: Their activities have come under police scrutiny .
sentences.chinese: 他们的活动受到警方的严密监视。

detailed_translations.chinese: 详细检查， 仔细观察
detailed_translations.english: careful and thorough examination of someone or something

sentences.english: the tough realism of his early works
sentences.chinese: 他早期作品粗粝的现实主义风格

detailed_translations.chinese: 现实主义；实在论；现实主义的态度和行为
detailed_translations.english: the style of art and literature in which things, especially unpleasant things, are shown or described as they really are in life

name: archaic
trans: 古老的； 古代的； 陈旧的

sentences.english: archaic words
sentences.chinese: 古词

detailed_translations.chinese: 古代的；陈旧的；古体的；古色古香的
detailed_translations.english: old and no longer used

sentences.english: The bus overturned and fell into a ravine.
sentences.chinese: 这辆公共汽车翻了车，掉进了一处深谷。

detailed_translations.english: a deep narrow valley with steep sides

name: inalienable
trans: 不能让与的， 不可剥夺的

sentences.english: inalienable human rights
sentences.chinese: 不可剥夺的人权

detailed_translations.chinese: 不可分割的；不可剥夺的；不能让与的
detailed_translations.english: an inalienable right, power etc cannot be taken from you

sentences.english: The quadrilateral takes eight arguments representing the four points of the quadrilateral.
sentences.chinese: 四边形接受八个参数，代表的是这个四边形的四个顶点。

sentences.english: They learn the Latin root later, or side, and construct such English words as bilateral and quadrilateral.
sentences.chinese: 他们又学了拉丁词根later（意思是“边”），并且组成了英语单词bilateral（双边的）和 quadrilateral（四边的）。

sentences.english: It comprises two quadrilateral Building courts, or upper and lower wards, separated by the Round Tower (erected by Henry II), a massive structure Built on a mound and visible for many miles.
sentences.chinese: 由两个四方形的庭院构成，院落之间隔着一个巨大的圆塔。圆塔建于人工堆成的小丘上，几哩之外都能看见。

detailed_translations.english: a flat shape with four straight sides
having or formed by four sides

sentences.english: a rope bridge across the chasm
sentences.chinese: 峡谷上的索桥

detailed_translations.english: a very deep space between two areas of rock or ice, especially one that is dangerous

sentences.english: Portable stove such as butane or charcoal.
sentences.chinese: 便携炉，比如丁烷或木炭

sentences.english: Mandy Joye: And there’s also propane and butane, and gases that derive from the same processes that make the oil.
sentences.chinese: 曼迪•乔伊：泄露的还有丙烷和丁烷等气体，这些气体是在石油钻取过程中产生的。

sentences.english: In 1999, a jury found Koch Industries guilty of negligence and malice in the deaths of two Texas teen-agers in an explosion that resulted from a leaky underground butane pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 1999年，陪审团在一次裁决中判定德克萨斯州地下丁烷管道泄漏引发爆炸，致两名未成年人死亡是由于科赫工业的玩忽职守。

detailed_translations.english: a gas stored in liquid form, used for cooking and heating

sentences.english: Surely His pleading with the lost, His offers of mercy to the reprobate, and the call of the gospel to all who hear are all sincere expressions of the heart of a loving God.
sentences.chinese: 他对迷失方向的的人的恳求，他对堕落的人的同情，他对所有听到他声音的人施与福音，这一切真挚的表达都源于他充满爱的心。

sentences.english: They profess that they know God; but in works they deny him, being abominable, and disobedient, and unto every good work reprobate.
sentences.chinese: 他们说是认识神行事却和他相背。 本是可憎恶的，是悖逆的，在各样善事上是可废弃的。

sentences.english: Too much tea is bad for your digestion.
sentences.chinese: 喝太多茶会影响消化。

detailed_translations.english: the process of digesting food

name: putrid
trans: 腐烂的； 非常讨厌的

sentences.english: the putrid smells from the slaughterhouses
sentences.chinese: 屠宰场散发出的腐臭味

detailed_translations.chinese: 腐败的；腐烂的；令人厌恶的
detailed_translations.english: dead animals, plants etc that are putrid are decaying and smell very bad

sentences.english: Confrontation between the two sides ensued for 3 hours as a result, eventually with the Vietnamese Navy retreating due to inclement weather.
sentences.chinese: 双方的对抗持续了3小时，最终越南海军由于险恶的天气而撤退。

sentences.english: This space wraps around the southern side of the house, and is covered by an overhanging roof. A fireplace allows residents to enjoy the outdoors, even in inclement weather.
sentences.chinese: 这部分空间包裹着建筑的南面，被悬挑屋顶覆盖。即使在恶劣的天气情况下，壁炉的存在使居民可以更享受户外空间。

detailed_translations.english: inclement weather is unpleasantly cold, wet etc

name: enlist
trans: 征募， 征召， 参军

sentences.english: He telephoned me the latest news.
sentences.chinese: 他打电话告诉我最新的消息。

sentences.english: His latest novel was cut up by the reviewers.
sentences.chinese: 他的最新小说被评论家批得体无完肤。

sentences.english: In order to prove his point he showed them the latest sales figures.
sentences.chinese: 为了证明他的观点，他给他们看了最新的销售数字。

detailed_translations.english: the most recent or newest thing

detailed_translations.chinese: 最新的，最近的；最迟的，最后的
detailed_translations.english: the most recent or the newest

name: validate
trans: 使有效， 使有法律效力； 批准； 确认

sentences.english: The Supreme Court has validated the lower court’s interpretation of the law.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院已经认可下级法院对这条法规的阐释。

sentences.english: Many scientists plan to wait until the results of the study are validated by future research.
sentences.chinese: 许多科学家计划等到调查结果被今后的研究证实了以后再作定论。

detailed_translations.english: to prove that something is true or correct, or to make a document or agreement officially and legally acceptable

sentences.english: Joanne was so guileless that Claire had no option but to believe her.
sentences.chinese: 乔安妮如此诚实，所以克莱尔除了相信她以外没有别的选择。

detailed_translations.english: behaving in an honest way, without trying to hide anything or deceive people

sentences.english: Computer games can improve children’s manual dexterity .
sentences.chinese: 电脑游戏可以提高儿童手的灵活性。

detailed_translations.english: skill and speed in doing something with your hands

name: inhibit
trans: 阻止， 妨碍， 抑制

sentences.english: An unhappy family life may inhibit children’s learning.
sentences.chinese: 不幸福的家庭生活可能会阻碍儿童的学习。

detailed_translations.english: to prevent something from growing or developing well

name: disclose
trans: 泄露； 揭发； 解开

sentences.english: Some companies have already voluntarily disclosed similar information .
sentences.chinese: 一些公司已经主动透露了类似的信息。

sentences.english: He refused to disclose the identity of the politician.
sentences.chinese: 他拒绝透露那位政治家的身份。

detailed_translations.english: to make something publicly known, especially after it has been kept secret

name: unspeakable
trans: 无法形容的， 不能以言语表达的

sentences.english: an unspeakable tragedy
sentences.chinese: 无法形容的悲剧

detailed_translations.chinese: 无法形容的；不能以言语表达的；坏透了的
detailed_translations.english: used for emphasizing how bad someone or something is

sentences.english: a meeting covering many disparate subjects
sentences.chinese: 涉及许多不同议题的会议

sentences.english: the difficulties of dealing with disparate groups of people
sentences.chinese: 和不同的人群打交道的难处

detailed_translations.chinese: 不同的；不相干的；全异的
detailed_translations.english: consisting of things or people that are very different and not related to each other

sentences.english: This pub had a mixed clientele.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒吧有混杂的顾客群。

detailed_translations.english: The clientele of a place or organization are its customers or clients

name: defiant
trans: 挑战的， 挑衅的， 目中无人的

sentences.english: The players are in a defiant mood as they prepare for tomorrow's game.
sentences.chinese: 在准备明天的比赛时，球员们态度挑衅。

detailed_translations.chinese: 挑衅的；目中无人的，蔑视的；挑战的
detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone is defiant, you mean they show aggression or independence by refusing to obey someone

sentences.english: He felt so powerless.
sentences.chinese: 他感到如此无助。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无力的；[劳经] 无能力的，无权的
detailed_translations.english: unable to stop or control something because you do not have the power, strength, or legal right to do so

sentences.english: iron oxide
sentences.chinese: 氧化铁

detailed_translations.english: a substance which is produced when a substance is combined with oxygen

sentences.english: They undertook to send each of us a sample contract for perusal.
sentences.chinese: 他们答应给我们每人寄送一份合同样本以供阅读。

detailed_translations.english: Perusal of something such as a letter, article, or document is the action of reading it

name: arbor
trans: 树阴处，  藤架， 凉亭

sentences.english: Do not antagonize your customers.
sentences.chinese: 不要惹恼顾客。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…敌对；使…对抗；对…起反作用
detailed_translations.english: to annoy someone very much by doing something that they do not like

sentences.english: a chart showing last year’s sales
sentences.chinese: 显示去年销售情况的一份图表

sentences.english: a weather chart
sentences.chinese: 天气图

sentences.english: the theatre’s seating chart
sentences.chinese: 剧场的座位图

detailed_translations.english: information that is clearly arranged in the form of a simple picture, set of figures,  graph  etc, or a piece of paper with this information on it

detailed_translations.chinese: 用图表表示， 在图上表示
detailed_translations.english: if a record charts, it enters the weekly list of the most popular records

name: evoke
trans: 唤起， 引起， 使人想起

sentences.english: The photographs evoked strong memories of our holidays in France.
sentences.chinese: 那些照片勾起了我们到法国度假的深刻回忆。

sentences.english: His appearance is bound to evoke sympathy.
sentences.chinese: 他的外表肯定会引起人们的同情。

sentences.english: Her speech evoked a hostile response.
sentences.chinese: 她的讲话引起了敌对的反应。

detailed_translations.chinese: 唤起， 引起， 使人想起
detailed_translations.english: to produce a strong feeling or memory in someone

name: preface
trans: 序言， 引言， 前言

sentences.english: ...the preface to Kelman's novel.
sentences.chinese: …凯尔曼小说的前言。

sentences.english: I will preface what I am going to say with a few lines from Shakespeare.
sentences.chinese: 我将引用莎士比亚的几行诗作为我讲话的开场白。

detailed_translations.english: an introduction at the beginning of a book or speech
If you preface an action or speech with something else, you do or say this other thing first

sentences.english: There is still much antagonism between environmental groups and the oil companies.
sentences.chinese: 环境组织与石油公司之间仍有很多敌意。

detailed_translations.english: hatred between people or groups of people

sentences.english: Spassky had never previously lost to his antagonist.
sentences.chinese: 斯帕斯基以前从未败给过他的敌手。

detailed_translations.chinese: 敌手；[解剖] 对抗肌；[生化] 拮抗物；反协同试剂
detailed_translations.english: your opponent in a competition, battle, quarrel etc

sentences.english: They were charged with inciting racial hatred.
sentences.chinese: 他们被指控煽动种族仇恨。

detailed_translations.english: to deliberately encourage people to fight, argue etc

sentences.english: Each atomic cluster is made up of neutrons and protons.
sentences.chinese: 每个原子团簇是由中子和质子组成的。

detailed_translations.english: a part of an atom that has no electrical charge

sentences.english: ...the mediocrity of most contemporary literature.
sentences.chinese: …大多数当代文学作品的平庸。

detailed_translations.english: If you refer to the mediocrity of something, you mean that it is of average quality but you think it should be better

sentences.english: She interposed herself between the general and his wife.
sentences.chinese: 她挡在将军和他妻子之间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 提出（异议等）；使插入；使干涉
detailed_translations.english: to put yourself or something else between two other things

name: inexcusable
trans: 无法辩解的， 不可宽赦的

sentences.english: an inexcusable act of aggression
sentences.chinese: 不可饶恕的侵略行为

detailed_translations.chinese: 不可原谅的；没法辩解的；不可宽恕的
detailed_translations.english: inexcusable behaviour is too bad to be excused

sentences.english: People who travel by rail still read an immense amount.
sentences.chinese: 人们坐火车旅行时仍然会读很多书。

sentences.english: Regular visits from a social worker can be of immense value to old people living alone.
sentences.chinese: 对于独居老人来说社工的经常探望很重要。

detailed_translations.english: extremely large

name: vacate
trans: 腾出； 空出， 离 ， 退

sentences.english: Clay will vacate the position on June 19.
sentences.chinese: 克莱将于6月19日离职。

detailed_translations.english: to leave a job or position so that it is available for someone else to do

name: inherent
trans: 固有的， 内在的， 天生的

sentences.english: Every business has its own inherent risks.
sentences.chinese: 每笔生意本身都有风险。

sentences.english: I’m afraid the problems you mention are inherent in the system.
sentences.chinese: 你提及的这些问题恐怕本来就存在于这个体制中。

detailed_translations.english: a quality that is inherent in something is a natural part of it and cannot be separated from it

sentences.english: He was now in a more advantageous position.
sentences.chinese: 他现在的位置更有利。

detailed_translations.english: helpful and likely to make you successful

name: encroach
trans: 侵占， 蚕食； 超出通常  界线

sentences.english: The shrubs encroached ever more on the twisting drive.
sentences.chinese: 灌木丛蚕食了越来越多蜿蜒的车道。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually take more of someone’s time, possessions, rights etc than you should

sentences.english: ...a facsimile edition of Beethoven's musical manuscripts.
sentences.chinese: ...一份贝多芬音乐手稿的摹本版。

detailed_translations.english: a  fax

name: definite
trans: 明确的， 肯定的， 一定的

sentences.english: It’s impossible for me to give you a definite answer.
sentences.chinese: 我不可能给你明确的答复。

sentences.english: We need to record sufficient data to enable definite conclusions to be reached.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要记录足够的数据，才能得出明确的结论。

sentences.english: He’d shown definite signs of resigning himself to the situation.
sentences.chinese: 他明显表现出安于这种状况的样子。

sentences.english: Fix a definite date for the delivery of your computer.
sentences.chinese: 请为你的电脑定个确切的交货日期。

detailed_translations.english: clearly known, seen, or stated

sentences.english: Keep a wary eye on the weather before you set sail.
sentences.chinese: 出航前要密切注意天气。

sentences.english: She had a wary expression on her face.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上带着小心谨慎的表情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谨慎的；机警的；惟恐的；考虑周到的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is wary is careful because they think something might be dangerous or harmful

sentences.english: The average weight of a baby at birth is just over seven pounds.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿的平均出生体重是七磅多一点。

sentences.english: It can be sewn into curtain hems to weight the curtain and so allow it to hang better.
sentences.chinese: 可以把它缝在窗帘的摺边里以增加窗帘的重量，使之更有下垂感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重量，重力；负担；砝码；重要性
detailed_translations.english: how heavy something is when you measure it
If you weight something, you make it heavier by adding something to it, for example, in order to stop it from moving easily

name: intrinsic
trans: 固有的， 本质的， 内在的

sentences.english: the intrinsic interest of the subject
sentences.chinese: 该话题本身的趣味

detailed_translations.english: being part of the nature or character of someone or something

sentences.english: Henry was not slow to dissemble when it served his purposes.
sentences.chinese: 形势一对他有利，亨利就马上开始隐瞒。

detailed_translations.english: to hide your true feelings, thoughts etc

name: guilty
trans: 犯罪的， 有罪的； 自觉有罪的， 内疚的， 心虚的

sentences.english: She looked self-conscious and guilty.
sentences.chinese: 她看上去很不自然，很内疚的样子。

sentences.english: He was found not guilty of the death of PC Jones.
sentences.chinese: 关于警员琼斯的死，他被判无罪。

detailed_translations.english: feeling very ashamed and sad because you know that you have done something wrong

sentences.english: The median age of the group is 42.
sentences.chinese: 该组的中间年龄为42岁。

detailed_translations.chinese: n中值，中位数；三角形中线；梯形中位线
detailed_translations.english: the middle number or measurement in a set of numbers or measurements that have been arranged in order
being the middle number or measurement in a set of numbers or measurements that have been arranged in order

sentences.english: We represent the last vestige of what made this nation great – hard work.
sentences.chinese: 我们代表了曾经使这个国家伟大的仅存的品质–勤奋。

detailed_translations.english: a small part or amount of something that remains when most of it no longer exists

sentences.english: A kleptomaniac is a compulsive thief who steals because he or she cannot help it.
sentences.chinese: 盗窃狂身不由己的小偷，偷东西是因为无法自制。

sentences.english: The vicious kleptomaniac was eventually overthrown after losing his cold war sponsors in the west.
sentences.chinese: 这个恶毒的盗窃狂最终在失去他冷战时期的西方赞助者之后被推翻。

detailed_translations.english: someone suffering from kleptomania

sentences.english: Here the rich and the poor live in close proximity (= very near to each other ) .
sentences.chinese: 在这里，富人和穷人比邻而居。

detailed_translations.english: nearness in distance or time

name: maritime
trans: 海上的； 海事的， 海运的； 海员的

sentences.english: San Francisco has lost nearly all of its maritime industry.
sentences.chinese: 旧金山几乎失去了所有海运业。

detailed_translations.chinese: 海的；海事的；沿海的；海员的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the sea or ships

sentences.english: ...substances that are injurious to health.
sentences.chinese: ...有害健康的物质。

detailed_translations.english: causing injury, harm, or damage

name: quibble
trans: 谬论； 双关话； 俏皮话； 吹毛求疵的意见

sentences.english: Lawmakers spent the day quibbling over the final wording of the resolution.
sentences.chinese: 立法者们花了一天争辩决议的最后措词。

detailed_translations.chinese: 诡辩；挑剔；说模棱两可的话
detailed_translations.english: When people quibble over a small matter, they argue about it even though it is not important

sentences.english: The letter “s” terminates most plural nouns.
sentences.chinese: 大多数复数名词以字母“S”结尾。

sentences.english: What’s the plural of ‘mouse’?
sentences.chinese: ‘mouse’的复数形式是什么？

detailed_translations.english: a plural word or form shows you are talking about more than one thing, person etc. For example, ‘we’ is a plural  pronoun  .
a form of a word that shows you are talking about more than one thing, person etc. For example, ‘dogs’ is the plural of ‘dog’

name: prank
trans: 胡闹， 开玩笑， 恶作剧

sentences.english: a childish prank
sentences.chinese: 孩子气的恶作剧

detailed_translations.english: a trick, especially one which is played on someone to make them look silly
to dress or decorate showily or gaudily

name: bullock
trans: 阉牛； 一岁半以下的小公牛

detailed_translations.english: a young male cow that cannot breed

name: heartrending
trans: 悲惨的； 令人心碎的

sentences.english: heartrending stories of children being taken from their parents
sentences.chinese: 关于孩子被人从父母身边夺走的悲伤故事

detailed_translations.english: making you feel great pity

sentences.english: the Mayor’s ceremonial duties
sentences.chinese: 市长的礼仪职责

sentences.english: Native American ceremonial robes
sentences.chinese: 美洲印第安人的礼袍

detailed_translations.english: used in a ceremony or done as part of a ceremony
a special ceremony, or special formal actions

sentences.english: Objective To observe the disinfection effect of gastroscope by ozone water.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察臭氧水在胃镜体的消毒效果监测。

sentences.english: Their skin is weathered and tanned, as if they have fossilised themselves in ozone to keep death at bay.
sentences.chinese: 他们的皮肤饱经风霜被晒得黧黑，好像他们在臭氧中变成化石并在海湾边防止死亡。

sentences.english: The synergistic effect of oxygen and (or ) ozone in atmosphere with ultraviolet also led to the adhesion failure of adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 大气中的氧和（或）臭氧与紫外线协同作用是导致该压敏粘合剂失粘的原因。

detailed_translations.english: a poisonous blue gas that is a type of oxygen

sentences.english: Dee watched the waves breaking on the shore.
sentences.chinese: 迪伊凝视着拍岸的波涛。

sentences.english: The ship tipped over, and finally vanished beneath the waves.
sentences.chinese: 船倾覆了，最终沉没在海浪之下。

detailed_translations.english: a line of raised water that moves across the surface of the sea
if you wave something, or if it waves, it moves from side to side

sentences.english: Mother is devoted to Dad although they squabble all the time.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈深爱着爸爸，虽然他们总是为琐事争吵。

sentences.english: There have been minor squabbles about phone bills.
sentences.chinese: 为电话账单已闹过口角。

detailed_translations.english: to argue about something unimportant
Squabble is also a noun

sentences.english: The village had a certain rustic charm .
sentences.chinese: 这个村庄有一种迷人的田园风情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 乡村的；纯朴的；粗野的；手工粗糙的
detailed_translations.english: simple, old-fashioned, and not spoiled by modern developments, in a way that is typical of the countryside
someone from the country, especially a farm worker

sentences.english: Blood vessels in the lungs are filled and distend. Capillary changes have been observed in the animal model of simulated microgravity.
sentences.chinese: 肺血管充盈、扩张，并在模拟微重力动物模型中观察到肺微血管损伤。

sentences.english: The primary role of AM is to distend blood vessel and decrease blood pressure, and it can also restrain the migration of vessel smooth muscle cells.
sentences.chinese: AM在休克发生发展过程的作用主要是扩张血管，降低血压，还具有抑制血管平滑肌细胞迁移等作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion:Nifedipine could distend ophthalmic artery and has similar function on other micro-cerebral vessels.
sentences.chinese: 结论：硝苯地平可扩张眼动脉，对脑部其它小动脉可能有相似作用。

sentences.english: I'm feeling a little tipsy.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得有点微醉了。

detailed_translations.english: slightly drunk

name: prudent
trans: 谨慎的， 深谋远虑的

sentences.english: prudent house buyers
sentences.chinese: 谨慎的购房者

detailed_translations.english: sensible and careful, especially by trying to avoid unnecessary risks

sentences.english: He was an accomplished politician and a crafty autocrat.
sentences.chinese: 他是个有造诣的政治家，也是个狡黠的独裁者。

sentences.english: He was an accomplished politician and a crafty autocrat.
sentences.chinese: 他是个杰出的政治家，也是个狡黠的独裁者。

sentences.english: She wrote a lot of books that exposed the avarice of the authoritarian . the autocracy of the autocrat and the falsity of the autonomy.
sentences.chinese: 她写了许多书，暴露了权力主义者的贪婪，独裁者的独裁政体和自治权的虚伪。

detailed_translations.english: a ruler who has complete power over a country

sentences.english: The hostages cowered in their seats.
sentences.chinese: 这些人质蜷缩在其座位上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 退缩；抖缩；蜷缩；弯腰屈膝
detailed_translations.english: to bend low and move back because you are frightened

sentences.english: The repetition of symbols was to be enough, without trauma, as well, perhaps, to attenuate it, or even jar it altogether loose from her memory.
sentences.chinese: 象征的重复快要足够，即便没有可能的从她记忆中流出的创伤，去减弱它去刺激它。

sentences.english: You could never eliminate risk, but preparation and training could attenuate it.
sentences.chinese: 风险不可能完全消除，但可以通过防范和培训来降低。

detailed_translations.english: To attenuate something means to reduce it or weaken it

sentences.english: The technique Mr. Wilson uses most often is to juxtapose things for dramatic effect.
sentences.chinese: 威尔逊先生最常用的技巧是把事物并列起来以获得戏剧性效果。

detailed_translations.english: to put things together, especially things that are not normally together, in order to compare them or to make something new

sentences.english: He loathes their politics.
sentences.chinese: 他讨厌他们那一套政治。

detailed_translations.english: to hate someone or something very much

sentences.english: The rotation of flagella pushes the bacteria through the water.
sentences.chinese: 鞭毛的旋转可以推动细菌在水中行进。

sentences.english: Sets this matrix to a translation, rotation and scaling matrix.
sentences.chinese: 设置这个矩阵为一个平移、旋转和缩放矩阵。

detailed_translations.english: when something turns with a circular movement around a central point

sentences.english: He actually had the temerity to tell her to lose weight.
sentences.chinese: 他竟然放肆地叫她减肥。

detailed_translations.english: when someone says or does something in a way that shows a lack of respect for other people and is likely to offend them

sentences.english: He owned a gun for scaring off intruders.
sentences.chinese: 他有一支枪，用来吓走入侵者。

detailed_translations.english: An intruder is a person who goes into a place where they are not supposed to be

name: infinitesimal
trans: 极小量， 极微量， 无限小

sentences.english: infinitesimal changes in temperature
sentences.chinese: 气温极其微小的变化

detailed_translations.chinese: 无穷小的；无限小的；极小的
detailed_translations.english: extremely small

name: volatile
trans: 挥发性的； 易变的； 不稳定的

sentences.english: an increasingly volatile political situation
sentences.chinese: 日益动荡的政治局势

sentences.english: the highly volatile stock and bond markets
sentences.chinese: 相当不稳定的股票和债券市场

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 挥发性的；不稳定的；爆炸性的；反复无常的
detailed_translations.english: a volatile situation is likely to change suddenly and without warning

name: contentious
trans: 好争吵的； 争论的， 有异议的

sentences.chinese: 制裁预计位居最具有争议的问题之列。

detailed_translations.chinese: 诉讼的；有异议的，引起争论的；爱争论的
detailed_translations.english: causing a lot of argument and disagreement between people

sentences.english: Tom wasn’t very communicative, and kept himself to himself.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆不大善于言谈，不喜欢与人交往。

detailed_translations.chinese: 交际的；爱说话的，健谈的；无隐讳交谈的
detailed_translations.english: able to talk easily to other people

sentences.chinese: 使用这个通用的列表节点结构，您现在可以定义列表和不需要考虑存储在列表中的数据类型的列表操作。

sentences.chinese: 如果您的客户机代码需要这种特定的功能，那么这个一般层是不够的 ― 至少从迄今对它描述来看是不够的。

name: endorse
trans: 在  背面签名； 签注 ； 认可

sentences.english: I can endorse their opinion wholeheartedly.
sentences.chinese: 我可以全心全意地支持他们的观点。

detailed_translations.chinese: 背书；认可；签署；赞同；在背面签名
detailed_translations.english: to express formal support or approval for someone or something

sentences.english: Letters may be edited for length and clarity.
sentences.chinese: 信件可能要加以修改以求篇幅合适，意思明了。

sentences.english: a lack of clarity in the law on property rights
sentences.chinese: 产权法律含糊不清

detailed_translations.english: the clarity of a piece of writing, law, argument etc is its quality of being expressed clearly

name: laud
trans: 称赞， 赞美； 颂歌

sentences.english: He lauded the work of the UN High Commissioner for Refugees.
sentences.chinese: 他赞扬了联合国难民事务高级专员的工作。

detailed_translations.english: to praise someone or something
to remove from contact with others

sentences.english: a heinous crime
sentences.chinese: 滔天罪行

detailed_translations.english: very shocking and immoral

sentences.english: typical British weather
sentences.chinese: 典型的英国天气

sentences.english: This advertisement is a typical example of their marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 这则广告是他们营销策略的一个典型例子。

detailed_translations.english: having the usual features or qualities of a particular group or thing
