detailed_translations.english: If you expiate guilty feelings or bad behaviour, you do something to indicate that you are sorry for what you have done

sentences.english: Witnesses lied and perjured themselves.
sentences.chinese: 证人撒谎作伪证。

detailed_translations.chinese: 作伪证；使发伪誓；使破坏誓言
detailed_translations.english: to tell a lie after promising to tell the truth in a court of law

name: grandeur
trans: 庄严， 宏伟， 壮观

sentences.english: the grandeur of the mountains
sentences.chinese: 山峦的巍峨壮丽

detailed_translations.english: impressive beauty, power, or size

sentences.english: laser surgery
sentences.chinese: 激光(外科)手术

detailed_translations.english: a beam of light produced by a laser

sentences.english: The town is a mixture of the old and the new.
sentences.chinese: 这个小城新旧结合。

detailed_translations.english: a combination of two or more different things, feelings, or types of people

name: scope
trans: 范围； 机会， 余地

sentences.english: measures to limit the scope of criminals’ activities
sentences.chinese: 限制罪犯活动范围的措施

detailed_translations.english: the range of things that a subject, activity, book etc deals with

name: stratify
trans: 使成层， 使分层； 使形成阶层

sentences.english: We currently use a large repository of data from our operational systems to help us stratify, or classify, members.
sentences.chinese: 目前，我们使用我们业务系统的一个大型数据存储库来帮助我们对会员进行分层或分类。

sentences.english: They wanted an instrument that could reasonably stratify adults aged 65 or older into those with a low, moderate, or high risk of developing dementia within six years.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要一项工具，它可以合理地将65岁或以上老年人分成6年内具有低风险、中度风险或高度风险罹患痴呆症的人群。

detailed_translations.english: to form or be formed in layers or strata

sentences.english: He specializes in archaeology.
sentences.chinese: 他专修考古学。

sentences.english: In my recent research, I found that all three come together and, what is more, they help me to show that archaeology has relevance – it is not just old stones and bones.
sentences.chinese: 我在最近的研究中发现，这三点综合发生着作用，除此之外，它们也帮助我发现考古学的重要意义，它不仅仅意味着一堆石头和骨头。

sentences.english: "There was no access to clean water, there was no access to basic education especially in the rural areas where the archaeology was," she says.
sentences.chinese: 在那里的考古学特别是农村地区，我们并没有获得干净的水，有没有基本的教育的机会，“她说。

detailed_translations.english: the study of ancient societies by examining what remains of their buildings,  grave s  , tools etc

name: enumerate
trans: 数， 点； 枚举， 列举

sentences.english: I enumerate the work that will have to be done.
sentences.chinese: 我将必须要做的工作一一列举出来。

detailed_translations.english: to name a list of things one by one

sentences.english: A win is always good for morale.
sentences.chinese: 胜利总是可以鼓舞士气。

sentences.english: The failed coup caused a loss of morale within the army.
sentences.chinese: 政变未遂挫伤了军队的士气。

sentences.english: the Prince’s morale-boosting (= intended to raise morale ) mission to the war﹣torn country
sentences.chinese: 王子去这个饱受战争磨难的国家鼓舞士气的使命

detailed_translations.english: the level of confidence and positive feelings that people have, especially people who work together, who belong to the same team etc

sentences.english: ...British expatriates in Spain.
sentences.chinese: …侨居西班牙的英国人。

sentences.english: The expatriate vote could help determine who wins in November.
sentences.chinese: 侨居者们的投票有助于决定谁在11月获胜。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使移居国外；流放，放逐；使放弃国籍

detailed_translations.english: An expatriate is someone who is living in a country that is not their own
Expatriate is also an adjective

sentences.english: The more the physical causes incline mankind to inaction, the more the moral causes should estrange them from it.
sentences.chinese: 所以，物质的因素越使他们趋于懈怠时，精神的因素就越使他们远离物质的因素。

sentences.english: Their specific treatment of volume, apertures, and overall geometry interested us as tools to estrange conventional ideas of residential housing.
sentences.chinese: 该建筑在体量、孔径和整体几何形状上的处理手法都激发我们有了远离传统住宅的想法。

sentences.english: We hope these regions will embrace democratic reforms.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望这些地区会乐意接受民主改革。

sentences.english: Most West European countries have embraced the concept of high-speed rail networks with enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 大多数西欧国家都表现出极大的兴趣，欣然接受修建高速铁路网的想法。

detailed_translations.english: to eagerly accept a new idea, opinion, religion etc

sentences.english: Streets usually intersect at right angles.
sentences.chinese: 街道通常成直角相交。

sentences.english: So tell me about. You have done music, where do these things intersect for you?
sentences.chinese: 那么，你已经做过音乐和，艺术，这些事情的交叉点在哪里呢？

sentences.english: BP is also working on a "relief well" to intersect the original well, but this is experimental and could take two to three months to stop the flow.
sentences.chinese: 英国石油公司正努力使这座减压救险井与原先的那一座相交。 这还在实验阶段，而且可能要花上几个月的时间来停止这次的漏油事件。

detailed_translations.english: if two lines or roads intersect, they meet or go across each other

sentences.english: Soon after we arrived, we learned Hillary would have to give birth by cesarean section because the baby was in breech, upside down in the womb.
sentences.chinese: 我们抵达医院后不久，就听说希拉里需要做剖腹产，因为孩子是“臀位”，也就是说，孩子在子宫里的姿势是上下颠倒的。

sentences.english: Miya and Leah were delivered by Caesarean section at Frimley Park Hospital, in Surrey, at just 37 weeks of pregnancy after scans revealed both babies were in the breech position.
sentences.chinese: 米亚和利亚是在萨里的菲姆雷公园医院剖腹生产的，只经过37周的孕期通过检查显示两个孩子都在臀部位置。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a gun into which you put the bullets

detailed_translations.chinese: 给…穿上裤子；给…装上炮尾

sentences.english: Other partygoers rescued the injured man from his assailant.
sentences.chinese: 其他参加聚会的人从攻击者手中救出了这名受伤的男子。

detailed_translations.english: someone who attacks another person

sentences.english: Well, we know nitrogen has what?
sentences.chinese: 对于氮气我们知道什么？

sentences.english: The plant requires nitrogen in order to make proteins.
sentences.chinese: 植物需要氮以便制造蛋白质。

sentences.english: All of these from the group one and two through the group five and six elements, but what about elements, what about molecules like hydrogen, or nitrogen, or maybe oxygen?
sentences.chinese: 所有的这些都是来自于第一主族和第二组主族,到第五主族和第六组主族的悬殊，那么元素呢，比如氢气，氮气或氧气那样的分子呢？

detailed_translations.english: a gas that has no colour or smell, and that forms most of the Earth’s air. It is a chemical element: symbol N

sentences.english: a judicious choice
sentences.chinese: 审慎而明智的选择

detailed_translations.chinese: 明智的；头脑精明的；判断正确的
detailed_translations.english: done in a sensible and careful way

sentences.english: a hillside denuded in a fire
sentences.chinese: 被一场火烧得光秃秃的山坡

detailed_translations.english: to remove the plants and trees that cover an area of land

name: vermin
trans: 害虫， 害兽， 寄生虫

sentences.english: The beds were filthy and full of vermin.
sentences.chinese: 那些床铺肮脏不堪，而且爬满了虫子。

sentences.english: Foxes are considered vermin.
sentences.chinese: 狐狸被认为是害兽。

detailed_translations.english: small animals, birds, and insects that are harmful because they destroy crops, spoil food, and spread disease

name: modify
trans: 更改， 修改， 改造， 修饰

sentences.english: The feedback will be used to modify the course for next year.
sentences.chinese: 这些反馈意见将用于修改明年的课程。

sentences.english: The regulations can only be modified by a special committee.
sentences.chinese: 这些法规只能由特别委员会来修改。

detailed_translations.english: to make small changes to something in order to improve it and make it more suitable or effective

name: steadfast
trans: 稳定的； 坚定的， 忠实的

sentences.english: her father’s steadfast love for her
sentences.chinese: 她父亲对她永不改变的爱

detailed_translations.english: being certain that you are right about something and refusing to change your opinion in any way

sentences.english: Our host gave us an effusive welcome.
sentences.chinese: 主人热情地欢迎我们。

detailed_translations.english: showing your good feelings in a very excited way

sentences.english: A smooth sea never makes a skillful mariner.
sentences.chinese: 平静的大海造就不出熟练的水手。

detailed_translations.english: a  sailor

sentences.english: He was branded by the press as "villainous" and "diabolical."
sentences.chinese: 他被媒体贴上了“恶棍”和“魔鬼”的标签。

detailed_translations.chinese: 罪恶的；恶棍的；恶毒的；坏透的
detailed_translations.english: evil or criminal

sentences.english: The two men detested each other.
sentences.chinese: 两个男人互相厌恶。

detailed_translations.english: to hate something or someone very much

name: exempt
trans: 被免除  的， 被豁免的

sentences.english: So we have the current argument over how much of the derivative market will be exempt from regulation.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们就看到了当前有关衍生产品市场到底有多大份额可以得到规则的豁免的辩论。

sentences.english: All the new rules do is exempt the user from legal liability - something Apple does not appear to be pursuing anyway.
sentences.chinese: 新法规做到的仅仅是免除了用户的法律责任 - 看起来苹果本来也不打算追究这种责任。

sentences.english: So empirical approaches to literature, the simple observation of data from which one can generalize -they exempt these from the general charge against literary theory.
sentences.chinese: 文学的经验主义研究方法，对我们所概括的事物的简单数据观察,对文学理论的普遍控诉中,他们免除了这些。

sentences.english: Police are theorizing that the robbers may be posing as hitchhikers.
sentences.chinese: 警方推测那些劫匪可能会装成搭便车的人。

detailed_translations.english: to think of a possible explanation for an event or fact

sentences.english: All these earthquakes happened when the water level in Zipingpu reservoir was low.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些地震都发生在紫坪铺水库水位很低的时候。

detailed_translations.english: a lake, especially an artificial one, where water is stored before it is supplied to people’s houses

sentences.english: The fawn ran to the top of the ridge.
sentences.chinese: 那只小鹿跑上山脊。

detailed_translations.english: to seek attention and admiration (from) by cringing and flattering
a young  deer
having a pale yellow-brown colour

sentences.english: He accepted the job, albeit with some hesitation.
sentences.chinese: 尽管有些犹豫，他还是接受了那份工作。

sentences.english: Chris went with her, albeit reluctantly.
sentences.chinese: 尽管勉强，克里斯还是同她一起去了。

detailed_translations.english: used to add information that reduces the force or importance of what you have just said

name: aesthetic
trans: 美学的， 艺术的； 审美的

sentences.english: From an esthetic point of view, it’s a nice design.
sentences.chinese: 从美学角度看，这是个不错的设计。

sentences.english: a work of great aesthetic appeal
sentences.chinese: 极富美之神韵的作品

detailed_translations.english: connected with beauty and the study of beauty

name: incongruous
trans: 不调和的； 不适宜的

sentences.english: The new theatre looks utterly incongruous in its setting.
sentences.chinese: 这座新剧院和周围的环境格格不入。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不协调的；不一致的；不和谐的
detailed_translations.english: strange, unexpected, or unsuitable in a particular situation

sentences.english: children with aggressive or anti-social tendencies
sentences.chinese: 具有攻击性倾向或反社会倾向的儿童

detailed_translations.chinese: 趋向， 趋势， 倾向
detailed_translations.english: if someone or something has a tendency to do or become a particular thing, they are likely to do or become it

sentences.english: If you furbish up these old chairs you'll have a better chance of selling them.
sentences.chinese: 你要是把这些旧椅子擦亮，就会更好卖些。

detailed_translations.english: to make bright by polishing; burnish

name: caption
trans: 加上标题； 加上说明

sentences.english: The local paper featured me standing on a stepladder with a caption, "Wendy climbs the ladder to success."
sentences.chinese: 当地的报纸刊登了一幅我站在活梯上的特写，下面写着：“温迪登上了成功之梯。”

detailed_translations.english: words printed above or below a picture in a book or newspaper or on a television screen to explain what the picture is showing

sentences.english: He's not very good at arithmetic.
sentences.chinese: 他不太擅长算术。

sentences.english: a quick bit of mental arithmetic
sentences.chinese: 快速心算

detailed_translations.english: the type of mathematics that deals with the adding, multiplying, etc. of numbers

name: knighthood
trans: 骑士身份， 骑士风格， 侠义精神

sentences.english: When he finally received his knighthood in 1975 Chaplin was 85.
sentences.chinese: 当他最终在1975年得到爵士封号时，卓别林已经85岁了。

detailed_translations.english: A knighthood is a title that is given to a man by a British king or queen for his achievements or his service to his country

name: variation
trans: 变化， 变动； 变种， 变异

sentences.english: Most of his poems are variations on the theme of love.
sentences.chinese: 他的大部分诗作都是有关爱情主题的形式不同的作品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 变化；[生物] 变异，变种
detailed_translations.english: a difference between similar things, or a change from the usual amount or form of something

sentences.english: a subconscious fear of failure
sentences.chinese: 对失败下意识的恐惧

detailed_translations.english: subconscious feelings, desires etc are hidden in your mind and affect your behaviour, but you do not know that you have them

sentences.english: Around one third of our meals should be based on carbohydrate, with roughly one half of these grains being whole.
sentences.chinese: 我们每餐食物应当差不多有三分之一是碳水化合物，大概有一半谷物食品为全麦的。

sentences.english: There have been no studies of the effects of a low carbohydrate diet on pregnancy, so its effect on the fetus, if any, are unknown.
sentences.chinese: 目前为止还没有关于怀孕时低碳水化合物饮食影响的研究，因此如果对胎儿有什么影响也是不知道的。

sentences.english: The reason for this is that carbohydrate consumption stimulates insulin production, which aids the production of muscle glycogen.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为是碳水化合物的消耗刺激了胰岛素的分泌，后者对于肌肉糖原产生有帮助。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that is in foods such as sugar, bread, and potatoes, which provides your body with heat and energy and which consists of oxygen,  hydrogen  , and  carbon

sentences.english: I followed him to this island chateau where he's holding a party.
sentences.chinese: 我跟踪他来到这座岛上城堡。他将在这里举办宴会。

sentences.english: After lunch there will be a walk in the grounds of the chateau to see the Jugendstil nymph fountains, a work dating from 1903 by Walter Schott.
sentences.chinese: 午餐后，萨奥尔一行将在城堡四周“漫步”，参观（雕刻大师）沃尔特·肖特1903年的作品--德国“青年派”风格女神雕像喷泉。

sentences.english: So, he actually owned for a short time this huge chateau, and other relatives and friends lived in estates surrounding theirs.
sentences.chinese: 他只拥有这个巨大的城堡一段很短的时间，其他的亲戚朋友的房子都挨的很近。

detailed_translations.english: a castle or large country house in France

sentences.english: In codicil, keep your plans somewhat flexible so that you can change ships at the last minute.
sentences.chinese: 在遗嘱，让您的计划一定灵活性，以便您可以更改船舶在最后一分钟。

detailed_translations.english: a document making a change or addition to a  will (= a legal document saying who you want your money and property to go to when you die )

name: eject
trans: 喷射， 排出； 驱逐

sentences.english: The demonstrators were ejected from the hall.
sentences.chinese: 示威者被赶出大厅。

sentences.english: Two engines cut out and the plane started to eject fuel as it lost height.
sentences.chinese: 两个发动机突然熄火，飞机在下降的同时开始喷出燃料。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone leave a place or building by using force

sentences.english: All the cars are tested for defects before they leave the factory.
sentences.chinese: 所有汽车在出厂前都经过品质检验。

sentences.english: a genetic defect
sentences.chinese: 遗传缺陷

detailed_translations.english: a fault or a lack of something that means that something or someone is not perfect
to leave your own country or group in order to go to or join an opposing one

name: odds
trans: 事物发生的可能性， 机会

sentences.english: (= it is likely ) that he will commit the same crime again.
sentences.chinese: 他可能还会犯同样的罪行。

sentences.english: (= how likely is it ) that they will mess up?
sentences.chinese: 他们失败的可能性有多大？

sentences.english: a new company that has beaten the odds and succeeded (= it was not likely to succeed, but it did )
sentences.chinese: 战胜逆境而取得成功的一家新公司

detailed_translations.english: how likely it is that something will or will not happen

sentences.english: the acme of perfection
sentences.chinese: 尽善尽美

detailed_translations.english: the best and highest level of something

sentences.english: a casual manner
sentences.chinese: 漫不经心的态度

sentences.english: His eyes were angry, though he sounded casual.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他的语气满不在乎，但他的眼神充满怒气。

sentences.english: Marsha was quite casual about appearing on TV.
sentences.chinese: 玛莎对于上电视很无所谓。

sentences.english: a casual conversation
sentences.chinese: 随便的谈话

sentences.english: He made some casual remark (= one without thinking much about it ) about her holiday.
sentences.chinese: 他随口提到了她度假的事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 漫不经心的，随便的；偶然的
detailed_translations.english: relaxed and not worried, or seeming not to care about something

sentences.english: legal documents full of incomprehensible jargon
sentences.chinese: 满是难懂术语的法律文件

sentences.english: I find your attitude quite incomprehensible.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得你的态度很难理解。

detailed_translations.chinese: 费解的；不可思议的；无限的
detailed_translations.english: difficult or impossible to understand

sentences.english: He spent most of his speech rebutting criticisms of his foreign policy.
sentences.chinese: 他大部分的演讲都用来反驳他在外交政策上受到的各种批评。

detailed_translations.english: to prove that a statement or a charge made against you is false

sentences.english: We’re trying to drag the country out of its economic morass.
sentences.chinese: 我们在尽力使国家摆脱经济困境。

detailed_translations.chinese: 沼泽；困境；乱糟糟的一堆
detailed_translations.english: a complicated and confusing situation that is very difficult to get out of

sentences.english: There is a small network of rhombus in tokyo astronomical observatory .
sentences.chinese: 在东京天文台有一个小的菱形台网。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a method for camera calibration based on rhombus.
sentences.chinese: 给出了一种基于菱形作为平面模板的摄像机标定方法。

sentences.english: A figure with four equal sides forming two inner obtuse Angles and two inner acute Angles; a rhombus or lozenge.
sentences.chinese: 菱形（物）：一种带有四个等边构成两个内钝角和两个锐角的图形；菱形或菱形物。

detailed_translations.english: a shape with four equal straight sides, especially one that is not a square

sentences.english: You never tell me what you're thinking. Am I supposed to use telepathy?
sentences.chinese: 你从来不告诉我你在想什么。我是不是该用心灵感应术呢？

detailed_translations.english: a way of communicating in which thoughts are sent from one person’s mind to another person’s mind

name: captious
trans: 吹毛求疵的； 挑剔的

sentences.english: Terry: Oh, Ben. I was assigned to see that captious client this afternoon. He is really the most ticklish client I have ever met. Seeing is believing!
sentences.chinese: 泰瑞：噢，本，今天指派我去会见那个吹毛求疵的客户，他真是我见过最难对付的客户了，真是百闻不如一见啊！

sentences.english: The noodle in cattle bone soup, fresh shrimp wonton, unique port sauce and soup, elastic fine and coarse noodles, will satisfy you captious taste with endless aftertaste.
sentences.chinese: 精炖熬煮的牛骨汤面。现剥沙虾现做的鲜虾馄饨，加上独家肉燥与汤头，特制弹性十足的细、粗面条，绝对让口味挑剔的您一再回味。

sentences.english: Introduce:" sweet secret " the mom that told about optimistic adamancy and equal cut is stroked each other between callous captious man external, comprehend real love and close feeling.
sentences.chinese: 简介：《甜蜜的秘密》讲述了开朗坚强的妈妈和对外冷酷的挑剔男人之间互相抚平伤口，领悟到真正爱情和亲情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 吹毛求疵的； 挑剔的
detailed_translations.english: apt to make trivial criticisms; fault-finding; carping

sentences.english: She rushes from job to job at a frenetic pace.
sentences.chinese: 她发疯似的不停地跳槽。

detailed_translations.english: frenetic activity is fast and not very organized

sentences.english: Clark's mother is nonchalant about her role in her son's latest work.
sentences.chinese: 克拉克的母亲对她在儿子最新作品中的角色反应平淡。

sentences.english: Denis tried to look nonchalant and uninterested.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼斯尽力作出冷淡、不感兴趣的样子。

detailed_translations.english: If you describe someone as nonchalant, you mean that they appear not to worry or care about things and that they seem very calm

sentences.english: a tangled mass of overgrown shrubbery
sentences.chinese: 枝蔓交错、疯狂生长的灌木丛

detailed_translations.english: shrubs planted close together

name: script
trans: 剧本， 广播稿； 文字体系； 笔迹， 手迹

sentences.english: a diary entry written in neat black script
sentences.chinese: 用工整的黑色字写下的一则日记

sentences.english: ...James Cameron, who scripted and directed both films.
sentences.chinese: …为这两部电影写脚本并执导的詹姆斯·卡梅伦。

detailed_translations.chinese: 脚本；手迹；书写用的字母
detailed_translations.english: writing done by hand
The person who scripts a movie or a radio or television play writes it

name: guise
trans: 外观， 装束； 伪装， 假装

sentences.english: It’s the same idea in a different guise.
sentences.chinese: 还是一样的观点，只是形式不同。

detailed_translations.english: the way someone or something appears to be, which hides the truth or is only temporary

sentences.english: Using a seatbelt will reduce the likelihood of serious injury in a car accident.
sentences.chinese: 系安全带可以降低在车祸中受重伤的可能性。

detailed_translations.english: the degree to which something can reasonably be expected to happen

sentences.english: reactionary attitudes
sentences.chinese: 反动的态度

detailed_translations.chinese: 保守的，反动的；反动主义的；反对改革的
detailed_translations.english: very strongly opposed to any social or political change - used to show disapproval

detailed_translations.chinese: 反动分子；反动派；保守派
detailed_translations.english: someone who strongly opposes any social or political change - used to show disapproval

sentences.english: The banks made hundreds of imprudent loans in the 1970s.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪70年代那几家银行轻率地发放了几百笔贷款。

detailed_translations.chinese: 轻率的，鲁莽的；不小心的
detailed_translations.english: not sensible or wise

sentences.english: drastic cuts in government spending
sentences.chinese: 政府开支的急剧削减

sentences.english: Drastic changesare needed if environmental catastrophe is to be avoided.
sentences.chinese: 要想避免环境灾难就需要重大的变革。

detailed_translations.english: extreme and sudden

sentences.english: a venial sin
sentences.chinese: 可赦之罪

detailed_translations.chinese: 可原谅的；（罪过）轻微的；可宽恕的
detailed_translations.english: a venial fault, mistake etc is not very serious and can be forgiven

sentences.english: the need for large businesses to innovate
sentences.chinese: 大公司革新的需要

sentences.english: The company has successfully innovated new products and services.
sentences.chinese: 公司成功地创出了新产品和服务。

detailed_translations.english: to start to use new ideas, methods, or inventions

sentences.english: Utilizing boiler waste gas for vaporization and concentration of waste water, burning of offal, the method not only deal with waste water skillfully, but also depress boiler dust efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 先用废烟气蒸发浓缩，再焚烧，既巧妙处理了废水，又降低了锅炉烟尘，是一种低成本、低耗能以废治废双达标的方。

name: accommodate
trans: 留宿， 收容； 供应， 供给； 调和， 适应

sentences.english: He bought a huge house to accommodate his library.
sentences.chinese: 他买了一座大房子来放他的藏书。

sentences.english: The ballroom can accommodate 400 people.
sentences.chinese: 那个舞厅可容纳400人。

detailed_translations.english: if a room, building etc can accommodate a particular number of people or things, it has enough space for them

sentences.english: The coating has good tenacity and wearability.
sentences.chinese: 涂层具有良好的韧性和耐磨性能。

sentences.english: High strength, good rigidity and tenacity, good heat and seawater resisting, good Cl resisting, suitable for high performance products.
sentences.chinese: 高机械强度，高耐热性，韧性好，具有较好的耐海水、耐氯性。适用于高性能制品。

name: protagonist
trans: 领导者； 积极参加者

sentences.english: the main protagonists in the conflict
sentences.chinese: 主要的冲突方

detailed_translations.chinese: 主角，主演；主要人物，领导者
detailed_translations.english: the most important character in a play, film, or story

name: assertion
trans: 主张； 断言， 声明

sentences.english: She makes very general assertions about marriage in the poem.
sentences.chinese: 她在诗中的婚姻主张非常笼统。

detailed_translations.chinese: 断言，声明；主张，要求；坚持；认定
detailed_translations.english: something that you say or write that you strongly believe

sentences.english: ‘I’m not sure,’ he prevaricated.
sentences.chinese: “我不肯定。”他支支吾吾道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 搪塞；支吾其辞，闪烁其辞
detailed_translations.english: to try to hide the truth by not answering questions directly

sentences.english: People who had heard the evidence at the trial were surprised at the outcome.
sentences.chinese: 在审判过程中听过证词的人都对此结果感到吃惊。

detailed_translations.english: the final result of a meeting, discussion, war etc – used especially when no one knows what it will be until it actually happens

name: polar
trans: 地极的， 近地极的； 磁极的

sentences.english: Well, what is the equation of this circle in polar coordinates?
sentences.chinese: 那么，这个圆方程在极坐标系下相当于什么呢？

sentences.english: This image shows part of a polar crater that still holds on to some summer ice, as well as beautiful sand dunes sculpted by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 这张照片展示了某个极地陨坑，陨坑中还保存着一些夏季冰的痕迹，在风的作用下形成了一些美丽的沙丘。

sentences.english: Yet, while not wanting to begrudge the polar bear his ice, we should be at least somewhat concerned at this recent shift in thinking.
sentences.chinese: 然而，虽然我们并不想希望北极熊失去它的冰，我们至少应该对近期的这些意识上的转变有一点担心。

sentences.english: a synthesis of Eastern and Western philosophical ideas
sentences.chinese: 东西方哲学思想的结合

sentences.english: the synthesis of proteins
sentences.chinese: 蛋白质的合成

sentences.english: speech synthesis software
sentences.chinese: 语音合成软件

detailed_translations.chinese: 综合，综合物；（化学或生物学物质的）合成；（用电子方式对声音、语音或音乐的）合成
detailed_translations.english: something that has been made by combining different things, or the process of combining things

name: advertiser
trans: 登广告者； 广告客户

sentences.english: the Stockport Advertiser
sentences.chinese: 《斯托克波特广告报》

detailed_translations.chinese: 广告客户；刊登广告的人
detailed_translations.english: a person or company that advertises something

name: cryptic
trans: 秘密的， 含义模糊的

sentences.english: This thrilling story will keep you on the edge of your seat as you explore the house, collect items and unravel cryptic secrets.
sentences.chinese: 这惊心动魄的故事，将让你在你的座位边，为您探索的房子，收集物品和解开神秘的秘密。

sentences.english: It was the cryptic first sign of a cyberespionage and information-warfare campaign devised to disrupt the 2016 presidential election, the first such attempt by a foreign power in American history.
sentences.chinese: 这是一场网络间谍—信息战行动的第一个神秘迹象，该行动旨在干扰2016年的总统大选，在美国的历史上，这还是第一次有外国势力有这样的举动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 神秘的； 含义模糊的
detailed_translations.english: having a meaning that is mysterious or not easily understood

sentences.english: The banks should have been more circumspect in their dealings.
sentences.chinese: 银行在交易时应更加谨慎。

detailed_translations.english: If you are circumspect, you are cautious in what you do and say and do not take risks

sentences.english: For each title there is a brief synopsis of the book.
sentences.chinese: 每本书都附有一个该书的简短提要。

detailed_translations.english: a short description of the main events or ideas in a book, film etc

name: meditate
trans: 沉思，冥想；反省；考虑；策划

sentences.english: She sat quietly, meditating on the day’s events.
sentences.chinese: 她静静地坐着，思考着这一天发生的事。

sentences.english: I try to meditate for half an hour every evening.
sentences.chinese: 我每天晚上尽量默想半小时。

detailed_translations.chinese: 想,考虑；(尤指宗教上的)沉思,冥想
detailed_translations.english: to think seriously and deeply about something

sentences.english: Even close friends were unaware of the tribulations she faced.
sentences.chinese: 即使是亲近的朋友也不了解她所面对的种种艰辛。

detailed_translations.english: serious trouble or a serious problem

name: prototype
trans: 原型； 标准； 模范

sentences.english: How do you test the prototype of the vending machine?
sentences.chinese: 你如何测试一个自动售货机的原型?。

sentences.english: What is the difference between these prototype declaration?
sentences.chinese: 这些原型声明的区别是什么？

sentences.english: But how do you come up with the architecture for this evolutionary prototype?
sentences.chinese: 但是你将如何为这个进化的原型提出系统的架构呢？

detailed_translations.english: the first form that a new design of a car, machine etc has, or a model of it used to test the design before it is produced

sentences.english: In the same demographic breakdown of people may have different characteristics of the consumer mentality.
sentences.chinese: 处于同一人口统计细分的人们，可能具有不同的消费心态特征。

sentences.english: It is generally studied and mapped by an organization through lists and reportscontaining demographic information that may have an effect on the marketing of keyproducts or services.
sentences.chinese: 组织通常通过包含了可能对主要产品或服务的市场营销产生影响的人口统计信息的列表或包括来研究或划分它的。

name: recollect
trans: 回忆， 想起， 记起

sentences.english: All I recollect is a grey sky.
sentences.chinese: 我只记得一片灰色的天空。

detailed_translations.chinese: 回忆,想起,记起,忆起,记得
detailed_translations.english: to be able to remember something

sentences.english: She wore no makeup, and her face was dotted with acne.
sentences.chinese: 她没有化妆，脸上长满了粉刺。

detailed_translations.chinese: [皮肤] 痤疮，[皮肤] 粉刺
detailed_translations.english: a medical problem which causes a lot of red spots on your face and neck and mainly affects young people

sentences.english: They became involved in an altercation.
sentences.chinese: 他们争辩了起来。

detailed_translations.english: a short noisy argument

sentences.english: The judge cited a 1956 Supreme Court ruling in her decision.
sentences.chinese: 法官在她的判决中引用了1956年最高法院的一项裁决。

sentences.english: The passage cited above is from a Robert Frost poem.
sentences.chinese: 以上的引文出自罗伯特•弗罗斯特的一首诗。

sentences.english: She was cited in the divorce proceedings.
sentences.chinese: 她在离婚诉讼中被传唤。

detailed_translations.chinese: 引证；引用；〔法院〕传召，传讯
detailed_translations.english: to mention something as an example, especially one that supports, proves, or explains an idea or situation

sentences.english: She was a casual acquaintance of my family in Vienna.
sentences.chinese: 她是我们家在维也纳的一个交情不深的朋友。

sentences.english: They developed an acquaintance over the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 他们在因特网上相识。

sentences.english: The practice of a lawyer requires acquaintance with court procedures.
sentences.chinese: 当律师要熟悉法庭程序。

detailed_translations.english: someone you know, but who is not a close friend

sentences.english: carbon atoms
sentences.chinese: 碳原子

detailed_translations.english: the smallest part of an  element  that can exist alone or can combine with other substances to form a  molecule

detailed_translations.chinese: 想起，忆起；使……思考；使……考虑
detailed_translations.english: to cause (oneself) to consider or meditate

sentences.english: an infamous killer
sentences.chinese: 臭名昭著的杀手

sentences.english: Los Angeles’ infamous smog
sentences.chinese: 恶名远播的洛杉矶雾霾

detailed_translations.chinese: 声名狼藉的；无耻的；邪恶的；不名誉的
detailed_translations.english: well known for being bad or evil

name: prosaic
trans: 散文的， 散文体的； 乏味的， 平凡的

sentences.english: a prosaic writing style
sentences.chinese: 乏味的写作风格

sentences.english: The reality, however, is probably more prosaic.
sentences.chinese: 然而，事实很可能更平淡无奇。

detailed_translations.chinese: 平凡的，乏味的；散文体的
detailed_translations.english: boring or ordinary

name: fledgling
trans: 羽毛初长的雏鸟， 刚会飞的幼鸟； 无经验的人

sentences.english: a fledgling republic
sentences.chinese: 一个新兴的共和国

detailed_translations.english: a fledgling state or organization has only recently been formed and is still developing
a young bird that is learning to fly

name: precision
trans: 准确， 精确； 精确度

sentences.english: precision engineering
sentences.chinese: 精密工程

sentences.english: precision bombing
sentences.chinese: 精确轰炸

detailed_translations.chinese: 精度，[数] 精密度；精确
detailed_translations.english: the quality of being very exact or correct
made or done in a very exact way

sentences.english: And the viceroy was there with his lady.
sentences.chinese: 总督也带着夫人去啦。

sentences.english: How do you think this trade viceroy will deal with the chancellor's demands?
sentences.chinese: 贸易总督会怎样回应首相的要求呢?。

detailed_translations.english: a man who was sent by a king or queen in the past to rule another country

sentences.english: Women have become more assertive in the past decade.
sentences.chinese: 妇女在过去十年已变得更坚定自信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 肯定的；独断的；坚定而自信的
detailed_translations.english: behaving in a confident way, so that people notice you

sentences.english: In fact, the animal uses its middle finger to find and harvest insect larvae in trees.
sentences.chinese: 实际上， 这种动物用其中指搜索和俘获藏在树木里的昆虫幼虫。

sentences.english: FLATOW: ...thank you, in their beaks, and poke in to pull out these larvae out of a tree.
sentences.chinese: 傅拉托：对，...谢谢你，是用它们的"喙"(鸟嘴)，把树枝戳进洞里去，把幼虫从树洞里钓出来。

sentences.english: We know that freshwater eels reproduce in the ocean because larvae have been found drifting near the surface thousands of miles from any shore.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道淡水鳗鱼在海里繁殖，因为我们曾经在距所有海岸数千英里的海面发现过漂动的鳗鱼幼体。

name: tolerable
trans: 可容忍的； 可以的， 尚好的

sentences.english: The heat in this room is barely tolerable.
sentences.chinese: 这房间里热得让人要受不了了。

detailed_translations.english: unpleasant or painful and only just able to be accepted

sentences.english: the human body
sentences.chinese: 人体

sentences.english: My fingers were numb and my whole body ached.
sentences.chinese: 我手指麻木，浑身疼痛。

sentences.english: He needs to overcome a negative body image (=  what you think about your own body  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他需要克服对自己身体的负面印象。

sentences.english: A dog found the body of a girl in the woods.
sentences.chinese: 一条狗在树林里发现了一具女孩的尸体。

sentences.english: the main body of the text
sentences.chinese: 课文的正文

detailed_translations.english: the physical structure of a person or animal

sentences.english: the most efficient mode of transport
sentences.chinese: 最高效的运输方式

sentences.english: Set the monitor to 256 colour mode.
sentences.chinese: 把显示器调成256色彩模式。

detailed_translations.english: a particular way or style of behaving, living or doing something

sentences.english: Several months elapsed before his case was brought to trial.
sentences.chinese: 过了几个月他的案子才开审。

sentences.english: The assignment must be completed within an overall elapsed time of one week.
sentences.chinese: 这项任务总的时限为一周，必须按时完成。

detailed_translations.english: if a particular period of time elapses, it passes

name: symmetry
trans: 对称  ； 匀称， 整齐

sentences.english: the symmetry of the design
sentences.chinese: 图案的对称性

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being symmetrical

name: acrimony
trans: 刻毒； 讽刺； 毒辣

sentences.english: Now, with an agreement put on the table, talks have broken down in acrimony .
sentences.chinese: 现在，当一份协议摆到了桌面上，对话却在尖酸刻薄中停止。

sentences.english: The Jesuits in a phase of ascendancy, persecuted and insulted the Buddhists with great acrimony .
sentences.chinese: 处于地位上升阶段的耶稣会修士迫害佛教徒，用尖刻的语言辱骂他们。

sentences.english: Let not nemesis catch me by the swift ships.
sentences.chinese: 不要让报应女神娜美西斯用快捷的船舰捉拿我。

sentences.english: We worry that if the companion is not found, this paper will be our nemesis.
sentences.chinese: 我们担心，如果没有找到伴星，这篇论文就会成为我们的报应。

sentences.english: We considered startlingly that all the things before our eyes were out of nemesis , which were merely man's life .
sentences.chinese: 我们吃惊地以为眼前一切是报应，这只不过是人生。

detailed_translations.english: an opponent or enemy that is likely to be impossible for you to defeat, or a situation that is likely to be impossible for you to deal with

sentences.english: postcards that have been retouched to cover the grey skies
sentences.chinese: 经过修饰把灰色天空掩盖起来的明信片

detailed_translations.english: to improve a picture or photograph by painting over marks or making other small changes

sentences.english: Keep savings as a buffer against unexpected cash needs.
sentences.chinese: 备有存款来作为急需现金时的缓冲。

detailed_translations.chinese: [计] 缓冲区；缓冲器，[车辆] 减震器
detailed_translations.english: one of the two special metal springs on the front or back of a train or at the end of a railway track, to take the shock if the train hits something
to reduce the bad effects of something

sentences.english: His chin was covered with bristles.
sentences.chinese: 他满下巴都是胡茬。

detailed_translations.english: a short stiff hair, wire etc that forms part of a brush
to behave in a way that shows you are very angry or annoyed

sentences.english: The team needs players who complement each other.
sentences.chinese: 球队需要能够相互取长补短的队员。

sentences.english: This wine would be a nice complement to grilled dishes.
sentences.chinese: 这种葡萄酒配烧烤食物会很不错。

detailed_translations.english: to make a good combination with someone or something else
someone or something that emphasizes the good qualities of another person or thing

name: qualify
trans: 具有资格， 证明合格； 限制， 限定； 修饰

sentences.english: Free school lunches are given to children who qualify.
sentences.chinese: 符合条件的儿童可获得免费的学生午餐。

detailed_translations.english: to have the right to have or do something, or to give someone this right

sentences.english: They are anxious to show their abhorrence of racism.
sentences.chinese: 他们急于表现对种族主义的憎恶。

detailed_translations.english: a deep feeling of hatred towards something

name: adhere
trans: 黏附， 胶着； 坚持

sentences.english: Small particles adhere to the seed.
sentences.chinese: 微小的粒子紧贴着种子。

sentences.english: We adhere to the principles of equal rights and freedom of expression for all.
sentences.chinese: 我们坚持人人平等和言论自由的原则。

detailed_translations.english: to stick firmly to something

sentences.english: ...the minister's young and rather vapid wife.
sentences.chinese: ...部长年轻却乏味的妻子。

sentences.english: She made a vapid comment about the weather.
sentences.chinese: 她对天气作了一番枯燥的评论。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无趣味的；无生气的；索然乏味的
detailed_translations.english: If you describe someone or something as vapid, you are critical of them because they are dull and uninteresting

sentences.english: a thick layer of sediment
sentences.chinese: 一层厚厚的沉积物

detailed_translations.english: solid substances that settle at the bottom of a liquid

sentences.english: She fidgeted in her chair as she took a deep, tremulous breath.
sentences.chinese: 她在椅子上坐立不安，轻颤着深吸了一口气。

detailed_translations.english: If someone's voice, smile, or actions are tremulous, they are unsteady because the person is uncertain, afraid, or upset

sentences.english: The family is the basic social unit of modern society.
sentences.chinese: 家庭是现代社会的基本单位。

sentences.english: control/display/filter etc unit
sentences.chinese: 控制/显示/过滤等装置

detailed_translations.english: a thing, person, or group that is regarded as one single whole part of something larger

name: panorama
trans: 全景； 概括， 综述

sentences.english: Horton looked out over a panorama of fertile valleys and gentle hills.
sentences.chinese: 霍顿眺望着那一片肥沃山谷和平缓山脉的景象。

sentences.english: a panorama of life in England 400 years ago
sentences.chinese: 400年前英格兰生活的全景图

detailed_translations.english: an impressive view of a wide area of land

name: contemporary
trans: 现代的， 当代的； 同时代的

sentences.english: She writes a lot of contemporary music for people like Whitney Houston.
sentences.chinese: 她为惠特尼·休斯敦等人创作大量当代音乐作品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 现代的， 当代的； 同时代的
detailed_translations.english: belonging to the present time

name: substantive

sentences.chinese: 其次，他们是“激活”消极的一些组件，通过释放从非活动的材料，以便可以移动它们之间的阴极和阳极锂。

sentences.chinese: 在晚星的光照下，/室内变得愈来愈暗黑的时候，/远方天空有云的时候，/在你家中，/让门只下键，不上锁，/因为可能通过黄昏薄暮，/我将来临。

sentences.chinese: 10小时之后安东尼被命令回营。

sentences.chinese: 几分钟之前这个人还在讲着最粗鄙的下流话，现在他声音里却充满了对于上帝和人类的敬畏与热爱，这简直是令人难以相信的。

sentences.chinese: 这个人造支气管是用移植片固定模加固的生物材料制成的。

sentences.chinese: 巴黎博比尼医院的一个医学研究小组切除了一个病人癌变组织，随后给予病人人工气道及支气管。

sentences.english: The artificial bronchus was made up of biological material strengthened by a stent.
sentences.chinese: 人工支气管由生物材料制成，利用支架植入来加强。

name: altar

sentences.chinese: 主圣坛上方的耶稣受难像

sentences.chinese: 牺牲被绑在祭坛上。

name: exclusive

sentences.chinese: 他们礼貌地推却，但最后还是同意留下。

name: poverty

sentences.chinese: 数百万老年人生活在贫困之中。

sentences.english: We need an effective strategy to fight poverty .
sentences.chinese: 我们需要制定一个有效的对策来与贫困作斗争。

trans: 未形成的， 不完全的， 早期的

name: testament
trans: 作为确实的证据或实证的事物； 遗嘱

sentences.english: The aircraft’s safety record is a testament to its designers’ skill.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的安全记录是设计师能力的明证。

detailed_translations.chinese: [法] 遗嘱；圣约；确实的证明
detailed_translations.english: a  will 2 2

name: mount
trans: 登上，爬上；安装，装配，固定，镶嵌
支架， 底座， 底板； 山峰

sentences.english: He mounted the stairs and looked around him slowly.
sentences.chinese: 他登上楼梯，慢慢环顾四周。

sentences.english: Mount Qomolangma
sentences.chinese: 珠穆朗玛峰

used as part of the name of a mountain

trans: 预兆， 吉兆；  占卜； 赞助； 支持

detailed_translations.english: a sign or omen, esp one that is favourable

sentences.english: Your last paragraph made it very clear to me that Benjamin's work is basically a hodgepodge from Kantian rationality through to more updated theories.
sentences.chinese: 你最后一段话让它很清楚的告诉我，本雅明的工作是基本上一个大杂烩，从康德的批判理性一直到更新的理论。

sentences.english: When it comes to spreading ridicule, the Web is now a hodgepodge of celebrity takedowns and videos of ugly brides or of kids who can't sing in the school play.
sentences.chinese: 网络已经成为传播尴尬事情的主渠道，其内容堪比大杂烩，既有名人的露丑记录，又有难看的新娘，还有在学校表演中唱不出歌的小孩子。

sentences.english: Singapore is an extraordinary hodgepodge of health care principles, but it's also a city-state whose health care system is comprised of fewer than 30 hospitals.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡的医疗体系不仅仅是一个各种医疗政策的大杂烩，可惜新加坡本身只是一个仅有30家医院的城市国家。

sentences.english: The captain was rectifying his telescope.
sentences.chinese: 船长正在调他的望远镜。

sentences.english: The telescope reveals many distant stars to our sight.

sentences.english: With the aid of a telescope a ship could be made out on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 借助望远镜可以看出在地平线上有一只船。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment shaped like a tube, used for making distant objects look larger and closer

sentences.chinese: 在玛丽亚和拉里意识到发生在二人不忠伴侣间的奸情后，他们决定假装一段婚外情作为报复。

detailed_translations.english: the act or an instance of requiting

sentences.english: ...an aqueous solution containing various sodium salts.
sentences.chinese: ...一种含各种钠盐的水溶液。

detailed_translations.english: containing water or similar to water

sentences.english: He did fashion photography for ‘Vogue’ magazine.
sentences.chinese: 他为《时尚》杂志拍过时装照片。

sentences.chinese: 国家摄影博物馆

detailed_translations.english: the art, profession, or method of producing photographs or the scenes in films

trans: 控告， 谴责， 非难

trans: 内脏的； 出自内心的

sentences.chinese: 他对统治阶级发自肺腑的仇恨

trans: 独裁政治； 独裁政府

sentences.english: Many poor countries are abandoning autocracy.
sentences.chinese: 很多贫穷国家都在推翻独裁统治。

detailed_translations.english: a system of government in which one person or group has unlimited power

sentences.english: The prisoners had been tortured and mutilated.
sentences.chinese: 犯人遭受了酷刑并被殴打致残。

sentences.english: extra protection for mental patients who might mutilate themselves
sentences.chinese: 对可能自残的精神病患者的额外保护

sentences.english: She answered in her usual forthright manner .
sentences.chinese: 她以一贯的直率作了回答。

sentences.english: a voluptuous gesture
sentences.chinese: 挑逗的举动

detailed_translations.chinese: 撩人的；骄奢淫逸的；沉溺酒色的

name: impotent
trans: 无力的， 虚弱的； 无效的

sentences.english: impotent rage
sentences.chinese: 于事无补的狂怒

sentences.english: On the basis of minimax algebra theory, this paper provides an algebra method of solving countable stages decision problems in the dynamic programming.
sentences.chinese: 本文根据极大极小代数理论，给出了一种用以求解动态规划中有限多阶段决策问题的代数算法。

sentences.english: Through the symbol computer algebra, a fourth order perturbation solution for the one dimentional stable coupled flows of elastic fluids in the deformable porous media.
sentences.chinese: 用计算机代数系统进行符号运算，求得了可变形多孔介质中弹性流体一维定常耦合渗流问题的四阶摄动解。

sentences.english: This paper uses several methods of complex functions theorey to prove fundamental theorem of algebra by argument principle, maximum modulus principle and minimum modulus principle.
sentences.chinese: 从复变函数理论出发，利用辐角原理、最大模原理、最小模原理给出代数学基本定理的几种新的证明方法。

detailed_translations.english: a type of mathematics that uses letters and other signs to represent numbers and values

name: aristocracy
trans: 贵族； 贵族政府； 贵族统治

sentences.chinese: 公爵、伯爵及其他贵族成员

sentences.english: the landed aristocracy
sentences.chinese: 拥有大量土地的贵族

detailed_translations.chinese: 贵族；贵族统治；上层社会；贵族政治
detailed_translations.english: the people in the highest social class, who traditionally have a lot of land, money, and power

trans: 嫁娶； 支持， 赞成

sentences.chinese: 她与他一起逃到了墨西哥，支持革命事业。

sentences.chinese: 激励人心的音乐

sentences.english: King was a great orator and an inspiring leader.
sentences.chinese: 金是伟大的演说家和鼓舞人心的领袖。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鼓舞人心的；灌输的；启发灵感的

trans: 取得， 获得； 学到

detailed_translations.chinese: 取得， 获得； 学到

trans: 肥沃的， 富饶的； 能繁殖的

detailed_translations.english: (of a person's mind or imagination) that produces a lot of new ideas

sentences.english: ...the cultural diversity of Latin America.

sentences.chinese: 彩虹的弧状

detailed_translations.english: a curved shape or line

sentences.chinese: 目的：探索应用自体耳软骨联合硅胶假体整复唇裂Ⅱ期鼻畸形的方法。

sentences.chinese: 文章摘要： 目的：观察耳穴磁珠贴压护理法对血液透析合并睡眠障碍患者的睡眠改善效果。

sentences.chinese: 数学既有深奥的理论，又有精密的计算。

detailed_translations.english: unnecessarily complicated and difficult to understand

sentences.chinese: 寒冷的天气使许多植物生长滞缓。

sentences.chinese: 佩登深受艾尔郡人的尊敬。

sentences.chinese: 然后他开始大声叫骂。

trans: 镇压， 压制； 抑制， 忍住

sentences.chinese: 起义受到了残酷的镇压。

sentences.english: The price of home ownership is increasing.
sentences.chinese: 房价在不断上涨。

sentences.chinese: 你认为这个病人什么时候可以做肿瘤手术？

sentences.english: Staging of prostatic adenocarcinoma is based upon how extensive the tumor is.
sentences.chinese: 前列腺腺癌的分级是根据肿瘤的浸润程度而定的。

sentences.chinese: 由于他的前列腺肿瘤是在早期被发现的，处在很有可能治愈阶段。

sentences.chinese: ...使艺术僵化的一些规矩。

sentences.chinese: 报界对前任总统的赞扬过于恭维了。

detailed_translations.english: very calm or peaceful

name: fabulous

sentences.chinese: 那位公爵的巨额财富

sentences.english: You look fabulous!
sentences.chinese: 你看上去美极了！

sentences.english: a fabulous meal
sentences.chinese: 丰盛的一餐

sentences.english: The room has fabulous views across the lake.
sentences.chinese: 那个房间可以看到美丽的湖景。

detailed_translations.english: very large in amount or size

sentences.chinese: 这让罗伯特·肯尼迪陷入了两难的境地。

sentences.chinese: 许多女性面临着出去工作还是照顾家庭的两难境地。

sentences.chinese: 阿瑟死后，玛丽就是我最大的安慰。

sentences.english: a belated attempt to increase support
sentences.chinese: 一个迟来的增加资助的举措

sentences.english: a belated birthday present
sentences.chinese: 迟来的生日礼物

detailed_translations.english: happening or arriving late

sentences.english: She learned to rue the day she had met Henri.
sentences.chinese: 她开始后悔认识了亨利。

detailed_translations.english: to wish that you had not done something
sorrow, pity, or regret

name: seditious
trans: 煽动的； 煽动叛变的

sentences.english: He fell under suspicion for distributing seditious pamphlets.
sentences.chinese: 他因分发反政府传单而受到怀疑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 煽动性的；扰乱治安的；参与煽动的
detailed_translations.english: A seditious act, speech, or piece of writing encourages people to fight against or oppose the government

name: disregard
trans: 不理， 不顾； 蔑视

sentences.english: He ordered the jury to disregard the witness’s last statement.
sentences.chinese: 他指示陪审团忽略证人的最后一句话。

sentences.english: his disregard for her feelings
sentences.chinese: 他对她情感的忽略

detailed_translations.english: to ignore something or treat it as unimportant
when someone ignores something that they should not ignore

sentences.english: It’s the sort of opportunity you see only once in a lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 这种机会你一辈子也只能碰到一次。

detailed_translations.english: the period of time during which someone is alive or something exists

name: cant
trans: 伪善之言；隐语，行话；斜面

sentences.chinese: 小偷的黑话

detailed_translations.chinese: 斜面；伪善之言；黑话；角落
detailed_translations.english: insincere talk about moral or religious principles by someone who is pretending to be better than they really are
to lean, or make something lean

detailed_translations.chinese: 行话的；哀诉声的；假仁假义的

sentences.english: a drama enacted on a darkened stage
sentences.chinese: 在灯光暗淡的舞台上演的戏剧

detailed_translations.chinese: 颁布；制定法律；扮演；发生
detailed_translations.english: to act in a play, story etc

sentences.english: It was very indiscreet of Colin to tell them about our plan.
sentences.chinese: 科林把我们的计划告诉了他们，太不谨慎了。

detailed_translations.english: careless about what you say or do, especially by talking about things which should be kept secret

name: treacherous
trans: 背叛的， 背信弃义的

sentences.english: a sly and treacherous woman
sentences.chinese: 一个阴险狡诈的女人

sentences.english: a treacherous plot to overthrow the leader
sentences.chinese: 一个推翻领导人的阴谋

detailed_translations.chinese: 奸诈的，叛逆的，背叛的；危险的；不牢靠的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is treacherous cannot be trusted because they are not loyal and secretly intend to harm you

sentences.english: He scrutinized the document.
sentences.chinese: 他细阅了这份文件。

sentences.english: She scrutinized his face.
sentences.chinese: 她细细端详他的脸。

detailed_translations.english: to examine someone or something very carefully

name: extinguish
trans: 熄灭 ， 消灭， 扑灭； 结束； 使失色， 使黯然

sentences.english: Please extinguish all cigarettes.
sentences.chinese: 请把香烟都熄灭了。

sentences.english: Firemen were called to extinguish the blaze.
sentences.chinese: 有人打电话叫消防队员来扑灭大火。

sentences.english: All hope was almost extinguished.
sentences.chinese: 所有的希望都快要破灭了。

detailed_translations.english: to make a fire or light stop burning or shining

sentences.english: Although it was a great hobby for her, she wanted to study aeronautics or astronomy as a career.
sentences.chinese: 不过这只是她一大爱好，她本想学习航空或天文作为职业。

detailed_translations.english: the science of designing and flying planes

trans: 易受伤害的， 易受攻击的

sentences.chinese: 他在我最脆弱的时候利用了我。

sentences.english: We work mainly with the elderly and other vulnerable groups.

detailed_translations.chinese: 脆弱的, 易受影响的

name: affiliation
trans: 隶属关系； 隶属， 从属

sentences.english: The kidnappers had no affiliation with any militant group.
sentences.chinese: 这些绑架者与任何军事组织都没有紧密联系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 友好关系；加入；联盟；从属关系
detailed_translations.english: the connection or involvement that someone or something has with a political, religious etc organization

sentences.english: He faces charges of theft and conspiracy to defraud (= a secret plan to cheat someone, made by two or more people ) .
sentences.chinese: 他面临偷窃和合谋诈骗的指控。

detailed_translations.english: to trick a person or organization in order to get money from them

sentences.english: Like other penguins, it undergoes an annual molt, replacing all its feathers in a few weeks.
sentences.chinese: 和其他企鹅一样，它也经历一年一次的脱毛，在几周时间里替换掉所有的羽毛。

sentences.english: He said emperor penguins can spend months at a time in the ocean, coming ashore only to molt or rest, but did not know what might have caused this particular one to become disoriented.
sentences.chinese: 他说帝企鹅可以一次性在海里带上数月，上岸只是为了脱毛换羽和休息。 但不知道是什么造成了这只特别的企鹅变得分不清楚方向。

sentences.english: The native population was subjugated and exploited.
sentences.chinese: 土著人被征服，并遭受剥削。

detailed_translations.english: to defeat a person or group and make them obey you

sentences.english: She gave a long piteous cry.
sentences.chinese: 她发出了一声长长的哀号。

detailed_translations.english: expressing suffering and sadness in a way that makes you feel pity

sentences.english: people who volunteer to donate blood
sentences.chinese: 自愿献血者

detailed_translations.english: to give something, especially money, to a person or an organization in order to help them

sentences.english: ...substances that deplete the ozone layer.
sentences.chinese: …消耗臭氧层的物质。

detailed_translations.chinese: 耗尽，用尽；使衰竭，使空虚
detailed_translations.english: To deplete a stock or amount of something means to reduce it

name: recurrent
trans: 再发生的， 周期性发生的， 循环的

sentences.chinese: 不断发作的小病

sentences.chinese: 政治革命是赖利书里一再出现的主题。

name: bonanza
trans: 富矿带； 致富之源， 幸运

sentences.chinese: 预期的销售大涨并未成为现实。

detailed_translations.chinese: 富矿带；带来好运之事；幸运
detailed_translations.english: You can refer to a sudden great increase in wealth, success, or luck as a bonanza

name: egregious

detailed_translations.chinese: 惊人的；过分的；恶名昭彰的

name: sanguine
trans: 血红的； 红润的； 乐观的， 怀有希望的

sentences.english: a sanguine view
sentences.chinese: 乐观的态度

detailed_translations.chinese: 乐观的；满怀希望的；面色红润的
detailed_translations.english: happy and hopeful about the future

sentences.english: He cut off little branches from the bole.
sentences.chinese: 他把树干上的小分枝都剪掉。

name: significant
trans: 有意义的， 意味深长的； 重要的， 重大的； 非偶然的

sentences.english: His most significant political achievement was the abolition of the death penalty.
sentences.chinese: 他政治上最重大的成就是废除了死刑。

sentences.english: Please inform us if there are any significant changes in your plans.
sentences.chinese: 你们的计划如有重大变动，请通知我们。

detailed_translations.english: having an important effect or influence, especially on what will happen in the future

name: consecrate
trans: 用作祭祀， 献给， 使神圣

sentences.english: The bones will be reburied in consecrated ground .
sentences.chinese: 尸骨将被重新安葬在圣地里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 奉献；使神圣；供神用；献身于

name: complaisant
trans: 彬彬有礼的， 殷勤的； 柔顺的

sentences.english: A Quaker preacher, traveling in the more complaisant colony of Maryland, came upon a party of young people who were dancing merrily together.
sentences.chinese: 一个贵格会的传道人，在更殷勤有礼的马里兰殖民地旅行时，遇到了一群年轻人在欢快的跳舞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 彬彬有礼的， 殷勤的； 柔顺的
detailed_translations.english: showing a desire to comply or oblige; polite

name: derisive
trans: 嘲笑的， 可付之一笑的

sentences.chinese: 嘲讽的笑

detailed_translations.chinese: 嘲笑的，嘲弄的；可付之一笑的
detailed_translations.english: showing that you think someone or something is stupid or silly

sentences.english: a mail order catalog
sentences.chinese: 邮购商品目录

sentences.english: an online catalogue
sentences.chinese: 网上目录

to make a complete list of all the things in a group

sentences.english: A syrupy acid obtained by oxidation of glycerol or glyceraldehyde .
sentences.chinese: 一种浆状的酸，由甘油和甘油醛氧化后获得。

sentences.english: It might sound weird, but glycerol and water make great analogs for the exploding cloud of supernova matter!
sentences.chinese: 这听起来可能很奇怪，但甘油和水是超新星物质爆发云团的极好的近似物。

detailed_translations.english: a colourless or pale yellow odourless sweet-tasting syrupy liquid; 1,2,3-propanetriol: a by-product of soap manufacture, used as a solvent, antifreeze, plasticizer, and sweetener (E422)

name: agitation
trans: 煽动； 搅动； 使不安

sentences.english: mass agitation for political reform
sentences.chinese: 要求政治改革的大骚动

detailed_translations.english: public argument or action for social or political change

name: overlap
trans: 部分重叠， 部分搭交

sentences.english: When the bag is folded, the bottom overlaps one side.
sentences.chinese: 把包折叠起来时，其底部与一边就重合了。

sentences.english: Overlap the slices carefully so there are no gaps.
sentences.chinese: 把薄片小心地叠放在一起，那样就没有间隙。

detailed_translations.chinese: 部分重叠； 部分相同
detailed_translations.english: If one thing overlaps another, or if you overlap them, a part of the first thing occupies the same area as a part of the other thing. You can also say that two things overlap.
the amount by which two activities, ideas, things etc overlap

sentences.english: The medical profession has been debased by these revelations.
sentences.chinese: 这些事被披露后，医学界的声誉受到了损害。

sentences.chinese: 刺杀总统的阴谋

detailed_translations.english: to murder an important person

sentences.english: There is too much torment, renunciation, and anxiety in this love for it to be anything but infinite forbearance.
sentences.chinese: 这爱中有太多的折磨、太多的自制、与太多的焦虑，除了无穷无尽的忍耐，这些就成了它的一切。

sentences.english: But forbearance alone cannot be a long-term answer to the problem of Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 但是仅仅是忍耐不能做为巴基斯坦问题的一个长期答案。

sentences.english: The second principle is forbearance.
sentences.chinese: 第二个原则是忍耐。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being patient, able to control your emotions, and willing to forgive someone who has upset you
willingness to do what pleases other people

name: boon
trans: 恩惠； 实惠； 利益

sentences.chinese: 正是这个原因电视机成为这么多人的一大福音。

detailed_translations.english: You can describe something as a boon when it makes life better or easier for someone

sentences.english: Measure the distance between the two points.
sentences.chinese: 量出两点之间的距离。

sentences.english: The cottage is some distance (= quite a long distance ) from the road.
sentences.chinese: 小屋离开大路有些距离。

sentences.english: Church bells rang in the distance (= they were far away ) .
sentences.chinese: 远处教堂的钟声响起。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of space between two places or things

sentences.chinese: 三个国家在投票中弃权了。

detailed_translations.english: If you abstain during a vote, you do not use your vote

trans: 不在场， 缺席； 缺乏， 没有

sentences.chinese: 警察没有证据，只好把迈尔斯放了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺席， 不在； 缺席的时间， 外出期； 缺乏， 不存在
detailed_translations.english: when you are not in the place where people expect you to be, or the time that you are away

sentences.chinese: 恶毒的女孩

detailed_translations.english: very unkind and cruel, and deliberately behaving in a way that is likely to upset or hurt someone

sentences.english: the need for increased police vigilance
sentences.chinese: 警方加强警戒的必要性

detailed_translations.english: careful attention that you give to what is happening, so that you will notice any danger or illegal activity

sentences.english: Arms control should not be made into a surrogate for peace.
sentences.chinese: 军备控制不应变成和平的替代物。

detailed_translations.english: a surrogate person or thing is one that takes the place of someone or something else

name: outrageous
trans: 蛮横的， 残暴的； 无耻的， 可恶的

sentences.chinese: 按外交标准，这是不可接受的行为。

detailed_translations.chinese: 粗暴的；可恶的；令人吃惊的

sentences.chinese: 他是如此挂念自己的客人们。

trans: 类似的， 相似的； 可比拟的

sentences.chinese: 像这样的海洋建筑技术非常复杂，有些类似于尝试在水下建筑一座桥。

sentences.chinese: 此外，他开始使用缩写词。

sentences.english: I like to abbreviate my name because it's easier for people to remember.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢缩写我的名字，因为这样人们更容易记住。

sentences.english: N You can even abbreviate and put Y or N.
sentences.chinese: 甚至可以缩写Y或。

sentences.chinese: 在中国旅行了一个月之后再回去工作必然很没劲。

sentences.chinese: 他含含糊糊地说着很多如果进行选举会发生的状况。

sentences.chinese: “伊斯兰民族”及其最著名的追随者马尔科姆∙艾克斯（Malcolm X）宣扬自力更生和种族分离。

detailed_translations.english: someone who supports a particular belief, plan, political party etc

name: lavish
trans: 非常大方的； 过分丰富的； 浪费的

sentences.chinese: 庞大的皇宫

sentences.chinese: 我预料大家只有感激赞许。

sentences.chinese: 官方有过数次修改和说明。

name: monk
trans: 和尚； 僧侣； 修道士

sentences.chinese: …身穿黄袍的和尚们。

detailed_translations.english: a member of an all-male religious group that lives apart from other people in a  monastery

sentences.chinese: 我父亲把他所有的钱都投在上市债券上。

sentences.english: furious trading on the bond market
sentences.chinese: 债券市场疯狂的交易

sentences.chinese: 母亲和孩子之间的感情纽带

sentences.chinese: 这两个对立的派别各自召开了会议。

detailed_translations.english: to tell people that they must come together for a formal meeting

name: discourse
trans: 〔关于某个主题的〕演讲，论述，著述

sentences.english: "I do not know. " And thus ended their discourse.
sentences.chinese: “我也不晓得。”就这样，他们的谈话结束了。 。

sentences.english: They listened to his discourse on human relations.
sentences.chinese: 他们听他作关于人际关系的演讲。

sentences.english: In discourse thou must attend to what is said, and in every movement thou must observe what is doing.
sentences.chinese: 在谈话中你必须注意所说的话，在任何活动中你都必须观察在做什么。

detailed_translations.chinese: 演讲， 谈话， 论文
detailed_translations.english: a serious speech or piece of writing on a particular subject

sentences.english: incentives to maintain the momentum of European integration
sentences.chinese: 保持欧洲一体化发展势头的激励措施

sentences.english: Governments often lose momentum in their second term of office.
sentences.chinese: 政府往往会在第二届任期中丧失冲劲。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to keep increasing, developing, or being more successful

name: obstruct
trans: 阻塞， 截断， 堵塞； 阻碍， 阻止， 妨碍

sentences.english: A small aircraft was obstructing the runway.
sentences.chinese: 一架小型飞机堵住了跑道。

sentences.english: The column obstructed our view of the stage.
sentences.chinese: 柱子挡着，我们看不见舞台。

detailed_translations.english: to block a road, passage etc

name: oust
trans: 剥夺， 取代， 驱逐

sentences.english: The leaders have been ousted from power by nationalists.
sentences.chinese: 那些领导人已被民族主义者赶下了台。

sentences.english: The Republicans may oust him in November.
sentences.chinese: 共和党人可能在11月罢免他。

detailed_translations.english: If someone is ousted from a position of power, job, or place, they are forced to leave it

sentences.english: Various windows embellish the corridor, with the shape of square, circle, hexagon and octagon.
sentences.chinese: 走廊的窗户形状各异，有方形，有圆形，有六角形，也有八角形。

sentences.english: Why It's Innovative: A hydraulic system built into the bridge's handrail allows it to retract and curl into an octagon.
sentences.chinese: 创新点：这座桥的栏杆使用了液压驱动系统，使之能收缩卷曲成八边形。

sentences.english: It includes round, square, octagon, hexagon, and shape wire in coils only for the more commonly used types of stainless steels for general corrosion resistance and high-temperature service.
sentences.chinese: 包括只为较常用的一般耐腐蚀和用于高温类型的（截面为）圆形、方形、八角形、六角形等钢丝型材，仅限线圈。

detailed_translations.english: a flat shape with eight sides and eight angles

sentences.english: The difficulty and failure both didn't cool his ardor.
sentences.chinese: 困难和失败都没有降低他的热情。

sentences.english: "Here's fresh meat for your axe, Kreis, " he said; "a rose-white youth with the ardor of a lover for Herbert Spencer.
sentences.chinese: “克瑞斯，你那板斧有了新对象了，”他说，“一个纯洁得像白玫瑰的青年，对斯宾塞怀着恋人一样的热情。

sentences.english: Cathy Whitaker: That was the day I stopped believing in the wild ardor of things.
sentences.chinese: 凯西。惠特克：那一天，让我开始不再相信狂野的热情这样的事情。

name: labyrinth
trans: 迷路， 迷宫； 难解的事物； 【解】  迷路

sentences.english: ...the labyrinth of corridors.
sentences.chinese: …迷宫般的走廊。

detailed_translations.chinese: 迷宫；[解剖] 迷路；难解的事物
detailed_translations.english: a large network of paths or passages which cross each other, making it very difficult to find your way

name: aquatic
trans: 水的， 水上的； 水生的， 水栖的

sentences.english: an aquatic plant
sentences.chinese: 水生植物

detailed_translations.chinese: 水生的；水栖的；在水中或水面进行的
detailed_translations.english: living or growing in water

detailed_translations.chinese: 水上运动；水生植物或动物

sentences.english: "We went into a market and established a kiosk in that market out of a butcher's shop," Kalanda says.
sentences.chinese: 卡兰达说，“由于一家肉店，我们进入这个市场，在那个市场我们建立了一个公用电话亭”

sentences.english: We found that only about 5% of the time did people bother to tell the kiosk that they took an accessory.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现，只有在近5%的情况下，人们肯在数字亭中留下自己领取配件的信息。

sentences.english: He operated a small tea shop there, a portable metal kiosk from which he served low-ranking bureaucrats who worked in the surrounding government offices.
sentences.chinese: 如今他在这里开设了一家小茶亭——那是个轻便的金属亭子，为附近政府机构的低级别官员提供服务。

sentences.english: In the sequent ten years, he travelled almost the whole country.
sentences.chinese: 在接下来的十年里他差不多走遍了整个国家。

sentences.english: As one of the critical steps, identification of risk factors affects the sequent risk evaluation directly.
sentences.chinese: 摘要风险因素辨识作为风险评价的关键环节之一， 其结果直接影响后续的风险评价。

sentences.english: Crime often symbolizes a wider social problem.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪问题往往反映出更广泛的社会问题。

sentences.english: Growing discontent has been symbolized by the protests.
sentences.chinese: 与日俱增的不满通过一次又一次的抗议表现出来。

detailed_translations.english: if something symbolizes a quality, feeling etc, it represents it

sentences.english: Consciousness or cerebration has been said to have emerged in the evolution of higher primates.
sentences.chinese: 据说意识或思考在较高级灵长类的进化中已出现。

detailed_translations.english: the act of thinking; consideration; thought

sentences.english: He heard a commotion outside.
sentences.chinese: 他听到外面一阵骚动。

detailed_translations.english: A commotion is a lot of noise, confusion, and excitement

sentences.english: Stop bouncing up and down on the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 别在沙发上蹦来蹦去了。

detailed_translations.english: if a ball or other object bounces, or you bounce it, it immediately moves up or away from a surface after hitting it
the action of moving up and down on a surface

sentences.english: land usage
sentences.chinese: 土地的利用

sentences.english: a book on modern English usage
sentences.chinese: 关于现代英语用法的书

detailed_translations.english: the degree to which something is used or the way in which it is used

sentences.english: Tests of the manure showed a high ammonia content.
sentences.chinese: 这种肥料经过化验表明氨的含量很高。

sentences.english: The red and white upper clouds are particles of frozen ammonia.
sentences.chinese: 最上面的是红白色的、由冻结的氨粒构成的云。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of relative humidity on indoor concentrations of formaldehyde and ammonia.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察相对湿度对装修后室内空气中甲醛和氨浓度的影响。

sentences.english: I brought her proficiency up to the required level.
